sourceDesc.p: ସାରଳା ମହାଭାରତ: Sāraḷā Dāsa's Mahābhār, Arttaballabha Mohant, vol. 6

projectDesc.p: The edition was scanned in 2008 at Leiden University by Arlo Griffiths with the help of his assistant Shila Schoots. Based on these scans, the edition was rekeyed 2009 by typists based in South India whose work was coordinated by Thomas Malten. The work was done at the time with a low budget furnished by Arlo Griffiths and left a lot to be desired. It has remained dormant for nearly 15 years and has now (Febr. 2024) started to be gradually cleaned up.

lg.l:

div.head:
{@udyoga parbara
sūcīpatra@}
{@biṣaẏa pr̥ṣṭhāṅka@}

lg.l:
2| pāṇḍabaṅka indra prasthe prabeśa, dhr̥tarāṣṭra
sañjaẏa sambāda o dhaumya purohitaṅkara
dūtapaṇe hastinā gamana 2

3| yujheṣṭhiraṅka samara pratijñā–dhr̥tarāṣṭra,
bhurisarba, dhaumya o biduraṅkara
duryyodhanaku pañchapaṛā prārthanā ebaṁ
biduraṅku yujheṣṭhiraṅka nikaṭaku preraṇa 13

4| śrīkr̥ṣṇāṅku āṇibā nimante arjunaṅka
dvārikā gamana o tāhāṅku gheni
pratyābarttana 28

5| uttarābāḷīra rajobatī hebā sambāda
o rajakoṣṭhi bibaraṇa 31

6| sudeṣṇā pāṭa mahādeīṅkara yuddha
sambandhare bhabiṣyata bāṇī barṇṇana o
biśvadebaṅku biśvāmitraṅkara śāpa 42

7| kabaca kuṇḍaḷa arthe brāhmaṇa rūpare
indraṅkara karṇṇaku chaḷanā tathā baradāna
o śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅka svarga gamana 56

8| pañchapāṇḍabaṅkara samara pratijñā, dūtapaṇe
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅkara hastinā gamana o byāsādi
muniṅka saha bidura gr̥he biśrāma 78

9| śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅkara bidura mandire abasthiti
o biduraṅku baradāna 97

10| kuntī o śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅka kathopakathana, śrīkr̥ṣṇa
dhr̥tarāṣṭraṅka nikaṭe prabeśa ebaṁ andha
brāhmaṇara cakṣudāna bibaraṇa 102

11| śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅkara prathamathara kurusabhāku gamana ebaṁ
apamāna o baḷirājāra upākhyāna 118

12| duryyodhana duikhanta paṛā debā nimante
bhīṣmaṅkaṭhāre icchā prakāśa o śakunira
amata ebaṁ bāvanā bhūtara bibaraṇa 156

13| kauraba sabhāku śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅkara dvitīẏathara
gamana, bhaẏaṅkara apamāna o narasiṁha
rūpa dhāraṇa 174

14| kauraba sabhāku śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅkara tr̥tīẏathara
gamana o apamāna ebaṁ mahālakṣmīṅka sahita
dvārakā gamana 186

15|mahālakṣmīṅku āṇibā nimante duryyodhana
śakuniṅka dvārikā gamana o śrīkr̥ṣṇagku
āṇibā nimante arjunaṅkara dvārikā yātrā 208

16| śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅkara indraprasthe āgamana, kurukṣetra
baṇṭana nimante śakunira yujheṣṭhiraṅka
nikiaṭe prabeśa o aḷasuā bibaraṇa 219

17| kurukṣetrare śubhastambha sthāpana, tahiṁ madhyastha
puruṣa ebaṁ pūrṇṇa praḷaẏa o debanāśana
baṭa prabhr̥tira bibaraṇa 242

19| kurupāṇḍabaṅkara sainyasaṁkhyā o śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅka
dvārā belāḷasena mastaka cchedana o
śubhastambha sthāpana ebaṁ pāṇḍabamānaṅka
channatā 287

22| ātāpi bātāpi upākhyāna ebaṁ
siṁhamukhā śr̥gāḷara bhabiṣyata bāṇī 317

23| tuḷasībaṇa bāgha o tuḷāmudañ kāṁkara
bibaraṇa 331

24| bīra hanumānaṅku āmantraṇa nimante
bhīmasenaṅkara gamana o apamāna 342

25| karṇṇaṅku āṇibā nimante kuntīṅkara gamana
ebaṁ nīḷabāṇa bhūjabāṇa dakṣiṇā svarūpe
ānaẏana 365

26| kalpāsura sahita karṇṇara yuddha nīḷabāṇa o
bhmajabāṇara utpatti 374
28| mahā kṣatrīmānaṅkara baḷābaḷa o yuddhara niẏama 392
abaniḷe chāhiṁle tu ye koṭi brahmāṇḍa dekhi | 4 |
ḍibi ḍibi bajāi yāhāra ḍāki ḍambharu
hr̥de paitā yāhāra ananta nāga pheru | 5 |
svāmī tripura badhagalā yāhāra buddhi baḷe
binaẏe anubrate nātha muṁ tumbhara pādataḷe | 6 |
mama citta bhaji ho tahiṁ rahu ye bhrasaḷe | 8 |
ẏe saṁsāra madhye muhiṁ se dekhili sarūpa
tuhi se harantā deba kaḷikāḷa darpa | 10 |
śuṇa ho caitana śrī mahābhāratha udiyoga paboṅg kathā
yāhā hetu karipārile sabhāẏe hoiba bakatā | 1 |
yebaṇa grantha śuṇile adhārmikahiṁ hoẏe bhigyaṁ
udiyoga paboṅg kathā hr̥dagate laẏe kale
śāhāsraku jitā hoi ẏehā unyeṣi pārile | 3 |
udiyoga paṛhile prāpata hoai ruddhi siddhi | 4 |
dharma artha kāma mokṣa prāpata ẏethuṁ sarba | 5 |
muhiṁ tāhā bañchāili bicitra śuddha pothi | 7 |
subuddhi paṇḍita sugyaṁ hoiba ẏehā śuṇi | 8 |
ākāśe maṅgaḷa dhuni śubhai pāṇḍabaṁkara āsuṁ | 10 |
pacheṇa pañchāḷa kumāranta gheni śrīkhaṇḍī bhrātha beni | 11 |
yujheṣṭhi debe ye prabodhi bacana prakāśi
bāhuḍa birāṭa tu parama kalyāṇa hoasi | 14 |
muhiṁ yāiṁ kinā svāmī indrapraśasta yāẏe | 15 |
sahodraṁka nimante kāḷaka bulili ghora bane
ābara kimpe dharma laṁghibi aḷapa ye dine | 17 |
śānti samārjane āmbhe na karibā kaḷi
birāṭa śrīkhaṇḍi ye bāhuḍile sanya gheni
tahuṁ se pāṇḍabe caḷile dibasa rajanī | 19 |
nagra bhitare yāi rahile pañchu bhrāthe | 20 |

div.note: –śānti bhaji rahibā bahuta sanamāne | (ja, da, ṇa, ka, ba)
–aṣṭa abadhāne śatr̥ku saṁghāri | (ṭa, gha)

lg.l: dekhibā nāhi ki driyothana dhuśāsana bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇaṁku | 21 |
bāratā pāi mānagobinda niai kinā āmbhanta | 22 |
svāmī pāṇḍaba āgata boli jaṇāile haraṣe
ratha gaja aśva pādānti achanti saṅge kete | 26 |
birāṭa daṇḍa gheni bāhuḍi galā dharmapathuṁ | 27 |
pāñchāḷa kumāra tule bāḷuta ye tanu | 28 |
ẏeteka tule dekhilu āna nāhiṁ aguḷi | 29 |
bho daiba puruṣa mote hoibā upagata | 31 |
sañjaẏe boile rājā na kara biḷāpa
dharma abaśeṣe āsi barddhuta hoilā ki prāpa | 33 |
sarbe manda aṭanti nā tohora santati | 34 |
ābara kuru pāṇḍabe kāhiṁ loḍu pīrati | 35 |
biśvābasu gandharba ye pūrbe basithile svarge
kāḷe utapatti hoile śate aṣṭauttara tanu | 38 |
gata śāpya pāiṁ se dr̥bhāsāṁku tapakale
bho sañjaẏe ẏesaneka pātaka kalai muhiṁ kāhuṁ
anamite kopakali bidura paramārtha kahuṁ kahuṁ | 40 |
sādhu sādhu bidura ho tohora jībati
boilu kuṭumba barddhute tote śoka apramiti | 41 |
śuṇiṇa kope muṁ tote prahāra kalaiṁ pāde
ẏeḍe baḍa baṁśa mora buḍilā mānagobinda parasāde | 42 |
sañjaẏe boilā rāẏe bistāra na karani ẏehu kathā
āpaṇe yāhā arji tāhā karma boli
āho baibasuta manu pāṇḍabe bije kariachanti indraraśaste
lakṣe dvija gheniṇa bije dhaumya purohite | 45 |

div.note: –manukāḷa bañchāile paṇḍuṁkara poẏe |(ṭa, jha)

lg.l: pādāarghya deiṇa ye caraṇe kale dibyapūjā
kanaka uturī paitā dileka nei kandhe
yujheṣṭhi boile durgati bañchilu tohora prasāde | 48 |
samasta kuśaḷa pachāranti dhaumya ye paṇḍāẏe | 49 |
dhaumya purohite boile puchuṁ āmbhe tuku
yujheṣṭhi debe boile ẏe kathā na miḷai yugate
se mohora sodara kariba mote cintā
bāratā pāi mānagobinda yebe āmbhanta niantā | 52 |
tebe se jāṇanti nā tāhāra nikaḷaṁkara hiẏā
ẏeka pitāuṁ janama sodara tumbhe beni aṭa | 57 |
nīra kṣīra yehne hoai ye abheda
parameṣi pārile ẏehā hoi nā paramāda | 58 |
biśeṣe kaniṣṭha se ābara baẏase mattagarba
tāhāra yeteka doṣa upekṣā karibāka sarba | 59 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tāta se sahodra poḍu poḍu
dharmara baḷe sinā galu tahuṁ ye uburi | 63 |
puṇi kapaṭa pāśāẏe bhiāile mahāmantrī śakuni
kūṭa upāẏe kari se mohora samasta rājyabhāra gheni | 65 |
āpaṇe āstāne basi āmbhanta basāilā sabhātaḷe
ghoṣayātrā kāḷe se kaimeka nāme bane
pañchāḷa kaṭake yāiṁ kaleka yebaṇahiṁ kathā
tumbhe ki pāi achanā tahiṁra bāratā | 69 |
bipatti paḍai se dharmakathā kahuṁ kahuṁ
beda śāhāsra ābara sata houacchi kāhuṁ | 71 |
rājakuḷe jāta hoi mohora ẏeheneka abastā
kuru pāṇḍabe pīrati āu nohiba sarbastā | 72 |
āditya debatā yebe pacchime hoi ude
dhātubāda purusa yebe na karibeka br̥ṣṭi
stirī hoiba puruṣa, dibasa hoiba rāti
jaḷa yebe tapata hoiba śītaḷa hoiba bahati | 77 |
āho prohite haṭakarma purāṇe ẏehā aṣṭābatra muni kahi
ẏete bāge hoile yujheṣṭhi deba ẏehā ki sahai | 78 |
mohora beḷe yebe ẏehā muṁ sahi pārai
nirañjana debatā thaḷare biṣa muṁ bharai | 79 |
indrapraśasta rājya khaṇḍi mote deu kurusāiṁ | 84 |
tumbhe ta purohite mora baṁśara parama guru
purohite boile āmbhe yibuṁ tohora bole
kisa uttara karibuṁ āmbhe mānagobinda nāstikale | 86 |

div.note: –tapata jaḷe yebe poḍiba basumatī |[ṇa, da]

prohite śāsra purāṇa yebe anyo anye hoi
tebe ẏe kathā hoiba kahi nuārai | ka, da

lg.l: se nāsti boile tumbhe bāhuḍiṇa āsa | 87 |
ẏe apūrba padārtha nei dia dhr̥tarāṣṭaṁku | 88 |
hastinā rājye purohite prabeśa hoile āsi | 90 |
driyodhana bije karicchi yama ye praśaste
karṇṇa śaṁkuni dhuśāsana śalya ye sahite | 91 |
ke kemanta ẏehā ye bichārani dekhi | 93 |
karṇṇa boilā tu se paṇḍita mahāgyāṁtā
śūrabanta puruṣa tu bhūta bhabiṣya jāṇantā | 94 |
karṇṇa boilā tu se mantrī cūḍāmaṇi
mānagobinde tu sampada bhogya karāilu āṇi | 95 |
āho agocara gocara tu bhabiṣyata gyāṁtā
dūtakāra paṇe ẏehānta yujheṣṭhi dile peṣi | 98 |
ẏe puṇa āsiachanti grāma māgibā nimante | 99 |
ẏesanaka kahilā śaṁkuni bhūta bhabiṣya sandeśa
dhaumya purohita āsi ye hoile prabeśa | 100 |
samsta kuśaḷa boli ye boile kaurabe
tubhe ẏebe gabana kala keuṁṇa parastābe | 103 |
dhaumya purohite boile tumbhe śuṇimā dhārmika dhr̥tirāṣṭi
banabāsa dr̥rgatiru pārahoi ẏebe aile yujheṣṭhi | 104 |
āho bāhāra nagrare āsi rahichanti indra ye praśaste
bābu tohora rājya deśa nohai ki indra ye praśasta
nagra bhramaṇi karigale pāṇḍabe hoibe uṣata | 106 |
bābu amr̥ta biṣa thāiṭi ẏehi jibhyā
sadabuddhi thāuṁ thāuṁ asadabuddhi kemante debā | 107 |
bābu dharme āśre karithile ho mānagobinda
bābu sahodra sambhāḷile bahuta hoai dharma
bābu kuḷare putreka upujile baṁśa karaiṭi rakṣā
bābu boila ye tumbhe āmbhara parama guru
dharmaku prāpata hoibu nā tu yebe antara na dharu | 112 |
pāilu prastāba tumbhe kicchihiṁ na kaha | 113 |
tāhā niryyāpa kari kimpe na kahaṭi mote | 114 |
ẏeka paḍāke se thāntu sakaḷa prāṇī
ẏesana bākya kahibā tumbhara kebaṇa kāraṇa | 119 |
āna hoile ki prāṇa thāāntā ẏetebeḷe | 120 |
tumbhe ye purohite dekhibā arthe gala
purohite boile bābu ẏe se bhala bichāra
beni sodare tumbhe āmbhara bola kale
baṁśa udita hoiba dina yiba bhale | 123 |
sakaḷa kathā kuśaḷa hontā purantā manatuṣṭi | 125 |
yāiṇa prabeśa hoile indra ye praśaste | 128 |
manare birasa ye haraṣabhāba tāṁka nāhiṁ
subidhāne prasannagata na diśi mohora kāryye | 130 |
manara birase se badanti deba dhaumye
yehne prāpata hoẏe ye yāhāra karme | 131 |
sadā gacchai ki tāhāra mana śānti | 132 |
samasta sañchapi ye kahanti deba dhaumye
kauroba pāṇḍabaṁka kathā nuhai nā sāmye | 133 |
dvandaku icchā yebe tohora hāde acchi
āho tu yebe sahibu bābu tebe se rahai tora baṁśa
tohora na sahile ohokuḷa yiba nāśa | 135 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile ye mora ẏekādaśa baraṣa
paṇḍu mahārāẏe ye hoile prāṇe nāśa | 136 |
puṇi paśita na dile āmbhaṁku hastinā bhmabanaku | 139 |
āho purohite keteheṁ dukha sahibu sabhābe
pañchastorī baraṣa hoilāni baẏasa mote ẏebe | 142 |
tumbhe mote sākṣī hoithibāka deba dhaumye

div.head:
{@yudhiṣṭhiraṅka samara pratijñā–dhr̥tarāṣṭa, bhūrisarba,
dhaumya o biduraṅkara duryyodhanaku
pañchapaḍā prārthanā ebaṁ biduraṅku
yudhiṣṭhiraṅka nikaṭaku preraṇa@}

lg.l: āho bidura tumbhe yāani yujheṣṭhiṁka kati
āho paṇḍita hoi se anarthī hoile
pr̥thī na thibanā tāhāra na sahile | 3 |
se doṣamāna hāde debaṭi jāṇa muku | 4 |

div.note: –anartha se diśuacchi mote arthalābha prāẏe |(jha, ka)

lg.l: āho duṣṭaṁkara mattagarba śānti hoibā yāẏe
ẏe bidhi pūjā ye binaẏe debarāẏe
bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba mānya gheni
ẏemānanta gheni kuśaḷa bāratā pachānti anyoanyi | 10 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile tāta banaste baḍa sukha
ẏe se bichāre pāuchuṁ baḍa dukha | 12 |
bidure boile yebe banaste baḍa sustha tote
sodara jhiṁghāsi tu ailu ki nimante | 13 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile muṁ ye hoili banabāsī
dharmeṇa kaṣaṇa paḍai kahai muhiṁ tuku | 15 |
bābu tu ye mahata paṇḍita dhārmika kuḷaśīḷa
sugyānī puruṣa tu ye sahibu sakaḷa | 16 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tāta ẏemanta na kaha
mama bākya gheni yāa hastinā nagarī | 20 |
śānti bhajiṇa kathā yemanta hoiba raha | 22 |
indrapraśasta rājya pañchabiṁśa sahasra yojana māḍi
yamapraśasta aṣṭādaśa sahasra yojana sthaḷī aguḷī | 23 |
jaintā kaṭaka dui ahibrata dui sahasra yojana aguḷi
hastinā kaṭaka pandara sahasra yojana ye deśa
ẏenyāẏuṁ pañcharājya lakṣe yojana ye pakāśa | 25 |
sukheṇa bhoga karai pañchu rājya māḍi
kiñchita kari deu mote paḍā pāñchakhaṇḍi chāḍi | 26 |
athabā paḍā pāñchakhaṇḍi yebe na diai muku
abaśya saṁgrāma hoiba kahili dr̥ṛhabākya tuku | 28 |
muṁ yebe tāhāra tule samara na karai
bho pitā bidura tumbhara muṁ pādapadme hārai | 29 |

div.note: paḍā pāñchakhaṇḍi āmbhanta yemanta diāa |(ba, ka)
–śānti hoi yemante prīti hoi raha |(pha, ña)
–bho pitā tohora caraṇe droha muṁ karai |(cha, da, ba, pha)

lg.l: dharma dharma sumari tahuṁ ye caḷile pitāmaha
caḷile bidura se nirādhāra bacana śuṇi
bābu samarakaiṁ tu yebe kalu icchā
bābu tumbhaṁku hāranti sinā uprodha kari yuddhe
sarūpa saṁgrāme ke tāhānta jiṇima raṇamadhye | 34 |
hāthare śahasra thile nāhiṁ tāhāṁku mr̥tu
kaḷapī aẏuṣa yoddhā se aṭai aśastamā | 37 |
karṇṇa mahāmalla ye tohora sohodra aṭai
kehi na bratai ye tāhāku samare bheṭai | 40 |
abhedakapaca bajra chaurī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa chāpante karṇṇe
ke tāhāku samāna hoiba ẏe tini bhmabane | 41 |
bajra paśupatra bighāta na bhedai yāhāra gātre
jharai amr̥ta rasa yāhāra benikarṇṇa pātre | 42 |
ẏe mahī maṇḍaḷe paḍai yāhāra kathā
yujheṣṭhi boile tāta tu na kahani ẏehā
anāsta lokanta kāḷe dharmahiṁ se sāhā | 44 |
dhātubāda puruṣa kimpā tāhā karānti janama | 45 |
bho tāta baḷabīryya thāuṁ thāuṁ yebe hīnabīryya hoilā
sañjaẏe jāṇimā se prāṇī jīuṁ jīuṁ malā | 46 |
bibādaku icchā ki hoiba mohora beḷe | 47 |
caḷa caḷa pitāmaha na bolani mote ẏehā
anāsta lokaku se dharama hoi sāhā | 48 |
tuḷa śukḷa pañchamī puṇi uttama bāra
mūḷā nakṣatraku ye bhogathilā se dinara | 49 |
baba nāme karaṇa dhr̥ti nāme yoga
bidure boile deba kuśaḷe yebe cintā
pāṇḍabaṁkara kāryya kimpe na karasi sanddhagatā | 55 |
apāra kaṣṭe se ye bane gale sebi
nandana sahodra tora kesaneke na bhābi | 56 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭe boile bābu bheṭile ki yujheṣṭhi
mama putra hite se bane hele kaṣṭa | 57 |
bāḷuta kāḷahuṁ se hoile parama yogī
sarbadā kāḷe se dharmaku na laṁghi | 58 |
bābu pāpakaiṁ bhaẏe se karai sarbakāḷe
bidure boile deba kahilu tu dharma
tohora putragoṭi se kebaṇa lakṣaṇe janma | 60 |
na thāuṁ thāuṁ prāṇī hoai mandāchārī
ketekāḷa paryyante tāku dharma thiba ābori | 61 |
tuhi ye se mabaṁśe bihantā bidhātā
tu se chāḍilunā sehi putraṁkara cintā | 62 |
pūrbanyāẏuṁ kari se sama dai tote | 63 |
mukuiṁ basāi se aneka kahilā pīrati
ẏeteka pāile se rahiba mana mr̥cchi
śānti bhaji rahiba dvanda ne hibāka kicchi | 65 |
tu ye parama guru hastinā pañchu svarge
tohora thāuṁ kuṭumbe se anyoanyi kebaṇa bāge | 66 |
bho tāta yābata dharma tābata karma gacchi
tu abā kāhāku svāmī ḍapodha kama achu | 68 |
bho tāta putranta bhañjāi ẏebe kahimela kathā
dhr̥tarāṣṭa boile bābu tu aṭu he sarbagyaṁ
dhārmika bibeka paṇḍita tu aṭu mahābhigyaṁ | 70 |
putranta tiāra bābu yemanta hoẏe prīti
bho tāta somabaṁśara dhāraṇa tu aṭu adhikārī
yesaneke pāṇḍebaṁka tule kaurobaṁkara baḍhai seneha | 74 |
yadyapi kāryya tumbhe kari nuāriba sanddha
ādihuṁ ẏemanta kathā na bhāḷilu abā | 76 |
bidura prathame driyodhanaku dilā tora koḷe | 77 |
bidure boile tāta baḍāi bicakṣaṇa ẏe putragoṭi
hāthe padma pāẏe padma ẏehāra hāde acchi
aharniśi kandhu ẏehāra na chāḍiba lacchī | 79 |
baṁśa tohora udita kariba ẏehu baccha
ẏeka putraku nāśi aneśata putra kara rakṣā

div.note: ohokuḷa bināśe nohiba sadagati |(tha)

lg.l: se beḷe na kala tumbhe bidurara bāṇī
astukāra bākya tu ye nuārilu mane guṇi | 84 |
bhūrisarbaṁka bāṇī śuṇi boile dhr̥tarṣṭa mahāyati
gata śocanāku na kara mane bhrānti | 85 |
ātmāru jāta putra nāśa karibi kemante | 86 |
gata doṣamānanta tu na kara śocanā
bidura agrate se yāhā kahile yujheṣṭhi
kiñchita kari mote deu paḍā pāñchagoṭi | 88 |
bhūrisarbaẏe boile se dvandaku na icchi
bābu daibara ghaṭasūtra ẏemanta achai pūrbe
bhūrisarbaẏe boile ẏe kathā nuhai ye sāmya
yugate driyodhana na debaṭi ẏeka grāma | 92 |
dhatarāṣṭa boile chāla yibā ho sabhāku
amba kāra nandana sañjaẏa kara dhari

div.note: –karkaśa madhupiṅgaḷa jāti se mānagobinda |(ba, ṇa, da)
–yujheṣṭhi na sahileṭi helāba baḍa dvanda |(ka, ba)

lg.l: mānagobinda pada kāhākuhiṁ namaskāra nāhiṁnā tāhāra | 102 |
rājādhi rājeśvara tu pañchu kaṭake ādhipati | 104 |
se mohora sodara ye aṭanti yugate
paḍā pāñchakhaṇḍi se kaṇakalpe deu mote | 106 |
ye yāhā bidhire sebā karibā dhr̥tirāṣṭara paẏare | 107 |
athabā grāma dile dharma hoiba tāhāri | 108 |
bidura mukharu kurupati ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi

div.note:
atimāne mānagobinda bīradhū yāhāra
pitā mātākaiṁ yāra nāhiṁ namaskāra (pha, ña)

lg.l: prastāba bākye tumbhe sarūpa na kaha | 111 |
śakuni boile yāhā bolai ho karṇṇa
āmbhara bichāraku ta yogāilā ẏekathā māna | 114 |
śakuni boilā dhr̥tarāṣṭapitā tāhāṁkara nadiśai beninaẏana
bhūrisarbaẏe binddhale aṅge na bhede śahasramāna | 115 |
droṇaṁkara gurupaṇa ẏekaku vidyā dianti bhale
āreka śiṣya gaṇṭhimuṭhi kari nuārai bhale | 116 |
micheheṁ śahasra dharuṁ āmbhe peṭara bikaḷa | 118 |
rājāra pitā bolānti se pratigraha nimante | 119 |
kumantra na kahanti sañjaẏe kisa mantrī | 120 |
anarthe bāṛhilā se yebaṇa kuḷa loka

div.note:
–śakuni boilā dhr̥tarāṣṭaṁku pitā kahilā karṇṇa
mohora bacana tu karibā sābadhāna (jha, ṭa, jha)
–ẏehānta barile ho kāryyahiṁ na pāi (ga, gha)
–rājāra pitā bolānti pratiṣṭhā nimante ({?}, pha

lg.l: śakuni mahāmantrī tāhāra bandhu upara kuḷa | 123 |
dhaśāsana yoddhā ye mūrkha aphaṇḍa ta
karṇṇa senāpati se ubhāẏa kuḷara airi ta | 124 |
ẏe chāriheṁ basanti yebe ẏeka āstānara | 125 |
indra br̥ṣṭi na karai pr̥thibīre śasyahāni hoi
bābhiẏe ẏe chārigraha ẏebe janama tumbhe ẏetheṁ
bābu ẏehā sampādi kahibu bīra karṇṇa
tāhāra na sahile ẏethi sabunti mandabuddhi | 129 |
se jāṇai ki beda ādhāṁna hāde kale | 130 |
nikaṭa hoilāni dina lekhithāa re bābu | 132 |
sarbadāẏe prāṇīṁki hāde nuhai sinā sampada
sarbadā prāṇīṁki ye na paḍai bipada | 133 |
bābu samaste andha āmbhe tuhi se dibyacachu
tohora baṇā hoile āmbhe samaste amārge buluachuṁ | 135 |
bābu samasteheṁ mūrkhata āmbhe, tuhi se paṇḍita
tu bhākhā na kahile āmbhara kisa ye ukata | 136 |
bābu tuhi se śuṇantā āmbhe aṭuṁ sarbe kāla
tohora na śuṇile ambhe śuṇibuṁ kāhā bola | 137 |
tuhi se gāruḍiā rāuḷa parama yogī | 138 |
saburi śarīre āmbhara ābori acchi bāṁdhi
pheḍi mela bāchā bābu maunabrata noha
driyodhana boilā tāta kṣaṇake hoa thira | 142 |
ẏe kuru sāgaraku śaṁkuni sarba buddhi
se moho sahodra mātuḷa tu tāhā kiṁpā nindi | 143 |
baṁśayāka māriṇa muṁ tāhāku kali rakṣā
ẏe mohora sampadaku kāreṇa ẏehāra yebaṇa bāñcchā | 144 |

div.note: ẏekai debatāẏejāṇaiṁ mohora ẏekai prakr̥ti |(ja, ṇa)

lg.l: ẏekā bākyahuṁ muhiṁ na jāṇai bākya beni | 147 |
kaḷahe āṣya tuṭai yāhāra beni priẏā | 149 |
āho ẏekā putraka jāta hoilā bhāgīrathī
athabā pāpahiṁ karu ki puṇyahiṁ se karu
sanddha asanddha kathā śaṁkuni sabu pheḍu | 151 |
kuṭumba nāśa hoi tāta tāhāṁkara daṁśane | 152 |
ẏebe ho boluacha samaste tumbhe śuṇa
kauroba baḷa pāṇḍaba baḷakaiṁ śaṁkuni se dātāprāṇa | 153 |
ẏe yāhā bhāṣiba se bhmañjiba nija karma | 154 |
yeteka buddhi śaṁkuni kahilā jāṇa mote
ẏethu abā bhipada hoiba mora karme

div.note: ẏekā maitra mohora karṇṇa mahādānī |(ña, pha, ṭha)
kr̥tāntaka pāśe paḍai bāchā bicaḷita hoile |(jha, ṭa)
yedui bacana kahinti tāhāṁkara poḍu |(jha, ṭa)
dui jibhyā bahanti yeuṁṇa prāṇīmāne |(ja, ṇa)
ẏe yāhā bhāṣiba se bhmañjiba niẏata karma |(ja, ṇa)

lg.l: ẏesaneka sabhāre ye boilā rājā bāṇī
taba prasanne mote udita hou yaśa | 160 |
svāmī subuddhi kubuddhi tu sarbadā karu sama | 161 |
se śānti hoiba deba tohora parasāde | 162 |
svāmī drahasita badana adharu paṁku bimbaphaḷa jāṇi
heṅguḷa bibhaḷita yehne netra jaḷai śuddhamaṇi | 164 |
parama nirañjana nātha mote turite kaha buddhi | 166 |
svāmī akaḷita sāgare muṁ yāuacchi bhāsi
sarba sodara nātha mote uddhari dhara ruṣīkeśi | 167 |
ābara prakr̥ti na jāṇi hoilaiṁ baṇā
ke mātā ke pitā ke kāhāra bandhu
tuhi se śuṇantā nātha tāraṇa sudhā sindhu | 169 |

div.note: –agāda sāgare yehne nīḷa utpaḷa puṣya phuṭi |(ṇa, ja, ka)
–tuhi se cintāmaṇi nātha karuṇāmaẏa sindhu |(dha, ba)

lg.l: svāmī praḷamba kodaṇḍa aṭai yāhāra benibāhā
jaḷada medura bāṇī yāhāra siṁghaṭhāṇi śrīaṅga | 172 |
toho bhmabna dekhibi nātha tohora parasāde | 173 |
svāmī nārāẏaṇa nāma śrī puruṣottma nāmagoṭi
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa bhābai rāma rāma | 175 |
āho caitana yadyapi mānuṣa aṁśe muhiṁ ahiṁsā apāpī
jaṅkherapura bāsinī siddha sāroḷa mote sākhā | 178 |
āho budhajane na ghenimā mora doṣa
se yāhā kahanti muṁ tāhā karai prakāśa | 179 |
mānaba hoi muṁ tāhāṁka rūpa ye dekhili
se yāhā rāte kahai muṁ tāhā lekhili | 180 |
muṁ kāhiṁ kahibi purāṇa akaḷita śrī mahābhāratha | 181 |
na paḍhili na śuṇili na bhābili gata puṇye
aṣṭādaśa paboṅg kali muṁ śrī sāroḷa prasanne | 182 | || 340 ||

div.note: yama bhmabana bhedibi nātha tohora prasāde |(ña, pha)

div.head:
{@śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅku āṇibā nimante arjunaṅka dvārakā
gamana o tāhāṅku gheni pratyābarttana@}

lg.l: anna byañjana na bhamañjiṇa bidura manabyathā
mohora dekhante kuṭumbe pāibe baḍai abastā | 2 |
nija prāṇa tejibi praẏāga tīrthe yāiṁ
puṇa bhārathe mukata acchi nārāẏaṇa mukha chāhiṁ | 3 |
bābu ẏekāṅga mantrī ye hāde hoilā śaṁkuni
kurukuḷa baṁśaku se aṭai kṣaẏe kaḷā | 7 |
pāpa puṇya dharma adharma samasta lāgainā tote | 8 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tāta tuhi se aṭu sākṣī
arjunaku rāi āgyāṁ dile yujheṣṭhi rājaindre | 10 |
śrī jagannāthaṁku re gheni āsibu tu ẏekā | 11 |
utsaba sampada kathā kiñchita puṇa biroḷe | 12 |
se hari saṁpakṣa mote atāi sarbasthāne
caḷai bhāroi malla se dvārikā tatakṣaṇe | 14 |
dvārābatī pure prabeśa hoile bāsabara tanu | 15 |
trapura tāmbuḷa bhmañjiṇa hari arjuna palaṁkare bije | 20 |
beṇu baiṁśī aḷābeśī mr̥daṅga tāṇḍaba rasagīta | 23 |
arjunaku koḷa kariṇa bhmaje bhmaja bhiḍi
bābu dvārikā lokaṁkara jībana āja dhanya
tote dekhikari nistarili nistarili re arjuna | 25 |

div.note: kuśaḷa bāratā puṇa arjunakaiṁpucchi |(ṇa, ja)
aḷābeśī–lāu nimirta ekatāra yukta bādyayantra |

lg.l:
ā stringed musical instr̥ment
vith made the bottlegourd.
prāṇakaiṁ sākhā mora tu bāndhaba phālaguni
tote dekhi utasalya mohora samasta kāminī | 27 |
mote dekhibā nimante tora anugraha citte
ki tohora adhika kāryya acchi ki nimante | 28 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna gamante ki śubhra diśai
prabeśa hari arjuna yāiṁ nagra bāruṇābanta | 33 |
yujheṣṭhi deba kalyāṇa kale śubhabāñcchā gheni | 35 |
chāmure keśaba ye rahile pura meṇṭi | 36 |

lg.note: prabeśa hari arjuna yāiṁ indra ye praśasta |(ṭa, ṭha, jha, phā, ṅa, ña, da)

lg.l: pāñchakhaṇḍi grāma mote na dilā kurupati
sabu kāḷe mohora tahiṁ dharithāi anīti | 41 |
bidūraṁka agrate deba muṁ kahilaiṁ yāhā
kāḷe driyodhana deba na śuṇilā tāhā | 43 || 383 ||
āho caitana pāntaba pāñcheheṁ pāñchāḷī jathannāthaṁka sahite
śubhe prabeśa hoile yāiṁ matsa deśai
bāratā pāiṇa birāṭa daṇḍa gheni āsai | 4 |
mūḷā nāme nakṣatra ye bhogya se dinara | 5 |
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa harṣa nāme yoga
makara māsara ye ūṇeiśa dina bhāga | 6 |
surasena prohite ye pātile tahiṁ khaḍi
pākā paraśana ye kautukī nāganāḍī pāḍi | 8 |
bāra tithi nakṣatra apr̥ta yoga kāḍhi | 9 |
āditya bāre rajobatī hoile santāna birodhī
bhauma bāre rajobatī huanti yebaṇa banatā
sundara putra janamāi svāmī alpa āṣyagatā | 12 |
sakaḷa kāryya siddhi hoai tā mukha chādiṁle | 14 |
putra dohitā jāta hoai apāruṁ apāre | 15 |
maṅgaḷa bāre rajobatī hoile sundarī hoiba baṁśanāśī | 17 |
āho caitana pratipada dinare bāḷī rajobatī hoile
ṣaṣṭhī dinare se rajobatī hoanti yebaṇa nārī
saptamī tithire yebaṇa stirī huai pākāsparaśaṅa
dhana barddhuta huai nohai santāna bhaṅga | 25 |
sarbe upujiba ye ẏekai abaḷā santati | 27 |
daśamī dinare yebaṇa stirī hoiba rajakaḷā
putra pautrī upujibe svāmīre saubhāgī abaḷā | 28 |
yebaṇa stirī rajabatī huanti traẏodaśī dine
para dārāẏeṇī huanti se svāmīra bihune | 31 |
lg.note: āiśuryya barddhita hoiba nohiba santāna |(ña, pha)
putra duhitā upujiba bidhabā hoiba se nārī |(ga, ta)

lg.l: chuiṁte na yogāi se aṭai baḍa doṣī | 32 |
sntāna upujile se kaṇā kujā hoai | 33 |
putra duhitā santāna bahuta saubhāgī svāmī | 34 |
tithi bāra rajacatra hoilā pāpa yathā | 35 |
cauda baraṣa naba māseṇa peṭa rāṇḍiā hoiba | 36 |
āpaṇe śaraghāta hoiba putra garbhare thāānte
āgata kathā jāṇiṇa se manare bichāri | 38 |
sahadebara bacane daibagyaṁ paṇḍita tāhā gopyakarā | 39 |
bāra tithi gaṇita ye bujhile doṣa bācchi
kr̥tikā nakṣatre hoile bhagna huai gr̥habāsa
roheṇī nakṣatre hoile atuṭa hoai baṁśa | 42 |
lg.note: aḷapa dine tāhāra nāśayāi svāmī |(jha, ṭa, jha, pha)
kaḷaha karai se prāṇatyāja hoi svāmī |(cha, ṇa)
putra pautra upujai nāśayāi svāmī |(na, ṛha, ña)
kr̥ttikā nakṣatra hoile bhathā yāi nāśa |(pha, ḍha, ña)

lg.l: putra putrī artha labhai se dina yāi bhale | 45 |
maghā nakṣatre ye hoiba svāmī nāśa | 46 |
hastā nakṣatre dhana santāna hoẏe barddha
citrā nakṣatre rajakārī hoile garbhapāta siddhi | 48 |
mūḷā nakṣatre ye mahādoṣa nāśa yāi baṁśa | 52 |
uttaraṣāḍhā nakṣatre se sarba śubha huai | 53 |
sarba kāryya siddhi hoai br̥haspati kahile | 54 |
para dārāẏeṇī hoi dina hariba se yubatī | 55 |
putra duhitā na upujai svāmīre abhagati | 56 |
pūrba bhādraba nakṣatre yebe hoiba rajabatī
se stirī hoiba ye svāmīre abhagati | 57 |
putra putrī na upujai se svāmīre abhagati | 59 |
sarba śubha bichāranti dāna puṇyara nimante | 61 |
āẏuṣmāna saubhāgya śobhana siddhi sādhya sukarmaṇi
haraṣaṇa śubhaprīti ẏe samaste śubha boli gaṇi | 62 |
santānahāni huai ẏete yoge hoile rajobatī | 63 |
byāghāta parigha dr̥ba śūḷa asr̥k yoge huanti ye rajabatī
sehu nārī hāde ye dochāruṇī bolānti | 64 |
biṣkumbha barīẏāna dhr̥ti śiba indraśukḷa atigaṇḍa
bāṇijya śakuni nāga catuṣpada ye kiṁstughna | 67 |
dhanu putra saubhāgya hoai paṇḍite kahile | 68 |
gara biṣṭiẏe dui karaṇe yebe cajabatī
tatakṣaṇe se nārī ye bidhabā huanti | 69 |
rāhu tr̥tīẏa candra saptama nabame śaniścara ketu
bāra tithi nakṣatra yoga karaṇamāna bācchi
puṣyā ucchaba kale yebaṇa bidhāna acchi | 74 |
aneka yogāḍa ye karāile birāṭa daṇḍadhārī

lg.note:
“mithune dhanabatī karkaṭe kuḷaṭaẏā” pare ‘ka’ o ‘ṛha’ pothire bhinma
pāṭha:–
meṣe darida br̥ṣe bidhabā mithune dhanabantī |
debatāmānaṁku pañchāmr̥te srāhāna ye kari |(jha2, ṭa)

lg.l: mathā yogāṇa gheni aṅgagchā gandhā dvije | 80 |
kuśahātha hoiṇa se deba tarpaṇa bege sāri | 81 |
piṭhā paṇā paiḍa dudha śākara chenā
sañchapi kahi ke amr̥ta yogāḍa ninā | 85 |
bhmañjiṇa triputi ye hoile deba banamāḷī
aneka susañcha padārtha ye paraśanti āṇi
piṭhā paṇā paiḍa padārthahiṁ dianti na jāṇi | 91 |
āñchobana sāriṇa trapūra tāmbuḷa lāgi hoẏe | 92 |
lg.note: mathā tela ghei aṅgagchā sebakamāne āẏe |(ka, ta)

lg.l: samasteheṁ tahiṁ ye bhojana bidhi sāri | 93 |
nānā puṣya gheniṇa ye sāñchoile keśa | 94 |
dibya gambhirī bhitareṇa pāṭaṭerā ye pakāi | 95 |
nabata belurī khaṭa śeya śeyāile āṇi | 97 |
subarṇṇara dīpābaḷī se netara baḷitā guāghr̥ta dei | 98 |
haṁsuli tuḷī se gāla ye mucuḷi
lambanti dibya mukutā dibya troṇī māḷī
bara kanyā śeyyāgata karāile sarba bāḷī | 100 |
abhimanyu kumara dibya beśa beśana hoi
rūpeṇa kumara ye tini bhmabana mohai | 103 |

lg.note:
“puṣyara pākhuḍā ye trapūrara dhūḷi” pare keteka pothire
adhikāpāṭha :–
lg.l: śubha bāñcchā kari āsanti kāminī janamāne
kapāṭa pāḍi gamana kale se ye yāhāra sthāne | 105 |
pratakṣe lakṣmī se sadā parama jyoti
hāsya lāsya yugate chāṭu paṭaḷa kahi | 108 |
se mahā sundarī rase aliaḷa sukumārī
bhāba pīratiẏe ye hoi garbhabāsa prakāśa | 113 |
raẏaṇī śeṣe ye uṭhile kumāra kumārī
prātasrāna tarpaṇa sandhyā sārile deba ye murāri
samaste śeyyā chāḍi prabhāte basile ẏekatve | 118 |
śrīharira māẏā ke bujhiba tadanta kari
ye se nārāẏaṇa se bhārābhara nibāri | 119 |
badaẏanti sāroḷā dāsa mote uddhari dhara catrapāṇi
taba caraṇe muṁ hoili janme janme pariṇāmi | 120 |
na dekhiṇa dekhai dekhi na dekhai
tohora caraṇe mora nitya heu bhagati | 123 |
kr̥pa kara nātha sadaẏe taba citta
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa taba caraṇe bhagata | 124 || 507 ||

sudeṣṇā pāṭa mahādeīṅkara yuddha sambandhare
bhabiṣyata bāṇī barṇṇana o biśvadebaṅku
biśvāmitraṅkara śāpa
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
ẏethu anantare kathā ye śuṇimā dibyarīti | 1 |
śrī mahābhāratha śuṇi pāpa kara kṣaẏe | 2 |
śuṇa ho caitana śrīkr̥ṣṇā dropatī ẏekai samayoge
sahadeba bāsudeba arjuna basiachanti ye āge | 4 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile hari yahiṁra nimante āmbhe jāẏe
se kāryya ta siddha na karāilu debarāẏe | 5 |
keśaba badaẏanti tumbhe śuṇasi go māta
dhr̥tarāṣṭaṁka pua pāṇḍabaṁka ki hoiba sanddhagata | 7 |
tada nimante jāta pāṇḍaba pārtha bhīma
mahībhārā nibāra se karibe mahābhārata sāṁgrāma | 11 |

div.note:
- śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile hari tu hoibu madhyastha
bhārābhara nibāraṇa karibā nimante |(bahupāṭha)

lg.l: dinakare māribe se daśa sahasra rathī pādānti | 12 |
bhīṣmakaiṁ samāna nohibe se aṭanti pr̥thī bhedi | 14 |
deba dānabe mānabe agocara yāhāra mr̥tuicchā
pāṇḍabanta anta kariba se śāẏantanura bacchā | 15 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile hari mohora putra śveta
bhīṣma saṅge samaraku mukuṭa bānddhabu mātha | 16 |
se śvetara śare bhīṣme ye nibartti
tebe se pāṇḍabe rakṣā hoibe śrīapti | 17 |
kimbhuta vidyā se jāṇai tora tanu | 18 |
tāhā pratigraha kale ye droṇa mahābīra | 19 |
se droṇaṁkara vidyā ye prāpata arjune
se samāna nohiba to putra jiṇima kesane | 20 |
māgo kāhāra bidyāẏe ẏeteka pratagyāṁ tohora putra śveta
ẏe kathā sañchapi mote kahasi go māta | 21 |

div.note:
uddāsa–uddāsana=utkṣepa
uddāna=udayāna |(gha, ña)

lg.l: trailokya jiṇile se ẏe mahāmantra parasāde
puṇa kṣetrībr̥tta chādile se baśiṣṭhaṁka bibāde | 25 |
rājya sampada chāḍi se hoile banabāsī
brahmā īśvara indra candra sūryya ādikari
askanda debe kūṭakari peṣile cañchaḷā menakā
biśvāmitra miniṁki ye bheṭile bāḷī ẏekā | 28 |
madana basanta yahuṁ pātilā tāra aṅga
se mahātmāṁka bīryye ye menakā garbhabatī | 30 |
se amoha retagoṭi rahilā menakāra garbha | 31 |
mātāṁku gheni pahuḍi achanti biśvāmitra mahāyati | 33 |
āśvina māsa śukaḷa pakṣa tithi ye cauṭhī
candrabāra rātra pāñchadaṇḍa pañchamī tithi ghaṭi | 34 |
rājapada chāḍi kimpe tapī padakaiṁ kala icchā | 36 |
biśvāmitre kahile āmbhe ẏekādaśa loka bheḍi
ẏekā nārājake yāhāku nāma dhari peṣuṁ
nāśiṇa bāṇa ye leuṭiāsi paśai troṇe
athabā māri nuārile agnire paśai yāiṁ bāṇe | 39 |
menakā boile gosāiṁ ẏeta baḍāi durlabha
ẏe vidyā tadanta kari mo āge kahiba | 40 |
muhiṁ tāhā śuṇilaiṁ mātāṁka garbhe paśi
śahasra bheda muṁ ye pāili samasta
brahma śasramāna bheda na pāili anta | 43 |
mātā garbhe thāi muṁ śikhili samasta
stirī hoi sādhili muṁ śahasra bhedagata | 44 |
aneka asura māri muṁ pālili janaprajā | 46 |
śveta nāme rājā mote bara ye prasari
bhagati maṇāi māgilā muṁ hoili tāhāra nārī | 47 |

div.note: brahmaśastu bheda muṁ śuṇili karṇṇapatha |(ṭa, jha, cha, gha, ṅa, ḍa, ga, ña)

lg.l: ābarttaka saṁbarttaka megha baśiṣṭhaṁka svāhā svarā
lobheṇa baśyānara ghr̥ta āpyāna ye kale
ẏebo dvāpara yuge upujilā birāṭa nāme rājā
birāṭa bhāriyā śrīkr̥ṣṇā nāma mora ẏebe
hari birāṭa sambhabe muhiṁ hoili gabhabatī
śaṅkha śveta uttara tiniputra uttarā dohitī | 56 |
hari bicakṣaṇa dekhili muṁ śveta nāme putragoṭi
teṇukari śahasra mantra muṁ kahili nabakoṭi | 57 |
brahma dhātubidyā muṁ koṭika na pāili | 58 |
mama putra śvetare pāṇḍabe hoibe rakṣā | 59 |
yeteka gata āgata kathā kahile śrīkr̥ṣṇā
śuṇita āśrija ye jagata jana śreṣṭhā | 60 |

div.note:
ābarttaka sambarttaka droṇa ye puṣkara
baśiṣṭhaṁkara svāhā surā caubiṁśa baraṣa baraṣile ghr̥ta sahasra dhārā |(jha, ṭa, ña, ṇa, ja)
guṇḍichābatī nāmeṇa muṁ tāhāra mahādeī |(cha, ta, ba)

lg.l: keśaba boile brahma tu aṭu mahātmāṇī
mr̥tu prāpata nātha karāa tora āga | 63 |
kṣatrī kuḷaku rābāẏeṇahuṁ āne nāhiṁ gati
daśa sahasra rājā paḍibe aśi parāẏudha senā
tini pahara uttare paḍiba abhimanyu jenā | 67 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā mukhuṁ yahuṁ ẏesaneka bākya phuṭi
pūrbara carita tu ye śuṇa bāsabara tanu
tohora putra ki se aṭai abhimanyu | 70 |

div.note:
“tohora putraki se aṭai abhimanyu” pre ‘da’ pothire
adhikā pāṭha :–
ādi gandharba se śāpya gheni āsi
pūrbara carita ẏehāra śuṇa he brahmarāśi |
cauda baraṣa ẏe mr̥tupure thiba
adhika rahile hari arjuna saṁhāriba |
droṇara śaraghāte se prāṇa harāiba
biṣṇara dvārī se leuṭi svarga yiba |
uttarā bāḷī mora bidhabā hoiba |

lg.l: brahmāẏe boile se pr̥thībhārā nibāribā nimante
jārā bāṇā bajranābha saẏambara kadambā saunikā | 72 |
tu āpaṇe boilu dhātā ẏemanta kampā kahu
somabaṁśa na rahile arjuna rathe sārathi hoibi kāhuṁ | 76 |
se ādiṁki rāiṇa ye boile bedabara
tu yāi madhyasvarge janmahoa sahodrā garbhara | 78 |
hari baḷarāmaṁka baheṇī hoibe arjunara bhāriyā
abhimanyu nāmeṇa hoibu tu tāhāra tanujā | 79 |
ādi gandharba boilā muṁ akṣaẏe svargabāsī
bahuta kāḷa nuārai mu mānabe mr̥tumaṇḍaḷe basi | 80 |
dvādaśa baraṣa muhiṁ thibaiṁ tohora bole
ābara beni baraṣa rahibu pitāmaha boile | 81 |
mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe cauda baraṣa muṁ bañchibi kemante | 82 |
svarga bhoga chāḍi muṁ mānabe hoibi utapatti

div.note: pitāmaha boile candradhvajara nāti |(ṭha, gha, ṅa)

lg.l: yāhā se patāmaha srijilāka jāṇa ẏeba | 84 |
cauda baraṣa uttāre tote akṣaẏa svarga debu | 85 |
brahmāẏe boile tu abhimanyu nāme arjunara tanaẏa hoibu
ādi boilā brahmā yibi tumara bole
hari arjuna māri āsaiṭi ẏekadine biḷamba hoile | 87 |
cauda baraṣe abhimanyu svargaku na yiba kemante | 88 |
hari arjuna māriṇa svargaku yiba caḷi | 89 |
garbhabāsa hoi bidhagā hoiba mohora duhitā | 90 |
abhimanyura piara tu nohu ho kirīṭī
śakaṭa bhmaa samara hoiba ati śoge | 92 |

div.note: cauda baraṣuṁ yebe ẏekadina baḷi |(bahupāṭha)
brahmāṁka māẏāre yebe ẏekadina uguḷi |(ka, ṇa)

lg.l: nare bā guñjare bā ẏesana boliṇa
ẏe kathā śuṇi śasra chāḍibe guru droṇa
mama putra nāśante mohora kisa raṇa | 98 |
pitā śatr̥ boli tāṁku ātreṣibe dhr̥ṣṭadyumane
driyodhdana aṭha ṇoi bhāi bhīma māriba ẏekaghānti | 100 |
āreka dinare dhuśāsanara bhīma upa ḍiba bhmaja
śalya śakuni lakṣmaṇakumāra paḍibe sehi dina | 102 |
duiṇa bāstorī kṣauṇī nāśayibe aṭhara dinara madhye | 103 |
byāsa sarobare yāi luciba se dina raẏaṇī | 104 |

div.note: ẏegāra kṣauṇī nāśayibe aṭhara dinara madhye | (da)
“mānagobinda bāhāra hoiba samare” pare ‘ṅa’ pothire pāṭha :–
benibīre tahiṁ ye hoibe anyoanyi
ẏekaku āreka ye nuāribe cihni |
narasiṁha mūrati dhariba brikodara
bhīmara gadāghāte paḍiba kurubīra |
jānubhagna hoiṇa paḍibe kurupati
se beḷe aśastamā hoibe senāpati | [abasiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: bhīmasenara gadāghāte bhagna hoiba tāra jānu
pāñchagoṭi putra ye dropatīra tahuṁ utapanna
aśastamā amipate śiracchedana kariba sehi dina | 108 |
māngobinda prāṇatyāja hoiba se āñchaṁkara mukha chāhiṁ | 109 |
bāḷaka hatyākalu na chāhiṁbi tohora mukhaku | 110 |
kāiṁśikā nārāja se puṇa piṣibe pāṇḍabaṁku | 111 |
phāḷeka dhanu se phāḷeka guṇa moḍi | 112 |
yāhāku peṣiba se abaśya prāṇa chāḍi | 113 |
se apālaṭa śara hari debu tu kāhāku | 114 |

div.note: [pūrba pr̥ṣāra pāṭhāntara] :–
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile pāṇḍabana karibu rakṣā
se dina pāṇḍabanta nei dvārika re luchā |
aśastamā boliba mote senāpati kale
pañchu pāṇḍaboṅgṅka muṇḍa kaṭibi tora bole |
aṇḍāḷi driyodhana śiaḷi {?}tā dhari
aśastemā muṇare bānddhana puṇa śa{?} |
pañchagoṭi putra dopatīra utapanna
āśastamā asipatre hoibe nidhana |
aśastamā senāpati hoiba kurusānu |(bahupāṭha)

lg.l: pāṇḍaba pāñche ta bratanti tohora nāma dhari
kāhāku debuṭi hari kahithāa mora āge
kanakara yāna lāgilā muṁ yibaiṁ akṣaẏa svarge | 117 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇāra bhabiṣya durāpada tathya kathā śuṇi
śrīkr̥ṣṇāẏe boile hari saṁharili mora trodha
jāṇi na kahilu tu pāṇḍabanta kalu uprodha | 119 |
yāhāku debu tu dhariachu tohora hr̥de
muhiṁ tote tāhā sarūpa kahuacchi hāde | 120 |
nabamāsa naba dibasa se hoithiba ātmaje | 121 |
tu ta kadācite baẏe na karibu pāṇḍabaṁku
se kāiṁśikā śaraku debu abhimanyu kumaraku | 122 |
se śara ādhāra kariba uttarāra baḷā
arjuna boilā mā go somabaṁśa ta buḍilā | 123 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇāẏe boile tumbhe bikaḷa noha pārtha
gobinde boile mā go nāhiṁ mora buddhi
tuhi parama sādhabī go mote kahithāa mauṣadhi | 125 |
se menakākaiṁ dile mauṣidhi mr̥tu sañjībanī | 126 |

div.note: nārāẏaṇa bisarile abhimanyu hata śuṇi |(ja, ṇa)

lg.l: āho mr̥tu sañjībanī mantra mohora tahuṁ ghenisi debahari
parīkṣa kumāraku jīāṁibu ẏe mantra paḍhikari | 128 |
durāpada bākya khilu mā go mote | 130 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile trodha chāḍisi go māta
tohora kisa doṣa tāhāṁkara kalā kr̥ta | 131 |
kebaṇa kebaṇa doṣa kale mora putra | 132 |
bidāṁ puruṣe ye paḷāile jāṇa ḍare
haricandana rājāra śabyā nāme rāṇī kumara rohitākṣa
chāli nuāri kāndilā se rohitākṣa kumaramaṇi | 137 |
rodhira phuṭanteṇa paẏare kumāra nuārai chāli
mātā go mātā go boli pāḍilā bobāḷi | 138 |
chālukinā re kumara boli muni boileka rāge

div.note:
mora putra rakṣā parā tote ye lāgai
kuṭa kapaṭiā prabhma tu jagatara sāiṁ |(na, ṭha, ña)

lg.l: biśvedebā pañchapuruṣe ye svarge thāi dekhile
rohitākṣa abasthā dekhi biśvāmitraṁku gāḷi dile | 141 |
āho biśvāmitra tuhi aṭu baḍa manda
ẏeḍe baḍa sampradhi tāra nāśilu abaheḷe | 143 |
lobha ācari tu dharma nāśilu adyāpi | 144 |
urddhva mukhe biśvāmitre chāhiṁle śira jhuṇi | 145 |
rakata kumuda prāẏe diśai beni ākhi
āre mānuṣī garbhe tumbhe hoasi janama
sāta sāta baraṣe tumbhara hou śiraccheda | 148 |
dekhi mānya na kalā se mātāra bacane | 150 |
kopeṇa tāhāku ye dropatī śāpa dile

div.note: ẏeḍe baḍa lakṣmī tāra nāśilu aḷapa kāḷe |(jha, ṭa, ṇa)

lg.l: ẏe śāpa paḍu mora tohora hr̥dagate | 153 |
putra śāpa śuṇiṇa hr̥daẏa tāra kampi | 154 |
se hiḍimbikī kahilā lo dropatī pāmerī
mohora putraku śāpa dilu lo na bichāri | 155 |
tora garbhe abaśya lo hoibe pañchu putra
ẏe kathā ye pūrbaru hoicchi sarūpa | 157 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇāẏe boile tumbhe śuṇa go pāñchāḷī
se pañchāḷa kumāraṁka kathā kimpāiṁ tu bikaḷe bhāḷi | 158 |
āgo yāhā se pūrbe araji tāhā karma puṇa boli
tu ki agyānī go tote sarūpa kahili | 159 |
dorpatīṁki koḷe basāile se parama mahātmāṇī | 160 |
āgo prathama abatāre tu ketukā heṅguḷā
duja abatāre tu go pārbatī ẏekabaḷā | 161 |
tija abatāre tu ketukā aṭu debī śacī
indra dahane tote bara dilāka dadhiruci | 162 |
tūryya abatāre tu agniru hoilu jāẏe
janme janme tohora mohora prīti māẏe | 163 |

div.note: tija=tr̥tīẏa | (tr̥tīẏa avatāra)|
tūryya=caturtha |(tūrya arthāt caturtha avatāra)|

div.head:
{@kabaca kuṇḍaḷa arthe brāhmaṇa rūpare indraṅkara
karṇṇaku chaḷanā tathā baradāna
o
śrīkr̥ṣṇāṅka svarga gamana@}

lg.l: mahābhārata yuddhakaiṁ ye anakūḷa karuchu debahari | 1 |
karṇṇa ye maitra hoiacchi driyodhanara tule
ke tāhākaiṁ jiṇi pāriba abheda kabaca bajra chauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa thile | 2 |
karṇṇaku tohora katiki yebe aṇāi pāru acyuta
athabā naile bajra chauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa abheda kabaca aṇāa jagabhūta | 3 |
ẏethakaiṁ buddhi kimpe na karu catrapāṇi
karṇṇa tahiṁ thile kaurobanta kehu pāre jiṇi | 4 |
karṇṇara tahuṁ abheda kapaca kemante āsai ho mantrī dakṣa | 5 |
sahadeba boilā arjunara se aṭai pitāmaha
karṇṇara tahuṁ abheda kapaca bajra chauṁrī amr̥ta kuntaḷa kemante āṇa he bibatsa | 7 |
arjuna bolai svāmī muṁ galāiṁ amara svarge
nirbāta kapaca māili muṁ pitāmahara rāge | 8 |
satyabākya kari boile putra mote māga bara | 9 |
pitāmahara bacane muṁ caraṇe kalāiṁ sebā
bho tāta karṇṇara tahuṁ abheda kapaca bajra chauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa āṇi mote debā | 10 |
mote sumaribu tu ye tohora kāryyabeḷe | 11 |
saurabha pātreṇa jaḷa pūroi se sumarai surapati | 12 |
aṅgadeśe karṇṇa tahiṁki bijaẏe karibā svāmī | 14 |
abheda kapaca bajra chauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa
karṇṇara rājye yāiṁ prabeśa br̥nda arka kuḷadakṣa | 16 |
śatebhāra subarṇṇa ye karṇṇa nitye dei
ẏekā basre pinddha nārāẏaṇaṁku laẏa karai | 17 |
lambita jūḍā trikaccha basana kākheṇa bedapothi | 18 |
ruka yaju sāma atharba beda chāri
ẏekāmukhe ẏekādaśa beda uṁkāra karanti sasrayoni | 21 |

div.note: āura jyotira śuśumunā ādikari |(-ḍha)
śiśubeda = śiśumunā |

lg.l: āśrija ye karṇṇa brāhmaṇa bedadhuni śuṇi
nirdhūma agni jāṇi brāhmaṇara teja mr̥tti
dhūre thāi karṇṇa śata sahasra daṇḍa praṇamita
uṭhi karayoḍi se jaṇāi binaẏa bhagata | 25 |
ki abā tu brahmā viṣṇu maheśvara svāmī
ki abā indra candra kubera suragāmī | 26 |
śatebhāra subarṇṇa dāna diai muṁ nitye
ẏeḍe baḍa bedagyaṁ brāhmaṇa dekhilā nāhiṁ ẏe madhya jagate | 27 |
dvādaśa bhaṇḍāra dāna muṁ delini sakaḷa | 28 |
dāne śūrapaṇe mote nindā ruhāilu ninā | 29 |
mohora prāẏeka dānī tohora prāẏe brāhmaṇaku dāna debi
ẏe janmakaiṁ tohora dāridra na thoibi | 30 |
tu mote taḷahātha kari māguachu dāna
ājaka rahi brāhmaṇa randhana bhojana kara
kāḷi prabhāte muṁ citta rañjibi tohora | 32 |
śatebhāra subarṇṇa mote basundharī diai niti
se dhana dei tote kāli karibi triputi | 33 |

div.note: dāne śūrapaṇa nindibu mora ruhāibu tora sīmā |(ṛha, ka, ta, gha)

lg.l: indra boile se dhanaku tohora bahuta lokara baḍa āśa
muṁ ẏekā kemante khaṇḍibi bahuta lokakaṁra grāsa | 34 |
āhyo karṇṇa mora se dhane ki priojana
bhūmidāna māgu ki boile bīra karṇṇa | 35 |
indra boile mora bhūmi dānare priojana nāhiṁ
athabā kisa māgu na kahu kimpāiṁ | 36 |
ḍāhāṇabateka śaṅkhe kuśa yaba tiḷa pāṇi
upara hātha kariṇa dāna ye deuacchi bīra karṇṇa | 38 |
satya satya bacana ye bolai rādheba
śakya anukarme dāna mote māga ho bipradeba | 39 |
indra boile ho śuṇa daśa digapāḷe
tumbhe sākṣī hoithiba karṇṇara dāna debābeḷe | 40 |
chāriyuge chārimeghe chāridige tumbhe thāa sākṣī
āhārṇṇika beḷa tora ye heu achaiṁ uchura | 42 |
upara hātha kariṇa karṇṇa chāḍanteṇa jaḷa
taḷa hātha kariṇa ye ghenile ākhaṇḍaḷa | 43 |
bāsabara hāthe karṇna ye chāḍilāka ambu
idaṁbākya brāhmaṇa boilā abheda kapaca bajrachauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa mote debu | 44 |
karuṁ ambu pakāilā karṇṇa bīra cūḍāmaṇi | 45 |

div.note: taraṇā = taraṇḍā = sākṣī |
anukarme = anutrame |

lg.l: karṇṇa boilā bho tāta dharma kalu nāśa
arjuna se tohora putra aṭai suranātha
dharma ācaraṇe puṇa muṁ tā tahuṁ guṇa śata | 48 |
indra boile tu satya kariachu re bābu
tohora bichāre ẏebe debu ki na debu | 49 |
indrara bacane ye hasai bīra karṇṇa
bāchā bicaḷita puruṣa kara kisahiṁ jībana | 50 |
muhiṁ tumbhanta dāna diai abaśya tumbheta gheniba
tebe se hāde dharma mote udita hoiba | 51 |
śaucabanta hoi karṇṇa kr̥ṣṇājina chāla māḍi
biśikesana kumāraku ye dekhāi dilā tāḷu
pitāra bacane bijekarṇṇa kaṭāra gheni kumaramaṇi
karṇṇara tāḷu ye beni phāḷakari hāṇi | 54 |
śira bidāranteṇa ye diśilā maṇi jyoti
taḷa hāthakari ghenile tāhā amarādhi deba | 56 |
karṇṇaru kāḍhadilā se amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa beni
putrara mukha chāhiṁ ye boilā mahārathī
śarīruṁ bajra chauṁrī kāḍhidia pitā hoibe triputi | 58 |

div.note: biśikeśana boilā ho tāta dharma kalu nāśa |(ṭa, jha)

lg.l: śiraru uchuḍiṇa bajrachauṁrī kāḍhilā karṇṇara dulāḷa | 59 |
oṣṭha gaḷa kandha bidāriṇa chauṁrī kāḍhiāṇi | 62 |
sādhu sādhu karṇṇa boli br̥ndāarke bolanti gagan marge | 63 |
dhīre dhīre kari uchuḍa re rādheba karṇṇa boli | 64 |
asāṣṭame paḍiṇa ye na jāṇai kicchi | 66 |
kamaḷa patra pāḍiṇa śarīra nei loṭi
rudhireṇa tripaṇḍa hoi bikāśilā jāṇa bhūmi
sādhu sādhu karṇṇa boli boile purandra debasvāmī | 69 |

div.note: niśimaḷi = khaḍga |
kr̥ta + kti = kr̥ti = kuṛhoi = kuṛhi (kr̥ta + kti = hiṁsākārī)

- yesaneka kuṛhoi chaṛāi chāgaḷa jība
tesaneka karṇṇaku hoicchi abasthā parābhaba |(ka, cha, ṛha, ga)

lg.l: kiṁśuka puṣya prāẏe diśilā rādhebara tanu | 70 |
pādara āṅguṣṭhi sahite ye chaḍābanti nibhānti | 71 |
cakate karddana ye trimaṇḍa jāṇi gaḷi | 72 |
upra hātha kari karṇṇa dilā ye bāsaba nija kara | 74 |
abheda kapaca baja chauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa beni
ẏe tininti karṇṇa dilā satyabākya gheni | 75 |
idaṁ bākye karṇṇa indra pādeṇa pariṇāmi
yathā triputi bhaji ẏebe bije karibā debasvāmī | 76 |
puṣyaka bibāna gheni bije sahasrākṣa ra tahiṁki | 77 |

div.note: “kaṭire kaṭi mekhaḷe chaḍābanti jānu” pare cha, ṭa pothire pāṭha :–
puṇihiṁ asāṣṭama se rādhebara tanu |
dekhiṇa praśaṁsā ye karanti debagaṇe
boḷanti dhanya dhanya aṭu āho boṅgrakarṇṇe |
tohore se kari huai ẏesaneka bidhāna
nāhiṁ nāhiṁ na dekhilā ẏe tini bhmabana |
ẏete boli debe ye antarīkṣe thāi
karṇṇakaiṁ praśaṁsā karuchanti sarbe rahi |
karṇṇa boilā re bega bega akri kāḍha
karṇṇara citta ye heuacchi dr̥ḍha |
śuṇiṇa kumara ye uchuḍanti dehī
dehayāka ye sehu chaḍāiṇanei |

lg.l: sādhu sādhu karṇṇa boli staśaṁmanti trailokye | 78 |
abheda kabaca bajachauṁrī amr̥ta beni kuṇḍaḷa
puṣyeka rathe ẏehānta gheni bijekale ākhaṇḍaḷa | 79 |
mane dharante pabanu bege caḷai yeuṁṇa ratha
dāna bhārāẏe kari se basilā bhūmigata | 80 |
yibā amara svargeye puṣyeka ratha bege bāhā | 81 |
mātaḷi boilā deba śuṇimā jambu bhedī
dāna bhārāẏe ratha ye ākāśaku na khedi | 82 |
dāna bhārāẏe ratha tora basilāka bhūmi | 83 |
athabā siddha kemante hoiba mora kāryya | 84 |
praigraha na dile ẏethi nāhiṁ pratikārā | 85 |
puṇa koḷeṇa karṇṇakaiṁ ye dhaile āśvāsi | 86 |
bāhuḍi karṇṇa dehe jaḍita roma baḷī | 87 |
indra āśvāsanā kale yahuṁ karṇṇara kāẏe
karṇṇara śarīra diśilā lohita barṇṇa prāẏe | 88 |
hr̥de indra dile ye sahasa kigaṇa maṇi
bābu suputra śūrabanta sohaḍa bhāroi malla tu ye
athabā amara svargakaiṁ muṁ kemante karibi bije | 90 |

div.note: karṇṇakaiṁ prārthanā kaleka bajapāṇi |(ña, ḍha, pha, ga, tha, ḍa, ba, ṅa)

bābu śūrabanta guṇabanta pucchai muhiṁ tote
akṣaẏa svargakaiṁ muṁ yibaiṁ kemante |

lg.l: āna kisa debaiṁ sandeśa mote kaha | 91 |
indra boile muṁ dāna bhārā pāi
tu yebe nandana mora mote śubha bāñcchuṁ
ulaṭa pratigraha mote dāna māga kichu | 93 |
karṇṇa boilā tāta ẏehā na miḷai yugata
indra boilā putra mora pāra arthe
tada nimante pratigraha dāna debaiṁ tote | 95 |
karṇṇa boilā tāta muṁ māgibi yadyapi
tu tāhā tāta dei nuāribu adyāpi | 96 |
indra boile bābu ẏe mohora satya satya
taḷa hātha kariṇa magai bīra karṇṇa
śaṅkhu jaḷa tiḷa paḍante karṇṇa hāthe
boilā amara svarga chāḍasi piṭa mote | 99 |
boile se amara bhmabana tote dei nuārai re bābā | 100 |
tāhā chāḍiṇa āna māga ho sūryyabaḷā
karṇṇa boilā tāta satyaku kalu heḷā | 101 |
karṇṇa boilā airābata gaja mote diasi pitāmaha | 102 |
indra boile putra re ẏehā nuhai yugate
se airābata gaja sādhya nuhai mote | 103 |
hr̥dagate prameśi āna māgasi re bābu
tu ye mohora putra mote mukati bāṭa debu | 104 |
karṇṇa boile ho tāta nisate dāna dile
dharma ki prāpata hoi sārthuka nohile | 105 |
āna dāna mote yebe debu bajradhārī
indra boile bābu se mohora baśya ye nohai
rambhā nathile amara svarga na śohai | 107 |
rambhākaiṁ chāḍi āna māgasi re bāḷa
puṇa puṇa pāpabhārā heuacchi tora aṅga | 109 |
tu mote prārthanā karipāribu ki debarāẏe
satya tretaẏā dvāpara kaḷiyugare ruhāilu kathā | 111 |
yuge yuge śūrabanta sarbadā badaẏanti ẏeṇe
karṇṇa boile tāta apāra kalu satyi
diasi tāta mote bajra ye śakati | 113 |
ẏehāuṁ tāta muṁ na māgai āna

div.note: sārthuka = sātvika |

rambhāku chāḍiṇa āna māgasi re bābu
ẏebe nicaẏeṁ debiṭi yāhā bāñcchā karibu |(ja, da, ga)

yuga yuge śūrabanta rahi basu sarbakāḷe
kapacadānī karṇṇa boli śubhiba saẏaḷe |(ña, pha)

lg.l: mātaḷi boilā svāmī bhārā anu rūpe
jāṇi parimāṇi tāta dāna debuna sarūpe | 116 |
bichārai bajra śakati muṁ debaiṁ kemante | 117 |
bābu karṇṇa muṁ ye amare adhikārī
karṇṇa boilā tāta kicchihiṁ deite nāhiṁ icchā
mātaḷi boilā svāmī tu kaṣṭhora nakara hāde
amara svargakaiṁ yibā karṇṇaku śahasra bege debe | 121 |
indra sumaraṇā kale bajra ye śakati
chaḍalakṣa yojanuṁ ye bikāśilā śahasrara jyoti | 122 |
digāmbara puruṣamane dekhi mane kale bhīti | 125 |
upara hātha kariṇa ye dileka maghabā

div.note: satyabhagna nicaẏe hoilā sahasākṣā |(jha2, ṭa, jha1)

lg.l: kapaca kuṇḍaḷa ye abheda bajra chauṁrī
gheniṇa suranātha ye puṣyaka rathe bijekari | 128 |
karṇṇa boilā svāmī raha raha debarāja | 129 |
svāmī mote śakati tu dilu satyabādī
deba indra prāẏeka ye na diśilu jambhobhedī | 130 |
yebe śakati nātha tu dilu satyabākye
ẏe thāu tohora hāthe mohora udake | 131 |
indra śuṇi boile bābu ẏe apālaṭaka śara
ẏehāra samāne deba asure karibu prahāra | 133 |
ẏekai beḷeke ye se debaśasra peṣi
digapāḷa hoile se abaśya āsibaṭi bināśi | 134 |
karṇṇa boilā muṁ tāta māgibaiṁ yāhā
sābadhāna hoi hāde śuṇimā deba tāhā | 135 |
mātaḷi boilā deba kalu nice manda

div.note: “karṇṇa boilā svāmī raha raha debarāja” pare bahu pothire pāṭha :–
mohore śakati tu dilu ye saiti
deba indra prāẏe na diśilu surapati |
yebe śakati nātha tu dilu dr̥ḍhabākye
ẏe thāu tohora hāthe mohora diā ke |
itara janaku ẏe śahasra na karibu prahāra |(ja)
āpaṇāra hāte putraku cintilu pramāde |(jha, ṭa, jha)

lg.l: indra boile mātaḷi tu mane na kara bhrānti
karṇṇa ye boilā māribi hari arjuna duhinti | 138 |
tebe se mora mane lāgantā hāde cintā | 139 |
indra boile kr̥ṣṇa lāi śakati yebe karibaṭi bheda
karṇṇakaiṁ sampāda ye bāsaba deba pucchi
bābu trijībī hoithāa muṁ amare yāuacchi | 141 |
śuṇisi karṇṇa boli ye bolanti biḍojā
bābu pāṇḍaba samārjane muṁ kalaiṁ amara tejyā | 142 |
jambu daitara aṇanāti bajra kapacara āpati | 143 |
se jabmu daitaku nāśi mohora nāma jambubhedī | 144 |
se jambu daitara putra bajra ye kapaca
sehi mohora tule hoilā airi pacha | 145 |
tāhāra putra nirbāta kapaca ye bāhilā amare | 146 |
caurāśi beḷa dhāḍi dilā muṁ tāhākaiṁ hārilaiṁ yuddhe | 147 |
triputi bhaji tāku prasanna hoili tahuṁ | 148 |

div.note: pāṇḍabaṁkara pāiṁ mu kalāiṁ dharma tejyā |(ja, ṇa, ṛha, da)
amara svarga bhagnakalā jambu daitara ādhi |(ka, ṇa, tha, ḍha, ṛa)
airi pacha = airi pakṣa |

lg.l: br̥ndāarka meḷe ye basilu amara svarge
toṣe boili arjuna baramāga ẏebe bege | 149 |
arjuna boilā mote yebe prasanna hoilu sahasrākṣa
karṇṇa tahuṁ āṇidebu amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa bajra chauṁrī abheda kapaca | 150 |
athabā kemante bābu na karibi tāhā | 151 |
yebe ho karṇna muhiṁ kahuacchi tote
hari arjuna ẏeka ātā aṭanti ye beni
karṇṇa boilā tāta tu caḷiyāa amare
bacana baṛhāi kopa tu na karāa more | 155 |
abheda kapaca bajra chauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa
kisa kahibi bābu se karṇṇara mahimāṁ
cchidreka na chāḍanti chauranti deha kāṭi | 159 |
karṇṇara beniputra bhāriyā, chāriṁkara yehne satya
koḷagrata kariṇa muṁ basāili puṣyeka ratha | 160 |

div.note: kalyāṇa bāñcchā mote karuthibu manare |(ja, ṇa)
kṣideka na chāḍanti uchuḍanti deha kāṭi |(ṭa, jha, na, ba, cha, ḍha)

lg.l: manuṣya hoiṇa se amara puraku śohai
puṇa karṇṇa na thile ghāratha yuddha ye nohai | 161 |
idaṁ bākya kahai ye amara svargabāsī
bābu ẏeteka dāna mote dilāka sūryyabaḷā
dāna bhārāre mora puṣyeka ratha na caḷilā | 163 |
yahuṁ yāi nuārili muṁ amara bārasvatī
pratigraha kari muṁ dili bajra ye śakati | 164 |
ẏe śahasra gheni prahāra karibi śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna benibīra | 165 |
indra boile śrīkr̥ṣṇa ẏe anibāraṇa śatedhārā śakati
tāhā yebe bañchāi pāribuṭi bhārtha yuddhe
śrīkr̥ṣṇāẏe boile parimāṇi bujha he śrībaccha
ẏe śatadhārā śakatiki hāde ghaṭautkaṭa baḷibhakṣa | 168 |
indra boile mā go tu yāhāra kuḷabadhū
ubhaẏa kuḷa maṇḍaṇi mahimāṁ tora sādhu | 169 |
muhiṁ svargakaiṁ yāuacchi mote āgyāṁ debā he śrībatse | 170 |
indra debatā śrīkr̥ṣṇāṁku puṣyeka rathare basāi
śaṅkha śveta uttara ye birāṭa putra tini
tuleṇa hāde matsādhipa sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni | 176 |
muhiṁ dvārikāẏe yibi mote āgyām debā debadharme | 182 |
bana durgame kaṣṭa muṁ sahili bahuta | 183 |
mohore sadaẏā ye na kale dhr̥tirāṣṭe
mahata kuḷe jāta hoiṇa muṁ pāili bahuta kaṣṭe | 184 |
nillaja ātmā mohora ẏebe acchi rahi | 185 |
arjunara kaṣṭa dekhili ẏebe muhiṁ karibaiṁ kisa
nakuḷa kumāra guṇa tu jānu bāsudebe
ẏebe nija rājyare ye prabeśa hoilu āsi
sahadebara baḍa abasthā ẏebe śuṇa ruṣīkeśi | 188 |
gokuḷare thāi bahuta abasthā se pāi | 189 |
apāra apāra kathā se kahante na sarai
rājakuḷe jāta hoi ẏehāta sahi nuārai | 190 |
ẏeḍe baḍa durgame kaṣṭa pāilāi karme
ẏebe kesaneke rājya se na chāḍai dharme | 191 |
mohora bole hastināku yibu jagannātha tuhi
pañchagrāma dileta kopa nāhiṁ mohora tāhāku | 193 |
se yebe sahodara mohora hāde hoi
bhāinta gheni muṁ thāi kinā sannidhare
bāsudebe boile svāmī muṁ hoibi ki dūte
pañchugrāma na dile muṁ karibi kemante | 196 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile se chārigrāma na dile
muṁ kemanta karibi śrī bāsudebe kahile | 198 |
teteka pāiṇa muṁ ye poṣai piṇḍaprāṇa
tu tathāpi bhiāi āsibu yebe grāmagoṭi
yadyapi mote se na deba ẏeka grāma
nicaẏe tāhāra mohora ye hoiba sāṁgrāma | 202 |
yujheṣṭhi boile hari tote ye aṇāilu
hari, svarga marttya pātāḷa rāsāntaḷa sutaḷa bhūtaḷa
brahmāṇḍa bhmabanuṁ ye baikuṇṭha bhmabana pariyante
ẏekādaśa loke hari āśre karithānti tote | 207 |
hari dukhī janara bandhu anāsta janara cintā
samasta bhmabana hari tote se āśrita deba
sadaẏe jagabhūta nātha saẏaḷa jana cintā | 210 |
muhiṁ ye anāsta tuhi anāstara nātha
pr̥thibā meru āśre mahata āśre mānabā | 212 |
aguṇa guṇa āśre jaḷa āśre kr̥ṣi
ātmā anna āśre graha āśre rāśi | 213 |
prāṇa āśre piṇḍa kaḷi āśre dvanda
paṇḍita dharma āśre mahata āśre bibudha | 214 |
svāmī āśre stirī vidyā āśre dhāpa
mahī jaḷa āśre mr̥tu āśre pāpa | 215 |
tapī āsana āśre yoga āśre śūnya
pāṇḍabe viṣṇu āśre śubhai tini bhmabana | 216 |
bipattye āśre mote aṭai ghora kandara bana
śrīkr̥ṣṇa āśre kari sarbadā dina yāu | 219 |
aśr̥jaḷa beni locanu bahai ye hāde | 220 |
śrīhari boile svāmī muṁ to dāsara dāsa bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya
yujheṣṭhi debahuṁ citta āne nāhiṁ bicaḷita | 222 |
yahiṁki āgyāṁ mote debāka deba dharme
svāmī sarbadā satya dharmeṇa bratanti yebaṇa jane
jana bodhane yehu madhura bākya bhāṣi
satya na laṁghi ye pareṇa na prābhabasi | 225 |
sarūpa bāike ye na luchānti karṇṇa cihna | 226 |

div.note: mahījaḷa āśre maruta aśre tāpa |

yujheṣṭhihuṁ kiñchite āne na baḷai mora citta |
yujheṣṭhiṁka bākya mote aṭe alaṁghita |(ja, ṇa)
bāike–bākye |

lg.l: bipatti kāḷe yebaṇa loke karma kari gheni
kr̥ṣi āśre kari ye añchanti medinī | 227 |
ẏekāstirī prasaṅge ye ẏeka bāika bhāṣi
athabā paṇḍita heu ki mūrkhahiṁ heu kaṭhora bākya na bhāṣi | 228 |
ye yete mānaku yogya upugāri annadātā | 229 |
paramāde na paśi ye para dukhe dukhī
ẏete bāge ye bratai gobinda tāra bhr̥tya | 233 |
bahuta purasari nārāẏaṇa yujheṣṭhi debaṁku pucchi
yahiṁki peṣibu nātha tahiṁki yibi āna nāhiṁ kicchi | 234 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile hari hastināku yiba
hari paṇḍu dhr̥tirāṣṭa ye sodara aṭanti beni
tāhāṁkara putra hoi āmbhe houchuṁ anyoanyi | 236 |
ubhaẏa kuḷa bibāda tu rakṣā kara nārāẏaṇe
tu ẏehā bichāri ye bujha mahātamā | 239 |
kāhāri bola na śuṇilā gāndhārī tanaẏe | 240 |
romake brahmāṇḍa kari nātha bhiāiacha debahari | 241 |
bhāba upujāi māga paḍā ye khaṇḍiẏe | 243 |
paḍā khaṇḍiẏe deu bhāinta gheni koṇake thāi paḍi | 244 |
hari tohora sañchilā ye ẏehu mahībhārā
āho caitana uṭhiṇa benikara dhaileka debarājā
dadhibābana sumari bahane śubhayoge caḷi yā yā | 248 |
dharma āśre heu hari tote mohora ye bāñcchā
apāda khaṇḍaṇi sarbamaṅgaḷā karantu tote rakṣā | 249 |
apāda khaṇḍaṇa karāntu debī sarba ye maṅgaḷe | 250 |
duṣṭabaḷa dhvaṁsinī ye caraṇa taḷe sebi | 251 |
tumbhanta binaẏa mora pañchabhūta pañcha ātame
durāntaka baḷa dhvaṁsinī go kautuka sāṁgrāme | 252 |

div.note:
- pañchu kaṭake se aṭai adhikārī
grāmeka deu mote thibi muṁ dhr̥tirāṣṭaṁku sebākari |(ja, ṇa)

lg.l: prasanne bara deu go sarba ye maṅgaḷā | 253 |
lohita badanī go taruṇa sūryya jyoti
māgo sabhāẏe śrīhari uttara karibe yetebeḷe
mānagobindara kaṇṭhe bije karibu sarba ye maṅgaḷe | 255 |
amr̥ta dr̥ṣṭi kari diasi mukati gati | 256 |
śaraṇa uddhāraṇī go deu tu ruddhi siddhi | 257 |
raṇa madhye paśante go rakṣākaru nārāẏaṇī
bana madhye paśante go rakṣākaru rudrāẏaṇī | 258 |
sarba sthāne rakhu tu māẏe sarba ye maṅgaḷe | 259 |
ghagata jana macchaḷī go jaṅkhera pura bāsī
ẏe tohora nirādhāra bacane muṁ aṭai adhikārī | 1 |
tohora āgyāṁẏe kari muṁ yibaiṁ hastināku
paḍā khaṇḍiẏe māgibi yāi mānagobinda rājāku | 2 |
kisa boli uttara muṁ karibi yugati | 3 |
ābara biśeṣe hari tu aṭu madhyapātre | 4 |
pāpa se ācari ki dharma parityāgī | 5 |
athabā māgante mote na deba ẏeka grāma
sodarimā paṇa kale kāryya nohai ye siddha | 7 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ye nirāśa karai tote
chāḍilāiṁ oprodha mora sodara ki nimante | 8 |
ẏe mohora satya satya tinibāra satyabākya ẏe
tote tirāśe yebe na karai sāṁgrāma
nicaẏe satya laṁghili mote aprāpata hou dharma | 10 |
tada doṣa labhaiṁ muṁ sākṣī karai tote | 11 |

div.note: nicaẏe mohora ye mahābhāratha sāṁgrāma |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: kaurobaṁka tule yebe sāṁgrāma na karai
nirañjana debatā thāḷare biṣa muṁ bharai | 12 |
pitr̥ loke tarpaṇa ye karai catrapāṇi | 13 |
hr̥dagate dāmodara ye pāile baḍa lāja | 14 |
śaṅkha dhuni śabada kariṇa deba māẏādhara
āho brikodara yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara āgyāṁ paramāṇe
tu ye pāṇḍaba kuḷaku sohoḍa baḷabantā
tote na bichāri kemanta karibā gamitā | 19 |
svāmī yujheṣṭhiṁka carita tu jāṇunā yugate
aṭhāśi sahasra ruṣiṁki bhojana dianti nitye | 21 |

adauḍire bandhana ẏe saṁsārara māẏā
jaḷabimba parāẏeka manuṣyara kāẏā |(cha, ṭha)

lg.l: srāhāne prāpata kara mote maṇikarṇṇikā sara
śrīddhe piṇḍa prāṇe pradāna mote kara | 38 |
ābara prāpata mote hoiba ẏekādaśī brata
svāmī janma hoileta abaśya tuṭai kāẏe
prāga tribeṇī tīrtha mote prāpata karibā debarāẏe | 41 |
samasta māgilu bidura na māgilu āna kāhā | 42 |
sābadhāna hoibā svāmī muhiṁ yāhā māgi | 43 |
svāmī ābara kathāẏe tote ye māgai daẏānidhi
bipuḷa lakṣmī hoiba nathiba roga byādhi | 44 |}
svāmī diridrapada na māgilu krodha hiṁsā
pareṇa prābhaba na māgili pāpa ye manīṣā | 45 |
para strā paradhana parabr̥tti na haribi
taba caraṇe hari janme janme anubrate sebithibi | 46 |
bideśe janma mr̥tyu mote na karāa nārāẏaṇa
debatā hoi athabā hou ki brāhmaṇa | 47 |
yebaṇa kuḷe mote jāta pache kara

div.note: śrāddhe prāpata mote prāgatīrthe kara |(gha, ka, ṛa, ba, tha)
iśanda pada na māgili trodha hiṁsā |(jha, ṭa, ja, dha)
kaśa nadīṭhāru nīḷācaḷa pariyante |(ña, tha, pa)

lg.l: daridre jāta deba na karāa mukuhiṁ
taba caraṇe sebā mora thāu sadā debarāja | 52 |
abhāba jana tule mote na karāa goṣṭhi
hatyā bibādaku na yiba mohora dr̥ṣṭi | 53 |
ānakuḷe jāta mote na karibu jagannātha
asura bhoga tīrthe na karāa prāpata | 54 |
kete ye ghañchāḷa tote karibi debahari
taba nāmagoṭi mama hr̥de thāu aharniśi | 56 |
svāmī jagannātha bhagate bidura tote māgilāka yāhā
muhiṁ tohora dāsara dāsa hāde icchai deba tāhā | 57 |
mūrkha apaṇḍita muṁ na jāṇaiṁ kicchi
anugraha kari nātha bhagate bara bāñchi | 58 |
muhiṁta na jāṇai keuṇasi janme tote sebi | 59 |
ẏe saṁsāra janakaiṁ nātha prāpata kara tāhā | 60 |
śrī udiyoga paboṅg ẏe bhāratha sāra khaṇḍa
svāmī āpaṇe karatā tu kahile mārakaṇḍa | 62 |
agasti mahāmuni kahile yebaṇa se bāṇī
muhiṁ tāhā bañchāili śrabaṇa pathe āṇi | 63 |
sarba dvaba teji nare nārāẏaṇe kara sebā
śūdramuni sāroḷāda saku taba bhmabana deba | 64 | 1238 |
kiñchita bhagate bidura bahuta ye kalā bāñcchā | 1 |
athabā kisa bākya upujilā tahiṁ āne | 2 |
jagu jābana nātha dhūruṁ kale dr̥ṣṭi
kointāṁku dekhi deba āsana teji uṭhi | 6 |
binaẏa bhābeṇa keśaba kr̥ta ye āñjoḷi
bho keśaba dekha ye mohora abasthā | 8 |
bābu parama sādhaboṅg se aṭai gāndhārī
hari tāhāra nandana dekha kuñjagaḷa deśara rājā
amarādhi nātha prāẏe madhyasvarge pāuacchi japū | 12 |
svāmī dr̥bhāsāṁka prasāde muṁ pāili japāmāḷī
dutīkr̥ṣṇa nāma dilu tuhi tāku koḷe gheni | 15 |
prtakṣe kumāra mukhe ākāśe acchi pāṭa | 16 |
kāḷe putra hoile ṣaṇa{?}tiḷā br̥kṣa prāẏe | 17 |
siṁghe upuji putre śrīkāḷe boile gaṇi
bhikṣā māgi bratile chācaka brata jāṇi | 18 |
hari cchidra kunta paḍi māẏeṁsa mora cchiḍu
deha mohora saḍhu ye peṭahiṁ mora poḍu | 19 |
hari ẏeteka dukhe ye bratanti pañchu jaṇe
bhikṣā māgi bratanti na thānti mohora sannidhāne | 20 |
cihnabarṇṇa na pāili achanti ṭiki brati | 22 |
hari aputrika lakṣaṇa daiba morata kalā
putraṁka kaṣṭe kiṁpe mo prāṇa na galā | 23 |

div.note:
svamī ẏeheneka sulakṣaṇa putra kali jāẏe
kāḷe putra hoile niṣphaḷa prāẏeta |(ṭa, jha)
cchidra karata paḍi śarīra mora cchiḍu (pa, ḍha, pha, ña)
trodhī pāpī muṁ māṁsa mora cchiḍu |

gahana araṇye ye kandamūḷa bhakṣanti |
ādhāra nimante ki daite bhakṣile sabunti |(ka)
chācaka–chātaka | 22|2 brati–bartti

lg.l: ẏete boli bhūmigate paḍile debī loṭi
bābu keśaba keṇe gale mohora andhara lauḍi goṭi | 24 |
gobinde boile mā go trodha chāḍa kointe
putra tohora go sebile ghora bane
mā go nirbāta kapaca boli dhūmra locanara paṇanāti
tiniyuga pariyante se ākāśuṁ paḷāile surapati | 30 |
mā go caurāśi beḷa dhāḍi dilā amara svarge
aḷakā jūra kalā se bāsabara rāge | 31 |
bidure boile svāmī se nirbāta kapaca
ki nimnte airi tā hoile sahasrākṣa | 32 |
gobinde boile bidure maẏeṁṣāsura badha kāḷe
jambu daita boli tāhāra nija putra
se manthana kalāka ye ākāśe debanta | 34 |

div.note: dharma na laṁghile se paśile gahana araṇye |(gha, ka, ba, cha)
apati = apatya, putra |

lg.l: jambu daitara putra bajra kapaca boli
sehi amara svarga nirodhilā hade peli | 36 |
indra nāśa karāileṭi tāhāku nārāẏāṇa hāthe
pitr̥ pitāmaha rāgeṇa śatr̥ paṇa kari
amara svargakaiṁ dilā caurāśi beḷa dhāḍi | 38 |
candra sūryya sahite tetiśa koṭi debatānta jiṇilā sabunti | 39 |
pañchabiṁśa kāṭhi saini tulare tāra thilā
dibā rātre tāhā arjuna badha kalā | 41 |
tāhāra putra hiraṇya kapaca ye bīra
digambara beśa dhari yujheṣṭhiṁki harinelā asura | 42 |
puṇa samara kari badha kalā tāhā bīra pātha
mā go driyodhana rājākaiṁ se neuthilā bandīkari
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya ye paḷāile apasari | 44 |
mā go ẏeheneka mahimāṁ go tohora putragoṭi
driyodhana pāiṁ amare bibāda kalāṭi kirīṭī | 46 |

div.note: indra nāśakalā tāku nārāẏaṇa śahasre |(dha, ḍha, ḍa, pha, ta, ña)
digambara = jaina sanyāsī = eṭhāre sanyāsī |

lg.l: gaṅgā srāhāne meruśūḷa dropatīṁka hari neuthilā
mā go dropatīṁki jadyaratha hari neuthilā banuṁ
aneka abastā mā go tāhākaiṁ dilā tora tanu | 49 |
kapāḷe lihile ẏe pāṇḍabaṁka nija dāsa | 51 |
kisa pratagyaṁ kahibi to bhīmāra mahimāṁ | 52 |
mā go birāṭa rājye agyāṁte thile gopye
brāgha māla māilā bhīma na jāṇile sarūpe | 54 |
mā go śatesiṁghara prātrama se kīcaka birāṭara śaḷā
kirāta trigartta beni rājāra dapa nāśi
mā go godhana haraṇe ye gale matsadeśaku kaurobe
ẏekā arjunake mā go dhaṁsilā sarba tāhā | 58 |
mā go samudra laharī jāṇi paḍile sarbe mahīloṭi
para kāryya boli pārtha na kāṭilā śiragoṭi | 59 |
mā go yujheṣṭhi debe ye pratakṣa mahātamā
yama kāḷadaṇḍa bhāñji kāḷebara nāma gadā bahai tora bhīmā | 60 |

div.note: byāghra māla māilā bhīma bāhmaṇa sarūpe |(ba, jha)

lg.l: mā go koṭi siṁghara baḷa yebaṇa baḷarāma
sohodrā haraṇe arjuna tāhānta jiṇilā sāṁgrāma | 61 |
mā go arjunara mahimāṁ mote agocara hāde
indra debatākaiṁ jiṇilā khāṇḍaba bana dahilā
mā gā suganddhikā haraṇe hanumantara bibāde
śare śare sāgara se bānddhale setubandhe | 65 |
mā go dhanuhuḷe basāile se sapata brahmāṇḍa
mā go pañchāḷa deśara kathā jāṇunā pratakṣye
mā go nirañjane prabodhi baikuṇṭha bhmabanakaiṁ galā
mā go pāṇḍabāsuraku māri driyodhana śate bhāiṁku tāri
teṇu se pāṇḍaba nāma bahileka dr̥ḍhakari | 69 |
mā go birāṭa rājye poẏe tora abiṣeka sāri
mā go svāmīṁkara āgyāṁẏe muṁ aili ẏete begi
māgo ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍa mohora garbhagata
tohora putra mahimāṁ dekha muṁ tāhāṁkara dūta | 73 |

div.note: abanīḷe = abalīḷe |
mā go ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍa mohora bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya |(ka, ṇa, ja, na)

lg.l: mā go dekhasi mahimāṁ ẏekā udiyoga paboṅgra ante
mahābhārata yuddha ante ẏekāṅga sampada muṁ sarba debi tote | 74 |
tu se mahata sādhabī go anādi aparṇṇā
ẏe nabadīpa sapata sāgarakaiṁ tuhi se śiromaṇi sinā | 75 |
saṁsāra jana hite hoilu baḍa dukhī
ẏebe se niścaẏe go hoibu sarba sukhī | 76 |
māgibi pañchu rājya muṁ pīrati binaẏe | 77 |
pañchu grāma mote yebe diai yugate
mā go yebe pañchu grāma mote na deba kurupati
bidure boile ho yujheṣṭhi manda kalā
svāmī kurusabhāre yeteka basanti samastaheṁ mahāmanda
karkaśa madhupiṅgaḷa se aṭai rājā māna ye gobinda | 81 |
driyodhana pathara ghare bhari nāśakalā gandhārasenara baṁśa | 82 |
svāmī, dochārī bhāriyā ye ripubanta mantrī
ẏete lokanta biśvāsa kale āṣya hoi hata | 84 |
baṁśa nāśa yiba ẏekā śakuni mantrīpaṇe
ẏeheneka sabhaku kimpe madhyapātra helu nārāẏaṇe | 85 |
taskara sabhāre ki purāṇike hāde bari
asura sabhāre kāhiṁ bandanā kare hari | 86 |
badhīre śuṇāiba ki kambu śabada bāṇī | 87 |
svāmī chāṇḍāḷa sabhāre ki pheḍiba grantha pothi
sañchaẏe keśaba tu pāibu baḍa lāja | 89 |
tu yāuachu driyodhanara sampada haribā nimante | 91 |
gobinde boile bidura tu ẏe manta kimpe kahu
se dharma ṭhākuraṁkara muṁ aṭai baśyābr̥tti
athabā deu ki na deu mora yibāra yugati | 93 |
mote nirāśa kale tohora bākya sata | 94 |
yujheṣṭhi debe abā kale daẏā hr̥de
āho bidūra dropatīra abhimāna sahita ke pāri
kāhāra beḷe tāhāra bākya āna kari | 96 |
kointāẏe boile bābu yete kaṣṭa dile
kṣatrīkuḷe jāta hoi sahiba kāhāra beḷe | 97 |
kebaḷa putre mohora śrīkāḷe janma honti

div.note: naśanta bāḷaku prāṇīṁki biparīta buddhi sphuri |(ṭa, jha,)
śrakāḷa = śr̥gāḷa |

lg.l: kointāẏe boile hari tu yebe āmbhara sahodra yugate
tu yebe gobinda samara na karāu
tohora chāmure hari muṁ paśibi jui jāḷī | 101 |
āsthāna teji uṭhilā se kuñjagaḷa rāẏe | 106 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni puṣkara yāhāra caraṇe thiti
se jaḷa abhiṣeka pāilā dhr̥tirāṣṭa mahāyati | 109 |
kisa dei tote triputi karibi janārddana | 110 |
amūlya ratna dei karanti abā pūjā
gīta gāẏana kari abā karanti triputi
nr̥tya ārambha kari aba rañjanti tora mana
cauṣathi koti apākṣarānta gheni yāhākaiṁ khaṭanti maghabāna | 113 |
daśa sahasra barṣe tu na ghenu bhagati | 114 |
bidure boile tāta kahilu ta huḍi
bhagata jana matsaḷa ẏe śrījagannātha nāmagoṭi
yāhāra draśane andha paṭaḷa yāi phaṭi | 116 |
śuṇa ho dhatirāṣṭe ẏehi janamara kathā
ābara avatāra kahibākaiṁ muhiṁ kisa śakatā | 117 |
karabīra bolikari baitaraṇī tīre ẏekai nagara | 118 |
lakṣe aśi sahasra ghara sehu nagre basai
jāti andha brāhmaṇa janmeṇa daridra aṭe sehi
śāsana īśāna bhāga goṭikare thāi rahi | 120 |
ẏekā grāmake se māgai mahata bhikṣā | 122 |
ẏeka grāmahuṁ se āna grāmaku na yāi | 123 |

div.note: saṅgitā bhārijā yāhāra aṭanti sarasvatī |(jha, ṭa, ba)
māṇeka pāi ki adhaḍhāẏe pāi |(jha, gha, ḍha)
(adhaḍhā = adha aḍhā) samaẏeka grāmake se māgai mahata bhikṣā |(ka, ḍa, cha, ṅa, tha, ña, gha, ḍha)

lg.l: adabhmate utapa ta hoilā se grāmeṇa | 124 |
sehi grāmaku brāhmaṇī ye bhikṣā māgi galā
pāṭa patanī neti ye acchi paḍi
jana manuṣya na dekhi se bāhuḍi ailā | 129 |
daridra abā hoilā se sata chāḍināhiṁ puṇi | 130 |
brāhmaṇa boilā āja kimpe bimohita mana
brāhmaṇi boilā paṇḍāẏe bidhātāra ẏeheneka kr̥tya
jāti andha janma daridra bratai bhikṣāpātra | 133 |
tahiṁki kaṣaṇa bidhātā āṇi hāde kalā
paṇḍāẏe ābara jībane ye priẏojana kisa
athabā anaḷa jāḷi tiniheṁ debā jhāsa | 135 |

div.note:
pāṭa patanī ābara neta ye supāti
pabana ghāteṇa ẏemāne uḍuṇa achanti |(jha, ṭa, ka)
subāṭuḷa taṇḍuḷa śrījagannāthaṁku lāgi |(ṇa, ja, ṭa, ba, ka, jha, gha, ḍha)

lg.l: stirī hoi bhrāthāku poṣite na yogāi | 136 |
brāhmaṇa boilā dvārikā bhmabanaku bāṭa jāṇu kire sahi
viṣṇura bhmabane hāde daridra nāhiṁ kehi | 137 |
tuṇḍa thile laṁkā bhmabana tu bhale yāipāri | 138 |
pia goṭiki kākhare basāi kari āṇi | 139 |
bhika māgiṇa yāi rahanti biśrāmi ẏeka grāma
yebaṇa ghare ye bhikṣā māgai brāhmaṇī
ẏe bidhire brāhmaṇa ye abadeka rahilā
aneka ratna pāiṇa se nicinta hoilā | 144 |
āho caitana phālaguna māsa śukaḷapakṣa ẏekādaśī
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa āẏūṣmān nāme yoga
se andha brāhmaṇa putragoṭi kheḷai tāhāṁkara tule
reṇu gharagoṭi bhāṅgilā tāhāra pradyumnara hāboḍile | 148 |
dhūḷi muṭhāẏe dhari andhara pua rāge
andhapua padmanaku boilā āre āre gauḍa
kiṁpāi re manda mora bhāñjilu dhūḷighara kheḍa | 150 |
aneka yatane muṁ thilāiṁ tāhā toḷi
puṇi padmanaku māilā ye añjuḷāẏe dhūḷi | 151 |
dhūḷighara sinā bhāñjile he toḷita huai | 152 |
aṅguṣṭhi cihna diśilā yaṣṭi prahāra prāẏe | 154 |
kāndi se padmana ye galā nija pure
bho deba andhara puagoṭi mote chāpuḍe prahāri | 156 |
baikule se kāndi kahilā yahuṁ pitāṁkara āge
yahiṁ se bhāba tahiṁ lāgai ati moha
andhapua kāhiṁ acchi bege mote kaha | 159 |
anāsta prāẏe hoi ye kānducchi mohora putragoṭi
bābu bābu boli uccasvare rāba kari
āsai padana ye śrījaganāthaṁkara hātha dhari | 161 |
andhapua paḷāi yāi kahiā pitāra agrate
bho pitā andha tu rakṣākara mote | 162 |
āsare andhara lauḍi tu doṣakalu kāhāku
bho pitā na jāṇi māili bāsudeba putra padmana kumaraku | 163 |
andha boilā baḷāre padmana nārāẏaṇaṁkara batsā
sañchaẏe nāśagalu āre putra āu nāhiṁ rakṣā | 164 |
andhapua boilā tāta muṁ paḷāibi kāhiṁki
paḷāi kāhiṁ paśibu se tu agyāna duṣṭaputra | 166 |
dūruṁ andhaputra ye gobinda mukha dekhi
andhaputra boilā tāta kr̥ṣṇara baḍa kopa
andha boilā bābu tuhi lucithāa mohora pachakati
aneka bāge kopa ye karāibi śānti | 169 |
catre śira chedile yibā baikuṇṭha ṭhāba | 170 |
bacane sāṣṭāma andha ye karāi puaku
padmana bheṭāilā nei, ẏehi andhapua māilā deba muku| | 171 |
āho caitana bāmabhmaje padmana ḍāhāṇa bhmaje catra dhari
gobinde boile andha tu rahilu kāhuṁ āsi
tohora putra mohora putrakaiṁ māilā jhiṁghāsi | 173 |
aho dhr̥tirāṣṭā andha boilā svāmī muṁ aṭai nirimākhī
jātahuṁ andha daridra janmeṇa baḍa dukhī | 175 |
muhiṁ tohora dāsara dāsa bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya
mohora putra chāra padmana kumaraku māriba ẏehā kariacha sata | 176 |
tohora putragoṭi chāpoḍe māriacchi sañchā dekhasi re andha
śa tajanmara andhapaṭaḷa galā tāra phiṭi | 178 |
boilā svāmī jagannātha tu bije kariachu | 179 |
bho svāmī śatajanmara sukr̥te tote dekhilaiṁ beniḍoḷe | 181 |
se andha brāhmaṇaṁku deba prasanna hoile
bārasvatī bhmabana jāṇi rahilā andha ye brāhmaṇa
bidure boile śuṇa ho dhr̥tirāṣṭa ye bāsudebara mahimāṁ goṭi
ẏe bāsudebara prasāde śatejanmara andhapaṭaḷa galā piṭi | 184 |
ẏehi jagannātha tāhāra caraṇa taḷe loṭi | 185 |
tu tāhāra piara hoi andha benicachu
hr̥dagate kapaṭa rakhi tu sebā karuchu | 186 |
nikaḷaṁka citte yebe sebā karantu bhrātha
dharma artha kāma mokṣa samasta acchi ẏetha | 187 |
śrījagannātha smara nare tara saṁsāra kaṣṭu
śrījagannātha sumara nare phiṭu ho durgati
śrījagannātha sumara nare yama kāḷadaṇḍare nohu śāsti | 189 |
śrījagannātha sumara nare prasara heu buddhi
śrījagannātha sumara nare prāpata heu ruddhisiddhi | 190 |
śrījagannātha sumara nare suputra hou jāta | 191 |
śrījagannātha sumara nare tuṭu sarba roga
śrījagannātha sumara nare prāpata hou svarga | 192 |
śrījagannātha sumara nare prāpata hou bhāgya | 193 |
yamanika tīrtha nīḷa kalpabaṭa baikuṇṭhapura bhedi | 195 |
mahata aṭai se ye nīḷasundara giri
tahiṁra drochanā lāgai brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa chāri | 196 |
chārilakṣa batiśa sahasra baraṣa aṭe kaḷi

div.note: dharma artha kāma mokṣa tu pābantu samasta |(ja, ṇa)
dharma artha kāma mokṣa diai ẏehi jagannātha |(pha, ña)
dochanā = jyotsna |

lg.l: gupata gaṅgā yamunā ye bahai sarasvatī
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni bijaẏe puṣkara baśyā br̥tti | 199 |
dhabaḷa nīḷa ye kuṁkuma barṇṇa tini
aneka mahimāṁ tohora kahite ke kṣama
sakaḷa janture śreṣṭha mānaba rūpa barṇṇa
jagu jībana nātha caraṇe bhr̥tyaṁkara bhr̥tya
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa śata sahasra daṇḍa praḷambita | 205 | 2443 |
śuṇate dharma artha kāma mokṣa prāptahoi sarba
dudha madhu śākara miśrita pibante yehne rasa
dhr̥tarṣṭe boile sādhu sādhu to mahimāṁ | 3 |
muhiṁ hāde jagannāthaṁku sarbadā hoithāi bhagati
ẏete paṇḍita nāme bichāri jāṇe saṅgati sarba
anugraha nātha se jāṇai sarba svāmī | 6 |
ke tāhā laẏe kari maṇāiba jana | 7 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile tu sarba sodara hari
chatrīkuḷe janma hoi bhikṣā kale dīkṣā | 11 |
bhikṣā māgi bañchile se dhr̥tirāṣṭa putra boli | 12 |
ẏehā tu bichāra nakaru kiṁpāiṁ kururāja
mohora bichāre tote hoi baḍa lāja | 13 |
yahiṁ se janami tahiṁ se ye bhrami
sabyahou ki asabya hou yāhāra yauṁ bhūmi | 15 |

div.note: koṭiẏe mahimāṁ yāhāra praḷaẏa ante sthāna |(jha, ṭa)
ke tāhā ẏekata kari kahibu bārttamāna |(jha, ṭa)
ke tāhā laẏa karibāku hoiba bhārajana |(pha, ña)
kathopi–kathopa–kathāra upatrama |(ārambha) kale |
śrībāsudeba ye kahanti sañchapi |(ṇa, ja)
kṣatrīkuḷe jātahoi kale pātra dīkṣā |(ja, dha, ḍha)

lg.l: apāra antara kathā hoiba ki prīti | 21 |
gobinde boile tāta se nathānti sannidhāne
dūreheṁ thāiṇa se bāse karanti pañchu jane | 22 |
araṇye thile puṇa tāhāṁkara tote cintā
tuhi se hoilu tāhāṁkara īśvara debatā | 23 |
bhāgyabanta puruṣe yehne īśvare na dekhile
pāṇḍabe na bratanti tehne tote ārdhanā na kale | 24 |
paḍā pāñchakhaṇḍa hāde debu ye tāhāṁkui | 25 |
lakṣe yojanare tuhi se aṭu adhikārī
kiñchita kari paḍā pāñchakhaṇḍi dia se koṇake thāntu paḍi | 26 |
ẏe tohora bichāra ki yujheṣṭhi boilā tote | 27 |
tu yebe bichāra ẏehā kalu ho debarāẏe
sehi bāge thibe se paṇḍura pāñchapoẏe | 28 |
śānti prāẏe kari kaha driyodhanara āgara | 30 |
hari tohora madhyasthapaṇe muhiṁ nistarili nistarili
yadi ohokuḷa āsi achuni kri rakṣā
yadi tora somabaṁśa udita karibāku bāñcchā | 33 |
baḍa grāma māgile hari upujibaṭi aprīti | 34 |
tuhita jagatamohana svāmī saṁsārahiṁ pāru bhaṇḍi
hari ābara kathāẏe tote muṁ kahai binaẏa bhābe
sabhāre paḍā duikhaṇḍi āho māga ho bāsudebe | 36 |
paḍā benikhaṇḍa pāile kari pārinā sarba buddhi
puṇi abandeka paḍāẏe māgu kinā gobindi | 37 |
gobinde boile māgo tu tini bhmabanaku anādi aparṇṇā
ẏe tohora āgyāṁ mote pāṣāṇa gāra simā | 38 |
gāndhārī boile tu śuṇa guṇasāgara debarāja
gāndhārī dhūtirāṣṭa ye binoẏī bāsudebaṁka paẏare
tu ẏehā samārjanā karibu nā ẏetebeḷe | 42 |
bhīṣma droṇa bhūrisarba śalya bāl hīka mahārathī | 44 |
rājya samārjai bhūta bhabiṣya pothi gheni | 46 |
śatepadma mukuṭa bandhā yoddhā achanti paṭoārī
bihaḍanti rāute ye pabanuṁ bega teji | 48 |
sura indra prāẏeka rājā bijaẏe pratakṣe | 50 |
ḍhola ṭamaka damālu niśāṇa mahurī nāde
ẏeteka bādya ye bājanti samasta bherī bādye | 53 |
damā dundubhi mahurī kahāḷī bājai lakṣachāri | 54 |
dr̥bhāsāṁka mantre jāta durnāma aṭanti sabhiheṁ | 58 |
kareṇa gadā mudugara śakti kunta jāṭhi kāti
śirare lambhita jūḍā ye trikaccha basana
śuddha jhaḷita hīrā daśanaha jyoti bikāśi
kośaka antare kaurabaṁku svāmī diśile śrībatse | 69 |
bāraṇa upare thāi ye dekhilā dhuśāsana
āstāne thāiṇa ye dekhilā rājā dhr̥tirāṣṭi
bhīṣme boile āja āmbhara jībana baḍa dhanya dhanya
ẏe dvāparayuga lokaṁka jībana dhani dhani
śatr̥ hou ki abā mitra puṇa hou
śarīra bisarjibā nārāẏaṇa mukha chāhuṁ chāhuṁ | 74 |
sādhu ẏe pāṇḍabaṅka kuḷa dhani dhani
sādhu ẏe somabaṁśa āja kauroba saini | 75 |
śatr̥paṇa kari āmbhe dekhu achuṁ tāhāṁku | 76 |
ẏe puṇa āmbhara jībana dhanya dhanya
catra māri śira cchedai ki janārddana | 77 |
śarīra teje ye nārāẏaṇaṁka mukha chāhiṁ
gaṅgāgaẏā ādi tīrtha kale kisa hoi ? | 78 |
kauroba sabhāre ye suphāḷa jībana āja
muṁ ẏehā bujhai pāṇḍabaṁka dūta prāẏe | 80 |
droṇe boile ẏehā kahita ki pāri
anādi puruṣa nātha ẏe kāhāra dūtakārī | 81 |
sabya ki asabya kathā bujhibā ẏehikṣaṇa | 82 |
śakuni boile ẏe manda mahākhuḍara putra

div.note: satya ki asatya bujhibā ẏehikṣaṇa |(ṇa, na)
śubha ki aśubha bujhibā ẏehikṣaṇa |(ka, gha)

lg.l: gohatyā stirīhatyā acchi ẏehāra śarīreṇa basi | 85 |
śarīra kampai āmbhara taba bola śuṇi | 86 |
ye yisa pātaka karithāi janme janme
śakuni boilā tumbhe śuṇa guru droṇa
gohatyā doṣa mohora tahuṁ sābadhāne śuṇa | 89 |
someka nāme īśvara basai haṭakeśvara svarge | 90 |
puṇyatoẏā tīrtharu se kuśa biḍiẏe kāṭi | 92 |
gomātā kapiḷā tāhā bhakṣilā ādhāra kari | 93 |
se rudra dhūrjaṭi ye dhāiṁle ati bege

div.note: viṣṇuprabhā bolikari ẏekai satyayuge |(ṇa, gha, jha, ña, ta, ṭa)
somoka nāme īśvara basai kapiḷāsa svarge |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: tahuṁ bhairoba rūpa se hoile pracaṇḍa
śakuni ẏehā kahilā ye kauroba sabhāra
īśvara debatāṁka gohatyā doṣa nagalāka pāra | 99 |
tāṁkahuṁ śreṣṭha ki nanda gauḍa pua kānha
gohatyā stirīhatyā doṣa achaiṭi ẏehā aṁge
ẏe rājasabhāre basiba se kebaṇa ye bāge | 101 |
aneka ye tahiṁ yoddhā pūrita gahana | 105 |
beḷa udaẏe āsi hoilā daṇḍa chāri | 106 |
kāhākaiṁ bāchā na śubhai sabhāra gahaḷe | 107 |
pāñcha pābaccha pariyante keśaba gale uṭhi | 108 |
sabhāra taḷe bije kale deba śirīpati | 109 |
yebaṇa sabhāẏe hāde nārāẏaṇe na bari
nicaẏe jāṇimā se sabhā pichāśa sabhā sari | 110 |
tāhāra nandinī nāma ye aṭai rukmiṇī
saẏambara kalā se lakṣe rājānta bariāṇi | 112 |
jārāsandhara mūḷe ye aneka deśara rāẏe
chaẏāṇoi sahasra rājā ye basile sabhāẏe | 113 |
ẏe bidhire aneka rājāẏe ye basile mahāduṣṭe
śaṅkha catra gadā sāraṅga dhanu hāthe
bainetra piṭhire hari rāma tāḷadhvaja rathe | 118 |
jārāsandha boilā ye kariṇa kopānaḷa dr̥ṣṭi
sabhā uparaku gauḍaku na diare uṭhi | 119 |
nanda gauḍara putra aṭanti ẏe beni
nānā pātaka doṣa ẏe achanti śarīreṇa gheni | 120 |
ẏe sabhāẏe gauḍe kenhe basibeṭi āsi | 121 |

lg.note:
ẏemante bichārante āditya asta galā
se sabhāku uṭhite hariṁki kehi na dilā |(jha, ṭa, ña, pha)
lg.l: śakuni boilā ẏeheneka bhiāṇa acchi pūrbe
mānagobinde boile ẏeheneka pūrbe yebe acchi
ẏebe kemante ẏe sabhāẏe basibe śrībatsi | 124 |
bhīṣme boile bābu ẏeheneka achai yugate
ādiprānta kari śakuni na kahilā tote | 125 |
bahana hoi bhīṣma rājāṁkara sabhālagna kara | 128 |
uḍile rājāẏe aśva gaja ratha sahite | 130 |
ke sahasra yojane ke beni sahasra yojane yāi paḍi
rāgeṇa rāmakr̥ṣṇa duheṁ ye sabhāku na gale
ẏekā bāhānake se ẏeteka kr̥tya kale | 132 |
bābu jārāsandha rājā ye hoilā aprīti
yugabhogī rājā hoi se aḷapa kāḷa bratī | 134 |
ye yetemānaṁku bhārjana se samasta jāṇaiṁ | 135 |
sabhāre bije karantu āsi deba śirīpati | 136 |
śuṇi pratibākya kalā mantrī ye śakuni | 137 |
tu ye aniryyāpa kathā kahilu gāṅgabe
se ajātika gopāḷa pua tu aputrika aṭu
putra duhitā ye bebhāre tora nāhiṁ
prabhāte tohori bedana chahiṁte na yogāi | 140 |
tu ye ẏe sabhāre basiachu ārambhe
kuḷaburddha boli tote upekṣā kalu āmbhe | 141 |
jāṇiṇa tā gāṅgabe lāje hoileka tūnī | 142 |
daśa pābaccha paryyante deba gale uṭhi
tera pābaccha taḷe pūri basichanti ruṣimāne
sañjaẏe boile nārāẏaṇa apamāna pāi gale
āho caitana tini pābacchataḷe ye nārāẏaṇa ubhā
koṭiẏe siṁghara prātrama bahai yebaṇa kaṁsa
bāḷuta rūpa dekhiṇa se hoilāka dhvaṁsa | 149 |
sañjaẏe boile kauroba kuḷa dhani dhani
sādhu tumbhara piara sādhu tumbhara jananī | 150 |
kimarthe ẏehānta nātha kopa tu saṁharu | 151 |
tadaarthe ẏehānta āmbhe kopa ye saṁhāru | 153 |
āho sañjaẏe yete lokamāne mote karichanti piṭhi
kauroba sabhāre hāde hari ẏemanta bichāra karante
sabu sahuchanti se yujheṣṭhi debakaṁra kāryye | 156 |
droṇe boile tu śuṇa rājādhi rājeśvara
jagabandana puruṣaṁku tu jhiṁghāsa na kara | 157 |
se hari ubhā hoi achanti tora sabhātaḷe
bābu pannagā nārāẏaṇa tu kaicchā jagajjeṭhī
śakuni boilā droṇa tumbhe aṭa bhikṣābāsī
ẏekā bhāriyā goṭiki tumbhe nuārila poṣi | 162 |
naheṇa bidāraṇa kala tāhāra ye buku
tumbhara manda buddhire putrara mātā nāśa galā
teṇu se putrara nāma aśastamā hoilā | 165 |
bidyāguru boli tote āmbhe na bolu ho kicchi | 166 |
āpaṇe pātakī tu pareṇa kahu kathā
anarūpa sādhya tu barṇṇanā karu yathā | 167 |
yisa tisa sabhā prāẏe bujhilu ki tuhi | 168 |
āho droṇa koṭitīrtha gheniṇa jaḷādhi puṣkara
bhīṣme boile tu yāhā boilu na bichāri
puṣkara abhiṣeka nohile hoai ki daṇḍadhārī | 171 |
āho śakuni puṣkara abhiṣeka yāhāra śira hāde
koṭi tīrtha gheni puṣkara abiṣeka karai ẏehi nārāẏaṇa padmapāde | 172 |
debaruṣi rājaruṣi nitye srāna karuchanti tahiṁ | 173 |
teṇu se mokṣakaiṁ kāraṇa se pāile saubhāgī | 174 |

lg.note:
tīrtha hoi yebe hoai asura bhogī
brāhmaṇa hoi yebe karma prityāthī |(ta, dha)
lg.l: subuddhi mantrī hoi najāṇu tu kicchi
viṣṇuaṁśe jāta nohile nr̥pati kāhiṁ acchi | 177 |
kubera aṁśe jāta nohile sādhaba acchi kāhiṁ
īśvara kaḷā na thile brahmagyāna sādhi ki pārai | 178 |
gandharba kaḷā na thile bīṇābidyā hoiai sādhi
muni aṁśe jāta nohile śāhāsra pārai ki chandi | 179 |
kāmadebara kaḷā na thile ki hoai rūpabanta
hanumanta kaḷā nathile ki hoai baḷabanta | 180 |
tuhi se mantrībara kauroba iṣṭa bandhu
subuddhi mantrī hoi śrījagannāthaṁku kimpe nindu | 181 |
sabhāre gaṇitā ki tāku hatyādoṣa thile | 182 |
anīti brāhmaṇaku ye na jāṇi karanti mānī
kṣatriẏa hoi yebe sāṁgrāme diẏe piṭhi
ẏete kathā mohroa ho manaku na ghaṭi | 185 |
bidure boile tu jagta jana prahu
atihiṁ jhiṁghāsa tu kaurobaṁkara kete sahu | 188 |
lg.note:
kubera aṁśe jāta hoile sādhaba hoai
maheśara kaḷā thile dātabya bolai |(na, ba, cha, pha, ña)

lg.l: catreṇa prahāra karu kinā ẏehi pārastābe | 189 |
gobinde boile tumbhe śuṇa ho bidura
ẏehānta kemante nāśa karibi ho svāmīṁka āgyāṁ nāhiṁ | 191 |
āstānakaiṁ uṭhilā ye ambu batīra suta
bābu tu ye jambudvīpa pr̥thīki dhāraṇā
dibyacakṣu thāuṁ thāuṁ kimpe houachu baṇā | 194 |
kimbhuta carita rājā tohora ẏete heḷa | 196 |
bākya śuṇi pache panarupe siddhānta ye kari | 197 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa bhuriśrabā ye śakuni
bālhīka somadatta aśastamā kr̥pa kr̥tabarmā śalya karanti daẏini | 201 |
nāhiṁ tāhāra mānya se sabhāru na uṭhi | 202 |
rājāra śrabaṇe lāgi kahilā mantrī ye śakuni
rājya māgibā nimante āsiachanti ẏe pāṇḍabaṁka āgyāṁ gheni | 203 |
se se jagannātha tu aṭu mahīdhara
beni bākya samasari hoiba tumbhara tāṁkara | 205 |
dui kākhare deba beni hātha lāi
basa boli na boilā rājā mānagobinda
hr̥de yāhāra kaḷaṁka thāi se kahai ki madhura śabada | 207 |
baḍāi haraṣa muhiṁ hoili ājara dina
ẏehikathā baḍāi sulabha āpaṇe jāṇu debarāje | 211 |
yāhā śrabaṇe śuṇi tāhā dekhili janārddana | 212 |
lg.note: hr̥dare yāhāra kaḷaṁkara thāi se kahai ki bacana śuddha ? (tha, ja, da, ṇa)

kāryyara saṅgate = kāryya sambandhare
kahibā saṅgate = yukti yukta bhābe
lg.l: svāmī rāga moha hiṁsā ahaṁkāra apabāde
māẏā mohe paḍi nātha baṇā hoilaiṁ hāde | 213 |
paramānanda puruṣa tu āmbhara saṅge kheḷu
sāmānya jana prāẏe bujhi nātha kali tote heḷu heḷu | 214 |
svāmī tumbhara bāḷa carita śuṇuthāuṁ bhale
batsānta napāi nanda loḍiṇa yāiṁ bāṭe
cūḷagoṭi dhari nanda māilāka tintuḷi chāṭe | 216 |
hari gopāḷa puaṁkara meḷe kheḍara kutūhoḷe
paḷāi yāānte nātha puṇa bhūmire paḍilu hābuḍi
ḍeiṁgalā gopāḷa tohora śirare pāda paḍi | 218 |
kutuhoḷa puruṣa nātha tu sahilu nāhiṁki tāhā
mahata āśrite doṣa na dharilu caubāhā | 219 |
hari tu rādhāra tule śr̥ṅgāra kutūhoḷe
upare rādhikā ye taḷe thilu tuhi | 222 |
sahasra yūṇe yāiṁ paḍilā candra seṇā
samprate nakalu deba na dekhi naẏane | 225 |
driyodhana boilā tāṁka doṣa na ghenilu yenhe
muhiṁ hāde tohora aṭai nā tenhe | 227 |
yadyapi doṣa muhiṁ tote karibi ananta
yisa tisa doṣa abā mohora karibu upekṣā
kopa chāḍi jagannātha kariba mote rakṣā | 229 |
driyodhana boilā yebe sodri māpaṇa icchi
aśastamā jāṇai gaurī śaurī naḷabidhi tini prati | 232 |
gobinde boile ẏe hatyā bibādī śasradhārī
tāhānta brāhmaṇa ho kemante nāma dhari | 233 |
bhājane arccanā mote kalu ho kururāja
āmbhe yebaṇa nimante ailu kemanta se kāryya | 234 |
gobinde boile tu śaṇa ho kuñjagaḷa adhikārī
tāhāṁkara pitā ye pāṇḍu rājā thile
kandamūḷa khāi se datya dānabanta nāśi
ẏe pañchurājye to pitā rakṣā karai dibā niśi | 239 |
