dhuśāsana bhīma duheṁ āsanti bega hoi
bāsudebaṁka agrate tāhā kale nei dhāti | 55 |
bhīmasenaku boile āsi prabeśa hoilā niśi
tumbhara uchura dekhi āmbhe bikaḷa houachuṁ basi | 56 |
bhīmasena boilā hari sateheṁ hoibāka goḷa
tebe se gāndhārī puanta muṁ karibaiṁ roḷa | 57 |
svāmī ẏemanta hoi yebe mahābhāratha hoiba
āmbha pāñcha bhāinta ke puṇa āboriba | 58 |
adyāpi duṣṭapana na chāḍu ture bābu | 59 |
kāhāri āge na kahibu mane thibu dhari | 60 |
ẏehā śuṇi bhīmasena kāhāku na kahi
mana dukhakari se baḍa byathā pāi | 61 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bhīma kebaṇahiṁ kathā
svāmī kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷe ye śubhakhamba potāiba
yujheṣṭhi boile re ẏeḍe tora śaṁkā
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bābure ẏehi chāra kathā
puṇya thilā prāṇīṁki pramāda paḍai sarbathā | 65 |
āho, dhuśāsana tahuṁ galā bega hoi
gosāiṁ bhīmaku mote ye peṣila debahari
bhīkṣma rūpa dhariṇa duheṁ gheniṇa ailu
kebaṇa upāẏe karibe na jāṇaiṁ muhiṁ
ẏehā tumbhe jāṇiṇa thāa sarba bhāi | 69 |
driyodhana boilā re mo tahuṁ acchi ke baḍajaṇa
śrījagannāthe khaḷa dūboṅgḷakaiṁ yahuṁ rāiṇa peṣile | 71 |
kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷe duheṁ thiba ubhā hoi
āhe khaḷa dūboṅgḷa tumbhe bege yāi | 72 |
ẏe mohora beḷe sahi nuārai anargaḷā | 73 |
ẏemanta śuṇiṇa ye se khaḷa dūboṅgḷe
bege āsa tumbhe ho kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷaku | 80 |
se āsi prabeśa ye hoile bahane | 85 |
sandhyā nityakarma sāri śubhakhumba pratiṣṭhāẏe paśi
pabanuṁ āpāte thamba gheni bege āsi | 88 |
byāse boile śubha anakūḷa hoilā re bābā
brahmajāti hīrā śuddha subarṇṇa saṅge poẏeḷā
lohita barṇṇa jāṇi diśai tāra kāẏe
tiraṇa ḍājeka gheni se hoiacchi ṭhiā | 94 |
dekhiṇa aneka praśaṁsā kale samasta kaurobe
boile samara bhūmi prāmi prāẏeka diśalāka ẏebe | 100 |
ẏe bacana śuṇi ye bilaṁka adhipati
bho agasti nārāẏaṇe ye śubhakhamba poti
kebaṇa mahātmā se kebaṇa śāpe thilā
ẏethira carita mahātmā biśeṣi mote kaha
agasti boile śuṇa aneka kāḷara kathā
manu sānanda boliṇa ye satyayugara bāratā | 107 |
maruḷa piṭhire basi uṭhile caudakalpa pariyante | 110 |
āhāra maithuni nidrā nāhiṁ tāra kicchi
dhātā jāṇile se bāhānagoṭi mohora phuṭi | 112 |
se brahmā dhyāẏekale hr̥de viṣṇu debatāṁku
caudakalpa pariyante muṁ uḍili śūnya maṇḍaḷe | 114 |
se brahma puruṣaṁku garbhe dile ṭhāba | 115 |
garuḍa piṭhire rahile satara kalpa pariyante | 116 |
nārāẏaṇa jāṇile āmbhanta khagebara nuārai bahi
aṭhāiśa kalpa pariyante bulile se br̥ṣabha piṭhireṇa basi | 121 |
se rudra debatā hāde bhārā sahi nuārilā
dharmadebatā prabeśa āsi rudra debatāra pāśa
mohora dekhante brahmā viṣṇu praḷaẏa hoilā | 124 |
aṭhāiśakalpa pariyante muṁ basi bhramili br̥ṣabhara piṭhi
ẏete bichāri rudra debakaiṁ garbhe dile ṭhāba | 126 |
rudra praḷaẏa hoilā nāśagalā ẏe dhariṇī | 127 |

kumbheka nāmeṇa brahmā kr̥ttika nāme yama
biruthi nāmeṇa kāḷa pāḷeka nāme dharma | 228 |
samīraṇa nāme pabana sohi nāme kṣiti
somaka nāme rudra ḍagara nāma nārada
bhānu nāmeṇa āditya kāmyaka nāme candra | 230 |

tohora mūḷe yete debatāṁka paḍilā asthikuḍha
mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe tu rudhira nadīre buḍi mara | 238 |
se dvāpara yuga āṭhalakṣa baraṣa saṁparṇṇe

driyodhana pakṣa hoile śuṇa dei mati | 5 |
ābara saini yete tāra śuṇa dharmadeba
droṇaguru karṇṇabīra śalya ābara ye gāṅgaba | 6 |
dakṣa rakṣa hāde ye saṅgatare achanti bhāibeni
chāriūṇā puṇa ye saturī sahasra rājā
bāraśata kṣauṇī ye hoile tāhār pādāti | 12 |
chatra ālabma chāmara cirāḷa ẏe kharba gaṇnti | 13 |
chokhā chokhā turaṅgama daśa ye mabhmata
bājaṇiā ābara saṅgatare daśaantya ye bikhyāta | 14 |
śveta chāmara tāhāra chāriśa br̥nda jāṇa
driyodhanara saini saṁkhyā nāhiṁ ye parimāṇa | 16 |
māḷaba deśara rājā ye aṭe kr̥tabarmā
tāhāra hāthīra nama ye aṭai aśastamā | 17 |
hāthī tāra brajūṇa ābara ghaṇṭa bārajūṇa
ẏehā śuṇi yujheṣṭhi deba āśrija hoiṇa | 19 |
boile mo āgare kahilu michakathā goṭi | 20 |
mamara bhuiṁre yebe rahiba sehi hāthī
thāthī bārajūṇa tāra kaṇṭhe ghaṇṭa bārajūṇa
ẏe kathāmāna ta tora mote lāgai aghaṭāṇa | 22 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka bacana śuṇi kahanti mantrī sahadeba
asambhaba maṇila ki ye hāthīra prastāba | 23 |
ẏekamane bujha deba ẏehā hoilāka kete | 25 |
nabajūṇare ghaṇṭa acchi ye hāthīra gaḷā
debatā jūṇare puṇa sehu hāthī ye hoilā | 26 |
brahma jūṇare hoiacchi ye kurukṣetra samara bhuiṁ
ẏebe kaha tu bābure āmbhara saini kete
tebe sinā mora mane hoiba parate | 28 |
deba driyodhana tule acchi aśiparārddha gaja yodhī
ẏeteka baḷa pāila rājā dhr̥tirāṣṭaṁka tanaẏi | 30 |
yujheṣṭhi debe birasa hoile tāhā śuṇi | 31 | || 3373 ||
lg.head: {@bhāradāra bhāratara bhabiṣyata bāṇī kathana@}
lg.l: badaẏanti dharmadebe baḍa thāṭheka pāile kaurobe
tu mohor abhrātha bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā
hāribā jiṇibā ẏe kṣatrīṁkara byābasthā dharma yathā | 4 |
rāma abatare aneka kaṣṭa dilaka rābaṇa | 5 |
dvitīẏa sāṁgrāme bandhana kala indrajita bīre | 6 |
lakṣmaṇaku rābaṇa māilā brahmā ye śakati
kr̥ṣḥaniṁ ẏekā ghantike śatr̥ jiṇi nuāibe hāde | 8 |
jiṇibā dinare mote baḍa daẏā se karibe
anakuta bhūta bhabiṣya dr̥śya nohai re bābu | 11 |
sahadeba pratibāca deba muṁ ye na kahai
yujheṣṭhi debe āśrija hoile tāhā śuṇi
mahābhāratha yuddha se yebe kahibā āgata
ẏehāṁku draśana kale suphaḷa se dina | 16 |
sahadeba pratibāca yebe icchā kala nr̥pamaṇi
bhīmasena ṭhākure gale āsibe tāku gheni | 17 |
svāmī baitaraṇī nadikūḷe yājapur aboli nagre
śuddha saṣṭikara teja se parbatara kāẏā
pūrbe dundubhi daitara aṭai se māẏā | 19 |
sehi parbatara taḷe aṭai dundubhi daitara bāsa
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bābu śuṇasi maruti
se puruṣakaiṁ yāi gheni āsibu taḍati | 21 |
se puruṣa āsibā yāẏe bhojana mora nāhiṁ
athabā rātra pāhu pache tote thibi bāṭa chāhiṁ | 22 |
bābu sarūpa kahani mote ṭhākuraṁka śapata | 23 |
tāhāṁkara agrate mithyā kahile mr̥ddhunā yiba phāṭi | 24 |
svāmī bahane yāi tāku gheni āsa khare
ẏe bhāradā nāmagoṭi tāra thāi ẏekasare | 25 |
pureka bheṭilā sahadeba kahilā yebaṇa mate | 28 |
bhīmasena bichārai ẏe pabitra sthāna seṭi | 29 |
bhāratha yuddha āgata kahibā ẏehu kṣama
anaṅga paṭāntara jāṇi se rūpaguṇe siddhā | 32 |
nābhi gambhīra chālante ki bitrama siṁha ṭhāṇi | 35 |
timiri bidāraṇa prāẏe diśai tāra tanu
dekhiṇa aneka praśaṁsā tāku karai bhīmasenu | 37 |
sāmānya jana kahai ki āgata bāratā | 39 |
bhīmasena bichārai manuṣya dekhi jāṇimāna tattu
kemanta sādhana ẏehāra kebaṇa brata hetu | 40 |
dekhi bhāba jāṇimā ẏehāra kebaṇa tadanta | 41 |
bhārijā ubhā hoicchi dvāra pāṣaṇa upare
sugandhe aẏeṁḷā boḷi tāhāra keśa pakhāḷai
ṭabārasa raṅga bhari śarīre haḷadī lepai | 44 |
chāṅgu ḍāru debāṅga basaan diai nei toḷi | 45 |
śukhilā basana pindhāi odā pakhāḷai puṇi
pālaṭā basra bhāradā pakhāḷai jaḷe āṇi | 46 |
śukhilā basreka gheni śira keśa pocchi
bāmakare keśa kuruḷai ḍahāṇa kare ālaṭa hari biñchi | 47 |
hātīdānta pāniāṁ gheni sāmaḷilā tāra bāḷa
kaberī khopā khopi khoṣilā campaka bakuḷamāḷa | 48 |
bhojana ṭhābare basila kare ratna jhariẏeka gheni | 49 |

43 bhārijā ubhāhoi rahiacch kaṇaẏa mandire |
bhārada nīra niuḍai tāhāra upara |(pha, ña)
bhārijā pīḍhā upare bhāradā jaḷa diai taḷe | 51 |
tāmbuḷa bhāji bhāradā diai bhmañjai kāmenī
bhāradā khaṭataḷe ubhā hoilā ālaṭa biñchaṇā gheni | 53 |
ẏemanta samaẏe āna puruṣe hoilāka āsi | 55 |
ẏe tora kāryya arthare kete debu sunā | 56 |
tāhāra bhārijā ka tire śuāilā āṇi | 57 |
dvāreṇa bhāradā ye śaẏana kalā āsi
para puruṣeka gheni kāminī rātreka biḷasi | 58 |
bhāradā āsi katire basi piṭhi āmañchi caraṇa chāpilā | 59 |
apāra śrama ki pāila āja rāti
bhāḷai pābeni ye karibi kebaṇa kr̥ta
ẏeḍe pāpiṣṭhara chuiṁbaiṁ kemante ye gātra | 62 |
bhāradāku na nele kopa karibeta muku | 63 |
nianteṇa dharmanāśa hoiba na nele baḷabīryya hāni
dharmaheu ki adharma heu yibai ẏehākaiṁ gheni | 65 |
jaḷa kumbha buḍānte bhāradā sarobare paśi
bolai bharadā kebaṇa doṣa mora ho gosāiṁ | 67 |
rāgeṇa māruti tāku bacana na bhāṣi | 68 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile dekhibā tāhāra mukhaiṁ
bhabiṣya gyāṁtā lokaku dekhile bahuta puṇya achai | 72 |
yujheṣṭhi debe āśrija hoile tāhā śuṇi
āsthāna tejyākari dhatikāre sabharu gale uṭhi | 75 |
svāmī bhāradā carita tumbhe nuārila jāṇi | 76 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile muhiṁ yesaneka rājā
bhāradā goṭāẏe āṇi tu mote tehne karāilu lajjā | 77 |
muhiṁ ye adhama bābu aṭai ādyahuṁ
paśāra binode rājya dhana bhārijā hārilaiṁ tahuṁ | 78 |
bharadā goṭāẏe āṇi mote karāilu lajjā | 79 |
mukha tāhāra hāde ye na chāhiṁ yugate
se kisa bhāratha yuddha kahibāka mote | 80 |
bhāradā āṇimā na yogālā ṭhākuraṁka bichāre | 81 |
bāṇṭiṇa ẏehāra māṁsa bhakṣibe karibe raṅgakeḷi | 85 |
sahadeba kalākr̥tya doṣa na lāgai hāde mote | 86 |
kuru pāṇḍaba samara bhūmi madhya khambare
bhārada ku bandhana kalā nei brikodare | 87 |
bhūta bhabiṣya kathāmāna kis ase kahiba | 89 |
ẏeḍe pāpiṣṭhaku āṇilā yujheṣṭhi debaṁka pāśa
tāhāku āṇilā se chāra jāṇai ye kisa | 90 |

div.note: ātmākere hoi ke bijau bhārijā |(pha, ña,gha)
ātma sahitare kali bitraẏa bhārijā |(na, ṭha)

lg.l: ẏemanta bacana ye kahile sarba sanya
sahadeba boilā mote na kara ukata
baṇṭiṇa bhūñjibā āmbhe samaste hoibā tiriputi | 94 |
śarīre gyāna thāuṁke bhakṣiba ẏehāra māẏeṁsā | 96 |
preta bhūta pichāśa hoi amokṣa hoilāiṁ pūrbe
ẏebe ẏehāra māẏeṁsa khāile paḍibā raurabe | 97 |
rātra nabaghaḍimāne bijaẏe yognī ye kāmākṣī | 98 |
rākṣasī pichāśī ye śabada kiḷi kiḷi | 99 |
re re kara kariṇa ye bijaẏe mātāṅgī
kemanta kari bhakṣabā ẏehāra ye māṁsa
mukha chāhānte ẏehāra labhibā kotiẏe mahāpāpa doṣa | 102 |
ātra aḍhāi prahare pradeśa āsi śriẏānāme śrikāḷe | 103 |
tārākṣī nāme śrikāḷuṇī acchi tāra tule
bhāradā bandhanaṭhāre āsi duheṁ prabeśa hoile | 104 |
bhogya purandara puruṣa pāiluṁ bhakṣibā mahumāṁsa | 105 |
śrikāḷa boilā sakhire ẏehāku tejyākari āsa
kimarthe tahiṁki ye baḍhāu mane āśa | 106 |
śrikāḷa boilā sakhire ẏe aṭai bhāradā
āpaṇā bhāriyā se karāẏe pare paramadā | 107 |
puruṣa apābana ẏe tīri ki bhr̥tyapaṇe khaṭai
śrikāḷa boilā sakhire mahumāṁsaku yebe kalu icchā
ābara biṁśa dibase pūriba tohora manabāñccha | 109 |
śrikāḷuṇī boilā svāmī pucchai muhiṁ tote
ābara biṁśa dibase hoiba kebaṇa kr̥tye | 110 |
śuṇare saṁghātuṇī muṁ kahai tote hāde
dvijā nāmare nakṣatra bhoga se dinara | 112 |

div.note: rātra aḍhāi prahare prabeśa āsi siṁhamukhā śrikāḷe |(pha, ña, ja, ṇa, ka, ga)
rātra aḍhāi pahare prabeśa āsi sārisā śrikāḷe |(jha, da)

lg.l: śrikāḷuṇī boilā nātha ẏe ẏeka sodara beni
sañchapi kari nātha kaha mote tāhā | 116 |
daśa dibasi yuddha hoiba ẏe bidhi
aneka ratha gaja aśva paḍibe aneka yodhī | 119 |
dr̥pada putraku dekhi gaṅgāra nandana karibe śaraśeyā | 120 |
bhīṣmaṁkara ante bhāra dvādaśaṁkara suta droṇa
jaḷandhara bhua catrabhua śakaṭa bhua kuṇḍaḷī
daśa sahasra ratha daśasahasre yoddhā māriba abhimanyu | 124 |
bāhuḍi catrabhūa se na pāriba bhedi | 125 |

div.note: bhūa = byuha |

lg.l: pāñcha kṣauṇī baḷa tule daśasasra ratha | 126 |
sedina rātre ye kuṇḍaḷī bhūa kari
aneka rathī pādānti kehu anta karu
pāñcha kṣauṇī baḷa tule gheni nija thāṭha
rātra arddha yuddhe paḍibe batiśa sahasra baḷa raṇabhumi | 132 |
tini prahara rātre paḍiba aśastama hāthī
aśastamā hata śuṇi śahasra chāḍibe droṇa senāpati | 133 |
pāñcha pārāẏudha sanya paḍibe se dina pāhānti | 135 |
dekhi bismaẏa hoiba gandha rīra bacchā
karṇṇa boliba maitra muhiṁ tote karibaiṁ rakṣā | 136 |
mānagobindara aṭhāṇoi bhāi māri bhīmā ruhāibe sīmā | 138 |
tebe se keśa bandhana karibe pāñchāḷī
tini sahasra rājā daśa sahasra mattahāthī
āho caitana śrikāḷuṇī āge śrikāḷa ye bole
ẏete sanya paḍibe karṇṇa bharoi malla tule | 143 |
āre sakhi satara dibasa uttāreṇa yuddha
gadā paboṅg sāṁgrāma hoiba goḷa madhya | 144 |
tiriśa sahasra yoddhā tule śalyahiṁ nāśayiba | 145 |
tāhāra tule paḍibe tiriśi kṣauṇī thāṭhā | 146 |

div.note:
“pāñchakharba aśva yoddhā nabakṣauṇī pādānti” pare
‘jha’ pothire pāṭha :–
tebe se keśa bandhana karibe pāñchāḷī
pūrbe pratagyāṁ karithilā bhīmasena mahābaḷī |
āradina yuddhare paḍiba karṇṇa mahārathī
tāhāṁku māribe ye arjuna mahākṣatrī |

lg.l: arjuna āgyāṁ pramāṇe ye pakāibe hāṇi
āho tiniśa bāstarī kṣauṇī baḷa driyodhanara
rakata nadī sātatāḷa uccharga bahiba se dinara pāhānti | 151 |
śrikāḷa boilā sakhire mahumāṁse kalu yebe icchā
ẏehi aṣṭādaśa dibase tohora pūriba manabācchā | 152 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni puṣkara yāhāra śire karai abhiṣeka
se rājāṁkara śira ẏethe lotiba aneka | 153 |
svāmī ẏeteka marāi se kisa kriba mānagobinde | 154 |
samaste paḍibe yahuṁ kehi nohibeṭi sāhā | 155 |
samarakāḷe se hāthīra ghaṇṭa paḍiba ye cchiḍi
se ghaṇṭa bhitare mānagobinda thiba buḍi | 157 |
tahiṁ upare paḍiba aneka ratha gaja pādānti
tahiṁ upara rakata nadī bahiba sātatāḷa utsarga prati | 158 |
āre sakhi raṇajaẏe kari pāṇḍabe yahuṁ bāhuḍibe bege

div.note: brāhmaṇa boli duiśasre śira olaṭāi lagāibe puṇi |(ta)

lg.l: se rudhira nadī driyodhana hoiba ye pāri | 160 |
arghya gheni pucchibe se kāḷe kointā | 162 |
rājā hou ki chāṇḍāḷa hou muṁ arghyadebi tāhāku | 163 |
ẏeka mukha āreka ye hoibe cuhāṁcuhiṁ
mānagobindara maribā ye na jāṇanti kehi | 164 |
bhīmasena boliba driyodhanaku na māile muṇohi mora nāhiṁ
kāli beḷa aste tāhāku na māile agni jāḷi paśibaiṁ | 166 |
samaste pucchbe ye sahadeba mukha chāhiṁ | 168 |
āre sakhi bhīmasena siṁgharaḍi tinibeḷa deba
sahi nuāri lakṣmīṁki peli pakāi mānagobinda bāhāra hoiba | 170 |
lg.note: samasta marāi nidrā ghāriba nr̥pabare |(ta, ṭha, ja, ṇa, gha)
niścinte nidrāyibe se dhr̥tarṣṭa kumare |(ta, ja, jha, ḍha, dha, ga)

lg.l: anargha maṇi mukuṭa maradiba bhīma bāmapāde
raṇa jaẏakari pāṇḍabe bije karibe jaintā
jaẏakalā bhūmire ye daṇḍeheṁ na rahi | 174 |
bandhana phiṭilā bhūmi pāpakṣaẏe tīrtha dhanaprāpata bhūmi
tuhi rahibā biḷamba na yogāi boile jagannātha debasvāmī | 175 |
pāṇḍabanta gheni hari se bhūmi karibe tejyā | 176 |
jaintāre prabeśa hoibe kumbha śukaḷa cauṭhi rāti | 178 |
tija duāre thibe dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumane
se pāñchakara muṇḍā paraśure pakāibe hāṇi | 183 |
driyodhana dekhi boliba sādhure tohora mahimāṁ | 184 |
prathame senāpati tote kimpe na kalire aśastamā | 185 |
rajanī pāhānti beḷe se cihni nuāriba
prabhāte cihnante se pāñchāḷī kumāranti dekhiba | 186 |
birasa bismaẏe dekhi hoiba māna ye gobinda
hā daiba boli se se kapāḷe kara dhinda | 187 |
ke ke terajaṇa rahibe sañchapi mote kaha | 192 |
kr̥ṣṇa sātukī sañjaẏe durddakṣa bidura dhr̥tarāṣṭa mahātamā | 193 |

div.note: prabhāte cihnante pāñchāḷīsuta śira se dekhiba |(ba, ṭha, ga)

kaurobaṁkara baḷa ẏegāra kṣauṇī
pāṇḍabaṁkara baḷa sapatakṣauṇī boli jāṇi |(pha, ña)
ẏehā saṁskr̥taru abalambita |=dhīnda = dvanda

lg.l: ẏe saneka samaẏe raẏaṇī prabhāra ditya prakāśa
sahadeba boile bhīmasena ṭhākure bhāradāku gheniāsa | 195 |
pāibā tathya bāratā tāku gheniasa yāiṁ | 197 |
bhīmasena chahāiṁ niropi dhīra dhīra hoi
āre bhāradā tu ye jīiachu ki nāhiṁ | 199 |
badana niropante se bahana dilā chāhiṁ
bhāradā kahiba bhāratha yuddha kurukṣetrara byabasthā | 203 |
bharadā ājarātre ki ki dekhilu sahadeba pachāri | 205 |
ẏeteboli mote bhūte samaste kale tejyā
mahumāṁsa boliṇa ye mote sabhiẏeṁ beṛhile
mohora sannidhye āsi hoile śrīkāḷa śrikaḷuṇī | 210 |
tāhāra māṁsa bhakṣile nāśakara debatā deba baḍa śāsti | 212 |
jambuka boilā mahumāṁsaku yebe icchākalu saṁghātuṇī
sātatāḷa uccharga rudhira nadī bahiba ẏehu mahī | 215 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni yebaṇa rājāẏe abhiṣekī
se rājāmānaṁkara māṁsa bhakṣa kinā re sakhi | 216 |
śrikāḷuṇī boilā nātha ẏeḍe yuddha ybe hoiba
kehu jiṇima nātha kehu se hāriba | 217 |
śrikaḷa boilā bhīṣma nāśayibe śaraśeyyā hoibe śrīkhaṇḍī samare
putrara chaḷe jadyarathaku nāśa karibe phālagunyu | 219 |
āreka dina yuddhe paḍiba bīra dhuśāsana
karṇnara ante śalya ye hebe senāpati
sehi rātra maribe ye aneka saini | 226 |
āho caitana yujheṣṭhiṁka agrate ye bhāradā kahilā
gadāyuddhe sdamaste paḍibe boli śrikāḷa boilā | 227 |
samaste paḍibe ẏekā rahiba mana catrabratī
rakata nadīre buḍi paḍithiba se rāti mānacatrabratī | 229 |
satatāḷa rudhira nadī hoiba sehu pāri | 230 |
bhīmasena siṁharaḍi śuṇi se bāhara hoiba kopbhare | 231 |
mālabandhe bhīmasena bhagna karibe driyodhana jānu | 232 |
duikṣauṇībaḷa dhr̥ṣṭadyumana pāñchāḷī kumāraṁkara śira kāṭibe se dinara rāti | 233 |
bhāradā kahilā tāhā śuṇile deba ye yujheṣṭhi
śrikāḷa boilā hāribe driyodhana jiṇime yujheṣṭhi | 234 |
gobinde boile ke ke terajaṇa rahibe
ẏehā sañchapi kaha yujheṣṭhi deba śuṇibe | 236 |
bhārata yuddha kathā kahante mr̥ddhanā galā phāṭi | 239 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇara mukha dekhi se gamilā amara svarge | 240 |
puṣe ka bimāne nei basāile debadūte

div.note: sarigāmapadhanasā sapatasvara bīṇā |(na)

div.head: {@bhāradāra puboṅgjanma bibaraṇa@}

lg.l: ẏeteka ucchaba indra kalāka kebaṇa bāge | 2 |
svarge aneka pūjā kimpe tāku kale purandare | 3 |
śrikāḷa na khāilā bhāradā māẏeṁsa boli
ẏebe tumbha bākya śuṇi āśrija hoili | 4 |
se śrikāḷa aṭe ye bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā
se kimpā na jāṇilā tā pūrbajanmara bārata | 5 |
śrikāḷa yebe bhakṣantā hāde tāhāra māẏeṁsa
baibasuta manu pucchākale bharadā ke aṭai pūrbe
manubhrānti tuṭiba kahibā mini mote ẏebe | 8 |
se bhāradā carita śuṇa pūrba ye janmara | 9 |
jambhu datya māri jaẏabhedī nāma indra basai svarge | 10 |
nr̥tya gīta binode kumara baḍāi ārambha
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa sukarmā ye yoga
bāsaba āgyām dile jaẏasena gandharbaku rāi
apakṣarānta gheni kubera chāmure nr̥tyakara yāi | 16 |
menaka duhitā ye madanika nāme bāḷī
prathama rajobatī sedina śuddha ye srāhāna
arghyagheni sundarī aneka beśa beśane nr̥tya āgamana | 18 |
pitāra āgyāṁẏe se jaẏasena gandharba bīra
bidyādharīnta gheni nr̥tya karai kubera chāmura | 19 |
jaẏasena tāḷa dhare apasarī kare nr̥tya
aneka aḷaṁkāra dei pīrati kala manohārī
timiri bidāraṇa maṇi kubera dile bandhā
nandana nāme bana se ākāśa gaṅgākūḷe
se sthāne uturi se puṣpaka bibānuṁ
rti śāhasre birasa kalaka tāhāra adhara | 30 |
śr̥ṅgāra sāri se tāhaku basana pindhāi
bāraspatī bhmabane se miḷilā bege yāiṁ | 32 |
beśa beśana hoiṇa se aḷakā adhikārī
jaẏasena prabeśa hoila madanikāku saṅge gheni | 34 |
madanikā gheni se ramaṇa sthāne paśi | 35 |
ẏe yubā puruṣa sehu yubāstirī yubatī
basra ulagna kari sunderīki puruṣa basāila koḷe | 37 |
āḷiṅgana sāri paśile se śr̥ṅgāra rase | 39 |
candra kaḷā bāri se suratire jitā | 40 |
apāra śr̥ṅgāra se kahante na sarai
puruṣa abhābe se birasa kathā kahai
rasaraṅga na pāi se kubera manadukha | 43 |
na sahai sundarī se birasa kathā boli
ālo ẏe saneka bibhaḷita hoilu kebaṇa bāge | 45 |
dhanadhānye muhiṁ se rati śāhāsre sarbagyaṁ | 46 |
mohore svandarī re kiṁke na baḷilā icchā
ke abā kāhāre tu aṅga samarpilu
āre sundarī ẏe kathā mote kahani sarūpe
bāḷuta sundarī se na jāṇai kraṭa ye kapaṭa
svāmī kopa na kara tohora āgyāṁ kalāiṁ bhraṣṭa | 50 |
se mote śr̥ṅgāra kala toṭā nandanabana | 51 |
tāhāra āgyāṁ bhraṣṭa karante ki muhiṁ sāmaratha | 52 |
āre re gandharba muṁ indra debatāra guru
kebaṇa darpare tu mohora āgyāṁbhraṣṭa karu | 56 |
kopa saṁhari nuārile ẏehā kahuṁ kahuṁ | 58 |
tu ye harilu re āja mohora patnī
madhyasvarge hou tora nāma ye bharadā | 60 |
durāpada śāpya yahuṁ dile bāraspatīpura adhikārī
jaẏasena tāḷa dharai apakṣarī karai nr̥tya
khaṭante bodha gali tu yāhā māgipāru | 63 |
mānabe janmibu tu baitaraṇī nadīkūḷa debapura nagrara | 64 |
nija ballabha teji ẏe pare karāiba rati | 65 |
tote dekhi bhaẏe āu nohiba ẏehāra | 66 |
apāra pātaka hoiba tohora mukha chāhānte | 67 |
jaẏasena boilā svāmī doṣa hoilā nisandeha
śāpyaku anugraha nātha kāraṇa mote kaha | 68 |
kubera boile satyayuga ante tretaẏāyuga hoiba
tathāpi tohora pātaka khaṇḍaṇa na yiba | 69 |
tu mohora śiṣyaputra muṁ tohora guru
tu mohora bhārijā harilu to bhārijā āna haru | 70 |
tretaẏā ante dvāpara yuga antare kuru pāṇḍabe hoibe anyoanyi
sahadeba bacane bhīmasene tote yibe gheni | 71 |
rātra aḍhāi prahare tote bheṭiba śrīẏānāma śrikāḷe | 72 |
tohora māṁsa bhakṣi loḍiba tāhāra bhārijā
śrikāḷa boliba sakhī ẏe māṁsa kara tejyā | 73 |
āgata bhāratha yuddha sañchapi kahiba sarbakathā
tu tāhāra bāikye hoibu bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā | 74 |
mahābhāratha yuddha bāratā kahi āsibu madhyasvarge | 76 |

div.note: śrīkr̥ṣṇa yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba āu pāṇḍaba sanya āge |(ja)

lg.l: tenyāẏuṁ kari tāhāra bhāradā nāma ẏebe | 78 |
mokṣa hoi bhāradā akṣaẏa sargeṇa basi | 79 |
sarūpa dekhi mahatamā pratakṣe kaleka likhana | 84 |
ṣāṭhiẏe lakṣa grantha nāma dilu sriji
se byāsa pādabinuṁ citta na baḷai āne
yāha se prasanne mote āgyaṁdile ugratārā
badaẏanti sāroḷa dāsa janme janme abhyāse | 88 |

div.note:
garbhe dekhile samasta bhūta bhabiṣyamāna
yeteka dr̥śa hoai muṁ krai lekhana |(ka, ta, ga, ṇa, ba, ṭha)

lg.l: muhiṁ tāhā lekhili byāsaṁku talaẏe gheni | 89| || 3711 ||

div.head:
{@ātapi bātāpi upākhyāna ebaṁ siṁhamukhā śr̥gāḷara
bhaciṣyata bāṇī@}

lg.l: boile bhāratha yuddhakathā mote kahibāka kumbhasunu | 1 |
bhāradā bacana śuṇi yujheṣṭhi hoile triputi | 2 |
gaja aśvamānaṁku ciri ghāsa caraṇī piuṇi
yeteka lāgai thāṭhaku dianti se āṇi | 7 |
amr̥ta yogāḍa ye aneka pāga siddhi

div.note: muhiṁ tāhā kahala byāsaṁkara parasana |(ṭa, jha, pha, ña)

lg.l: ke bolai samara lāgai kina begi
ke bolai nicaẏe samara hoibāka kāli
bajābanti bijighoṣa damā bīra marddaḷa kāhāḷī | 16 |
bolanti bahana hoi ārambhu kinā kaḷi | 17 |
śire mukuṭa karṇṇe karṇṇāñchaḷ ahr̥de pdaka bhuṣaṇa
bāheṇa bāhuṭi kaṭimekhaḷā dianti nānāratna aḷaṁkāramāna | 20 |
ẏethira sandeśa bāratā kahasi hāde mote | 24 |
se kahilā bāratā kuru pāṇḍabaṁkara roḷa | 26 |
śrotā hoi pucchilā tāhāra bhārijā tahiṁki
sañchapi kaha śrikāḷa yāhā se kahilā | 28 |
sañjaẏe boilā ye sate ki ẏekathā
jiṇibe yujheṣṭhi ye hāribe kaurobe sarbathā | 29 |
sañjaẏa boilā se śrikāḷa bākya sata
se śrikāḷa jāṇai samasta āgata bārata | 31 |
se śrīẏā śrikāḷa katha baḍai asambhaba | 32 |
se śrikāḷa śrikḷuṇī aṭanti ke pūrbe
saṁsarpi kari sañjaẏa kaha mote ẏebe | 33 |
bahuta kāḷara kathāẏe satya yugara bārata | 34 |

div.note: saṁṁsarpi = bistāra kari |

lg.l: rambhāra pratirambhā boli tāku bolanti bajradhārī | 36 |
tāhāra bīryye hoile beni putre utapatti | 37 |
yajana yājana se putra nāma beni
aneka beda śāhasra paḍhaile paulastya mahāmuni | 38 |
aneka beda bidyāẏe nirjitā beni śiṣi
baḍa susañcha sukumāra aṭe tāra kaẏ | 40 |
se buraṅgīgoṭi pāṇiheri gala brahma sāgara kuṇḍaku
se yajana yājana hāde dekhile tāhāku | 41 |
ẏekā kuraṅgī ye āna nāhiṁ sanidhye
aneka ratna thilā tāhāra ye kāẏ
nandnaa bana bhitare gopyāne tāhā poḍi | 44 |
śaubhī bidhire kari tāku kaleka rāndhaṇā
poḍhābaḷi māṁsa bhakṣile paulastī kara dulaṇā | 45 |
bhmañjiṇa kumāre ye aneka hoile triputi
brahma sāgara kuṇḍe loḍi nandana bane paśi | 48 |
āñchobana sāri basichanti yajana yājana beni
mote rāiṇa ye āgyām dile guru
kuraṅgī goṭi loḍi muṁ aili aneka dhūruṁ | 50 |
samasta sañchā diśuacchi kuraṅgī khāila ki podi | 51 |
thambībhūta hoile se kicchi na dile smbhāṣi | 52 |
jāṇilu tumbhe duheṁ bahuta kala manda | 53 |
svāmī mandakr̥tya kalu āmbhe na jāṇi agyāne
guruṁku na kahiba deba kariba gopyāne | 55 |
banajība prāẏ bujhi māilu āmbhe dhari
dhātikāre kahile yāiṁ se br̥haspatiṁkara ge | 57 |
bho guru paulastiṁka nandana ye yajana yājana
kuraṅgī khāile poḍi nandana ye bana | 58 |
rāgeṇa boile tumbhe bahma rākṣasa hua | 59 |
brahma rāṣasa hoile se ātāpi bātāpi | 61 |
banaste bhramanti se preta pichāśa jāṇi
prāgatīrtha yibāku pantha bhairoba nāme bana
susañcha mandira kari tahiṁ rahile benijana | 65 |
se banastara madhye pāṇi miḷenāhiṁ bāṭe
tahiṁ gharakari rahile ye ātāpi bātāpi
se pathuki jane yāuthānti bāṭe bāṭe
jaḷa nāhiṁ jantu nāhiṁ tahiṁra nikaṭe | 68 |
śrama pāi basanti se susañcha sthāna dekhi
sehi piṇḍā koṇe se śoithāi jāgi | 70 |
beḷa asta huante se ruhāi purāṇa
pathuki janaṁku bolai ājaka raha ẏhi sthāna | 72 |
ruhāi rāndhaṇā yogāḍa karai tahiṁ sañchā
ẏhi kuraṅgī goṭi māribi nine karai pañchā | 74 |

div.note: banajantu bhakṣaṇe se bañchile beni prāṇī |(ka, cha, na)

lg.l: susvāda padārtha pāi pathuki karai tāhā grāsa | 76 |
ātāpi ḍāka diai tāra bhrātha bātāpiki | 79 |
tretaẏāyuge se nāśa kaleka aneka loka | 82 |
agasti maharṣi anakūḷa kale tīrtha prāga | 84 |
caḷante prabeśa hele se bhairoba nāme bane
bheṭile ye ātāpi bātāpi āśrama sannidhāne | 85 |
se maharuṣi śramaṇa basile yāi ātāpi piṇḍāra
kemante ho paṇḍāẏe yba ki rahiba | 88 |
kicchi na pāibā se ye beḷara udyāne | 90 |
śauri bidhi rāndhaṇā karai chāṇḍe chāṇḍe | 92 |
nābhire jyeṣṭha aṅguṣṭhi dei mantra se paḍhanti | 95 |
bhojana jīrṇṇa galā prabeśa helā rāti
yoga abhyāsa karante prasāra helā ratri | 96 |

div.note: “nābhire jyeṣṭha aṅguṣṭhi dei mantra se paḍhanti” pare pāṭhā :–
āñchobana sāriṇa kumbharusi śaṣa
garbha āuṁsante se hoilāka bhasma |
ātāpi bhakṣante jīrṇna bātāpica mahasuraḥ
smudra śoṣito yena agasti baḍabānaḷaḥ {?} itiśḷokaḥ

“yoga abhyāsa karante prasara helā rātri” pare
‘ḍa, ta, pa’ pothire adhikā pāṭha–
agasti bhojiṇa hāa dileka udare
jīrṇṇagale tatakṣaṇe bātāpa asure |
śaẏanara sthānare se bijaẏe agasti
yoga abhyāsante prasara helā rāti |

lg.l: agasti boile tumbhe bāhuḍi yāa he paṇḍāẏe
gahana bane āsiba kete dhūra yāẏe | 98 |
tahuṁ bāhuḍai ātāpi nija ye mandire
ẏekā ātāpi amukhya hoi bulai caukati | 103 |
yāare ātāpi tu śrikāḷa janma hoasi | 105 |
śrīẏā nāme śrikāḷa hoilā sehi śāpye | 106 |

div.note: yebaṇa agastiṁkara baḍabanaḷa dahana gala garbhe |(ka, dha, ta, pa, tha)

yebaṇa agasti sāta sāgara kalā grbhagata
bātāpi māṁsa chāra paḍi garbhe hoigalā bhasmabr̥ta |(ja)

yebaṇa agasti sāgara gaṇḍūṣa kale heḷe
chāra kisa bātāpi bhasma galā garbhare |(cha)

kapaṭe māẏamr̥ga māẏeṁsa paraśi
ẏebe śrikāḷa hoi yuga yugāntare mara tanu bahasi |(cha)
amukhya = amokṣa |

śriẏamukha śrikāḷa se ādihum brahmamaẏe |(tha, ṛa, ga)
śriẏāmukha śrikāḷara ādijanma bāratāẏe |(cha)

lg.l: sehi kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷe pati patnī thānti mahabharatha yuddhe | 107 |
śrikāḷa carita śuṇi santoṣa hoilā citta | 109 |
se śrikāḷaku sañjaẏe tu dekhāibu ki mote
bijaẏa nāma boliṇa ẏeka parbatara taḷe
gupate rahile se śiṁśupā br̥kṣa mūḷe | 113 |
śrikāḷa śrikāḷuṇī ye parbate chanti uṭhi
mādhuryya bacane ye samārjanā kari boli | 115 |
khāilāra mahumāṁsa kalu tu ye nāsti
khāibu aneka māṁsa tu bimukha na pāa | 117 |
puṇi madhura bacane ye samarjana kari boli
sateki samara, nātha ẏeḍe baḍa hoibāka ẏetha
bikaḷe śrikāḷa ye gobai puṇa puṇa
ẏehā bichāra kiṁpe karithilu bihi bhābi | 123 |
tora kaṣṭa dekhi mora prāṇa bisarjibi | 124 |
ẏe sakāśuṁ tohora ye cachu galā phuṭi | 125 |
śrikāḷa boilā tu go mote kalu bhaṇḍa
śrikāḷuṇi boilā nātha hoili baḍa pāpī
ẏe dustaru kenhe pāra hoibi adyāpi | 127 |
śrikāḷa boilā tu yebe labhibu kāraṇa
dr̥tarāṣṭa boile sañchaẏe muṁ mahābhāratha nindākali pūrbe
tatadoṣa kari benicachu andha hoilāka ẏebe | 129 |
śuṇa sāgadhāne mahābhāratha bārata kahai muṁ tote | 130 |

div.note: pratyakṣe paḍilā āsi tote ẏe akāḷa kāṇḍa |(na, ṇa, ja, ka, ba, ḍa)
tretaẏā yuga nāma aṭai ahisvarge |(ka, ja, da, na)

lg.l: se abatāru saturi yuga galā maṇili muṁ kāli | 132 |
se dvāpara bhādraba mase hoilā bhāratha samara
kuru pāṇṭahbaṁka yuddha hoilā ẏe bhūmira | 133 |
ẏe bāruṇābanta parbata caubiṁśa yojana utsarge
rodhira nadī bahila sapata tāḷa dīrghe | 136 |
ẏehi parbata upare muṁ uṭhili re kāmenī
uṭhibāku sakhya kāhiṁ rudhira nadī gheni | 137 |
ẏe parbata sāmānye hoi paḍilā mr̥tuśaba
ẏethipāiṁ māṁsa muṁ bhakṣili rātra diba | 138 |
tuṇḍa baḍhāi sakhi uttama māẏeṁsa bhakṣili | 139 |
śrikāḷa boilā tu śuṇasi priẏā hāde
puṇa manu antarare hoilā mahābharatha yuddhe | 140 |
aṣṭādaśa dibasa bhakṣai rakata māẏeṁsa ānubrata | 141 |
jambuka boilā sakhi kahai muhiṁ tote
ādhāra nāhiṁ mohora āna bhāratha yuddha pariyante | 142 |
śrikāḷa boilā sakhi muṁ tote paramārtha kahili

div.note: saudharma (baḍadharma) bolikari dvāpara yuga boli |(jha, ṭa, ka, ja)

lg.l: ruṣita nāmeṇa satyayuga baiṁlācana nāmeṇa tretā
se dvāpara yuge tuḷamāsa śukaḷa pakṣara madhye
pr̥thīre ṭhāba nohilā muṁ rahili ẏehi parabate
ẏe parbata upare ye achai śāḷabr̥kṣe
rudhire upuciāi ratha gaja aśva pādānti lāgile ẏehi ḍāḷa | 149 |
śrikaḷa boilā re tu śuṇa saṁghātuṇī
se manure haribāsa bolikari ẏekai satyayuge
aneka kāḷara kathā uṁ bujhāi kahibi kāli | 153 |

div.note: īṣita nāmeṇa satyayuga bailocana nāmeṇa tretā (jha, ṭa)

nidhipa, nidhipraśasta, nidhigarbha, niradhāpa, nidhipadana
niradhāpa bolikari dvāparayuga na, ma (gha, ṭha, cha, pha, {?})
candra kānana boli dvāpara yuga bhoge |(ta, cha, ṇa)
candra kāñchana boli ye bhoga dvapara yuga |(pha, ña, ṛa)

lg.l: basibāku ṭhāba ye na pāili muhiṁ
caitra māsa samara hoilā se kāḷe
se dvāpara yuge mithumāse hoilā sāṁgrāma 157 |
rakata māẏeṁsa bahilā sarba ẏeka bhedi | 158 |
se aṣṭādaśa dinare mora rakata māṁsa bhojana | 159 |
manuẏe pariyante mohora āhāra nāhiṁre saṁghātuṇī
bhāratha yuddha hebā pariyante upabāsī thāi puṇi | 160 |
ẏeheneka saturī manu mohora brata hetu
śrikāḷa boilā āgataku kahila saturī mahābharatha
kahai śrikāḷa ye bhūta bhabiṣya mahāgyāṁtā

div.head: {@tuḷasībaṇa bāgha o tuḷāmuhāṁ kṅkara bibaraṇa@}

lg.l: ẏeḍe sandeśa kathā śuṇi nindibe ye tora poẏe | 1 |
ẏebe ho kurunātha bichāri boge kara kāryya
pāṇḍabaṁkara thāānte tohora puanta nāhiṁ rājya | 2 |
āśrija dhr̥tirāṣṭa śrīkaḷara kathā kahuṁ kahuṁ
yisa tisa kathā gheni sabhāku āsuchanti dhr̥tirāṣṭa nr̥pati | 6 |
karṇṇa boilā prāṇīṁkara dharma karibāra beḷe
tumbhe ye aila rājamānanta nimantri gheni | 10 |
śakuni boilā ho phaḷa br̥kṣaru jhaḍile
ẏe kathā sanddha hoiba adhadūre rahile | 12 |
tebe se sanddha hoiba kurupāṇḍabaṁka yuddha | 13 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭe boile muṁ beṇī nadīkūḷe thili ẏehikṣaṇi
śrīkāḷa boilā se bhabiṣyata gyāṁtā puṇi | 14 |
mahābhāratha yuddhe se rakata māẏeṁsa khāi brati | 15 |
puṇi mahābhāratha yuddha hoiba manu ante
ẏehi mahābhāratha kathā kahuṁ ye tā bhārijā nindākalā
śrikāḷuṇī cachu pāilā se śrikāḷa ẏeḍe gyāṁtā | 18 |
bābu ẏeheneka sarūpa se kahilā prastābe
śakuni boilā svāmī se yebe ẏe ḍe gyāṁtā
rakata māẏeṁsa se kimpāiṁ bhakṣai abhakṣatā | 21 |
śakuni boilā andha badhira jaḍā kubujamāne
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile tu śuṇa ho sañjaẏe
tahiṁ purāṇa pothi meḷile purāṇa paṇḍāẏe | 25 |

div.note:
apāra doṣa kahile dharmakoṣa |
samasteheṁ tāhākaiṁ kale upahāsa |(ṇa, ja)

lg.l: keśa mukuḷa ulagnaśāhī jibha halāi halāi | 27 |
nicaẏa śakuni tu samasta karu manda
śakuni boilā ho ẏeta hoilāṇi bāi
pūrbe ẏekai markaṭa goṭiẏe ye thilā
ẏekai byāgra āsi ye tāhāku dekhilā | 37 |

div.note: padare = sthānare |

lg.l: se br̥ddha markaṭa sarbadā tahiṁre bañchai
niśākāḷe tāku bhaẏa bhīti kicchi nāhiṁ | 40 |
se byāghra tahiṁ yāi satvare miḷiṇa | 41 |
rātra dibasa markaṭa tahim sukhe thāi
br̥kṣe br̥kṣe ḍeiṁ trīḍā se karai | 43 |
beḷa anasāne puṇa sehi br̥kṣe hoẏe | 45 |
dekhai tuḷasī baṇare sehu thāi byāghra
maune thāi kathā na kahai tyāga | 46 |
dina antare sehu hoẏe se bāhāra
phuṅkiṇa bhūmi caraṇa se pakāẏe sthira sthira | 47 |
khaṇḍe dūre yāiṇa se karai jaḷapāna
dhira dhira hoi puṇa āsai sehu bana | 48 |
teṇu bhūmi phuṅki sthire sthire pakāu paẏara | 53 |
na puṇa pāda paḍi naśanti kṣadrajība
kīṭa pataṅga niki huanti mr̥tuyoga bhāba | 54 |
pāili kraṇa muṁ dekhili baḍa bhāgya | 56 |
kapi boilā tumbhe mahātamā ẏebe śuṇa
mate ẏebe tumbha saṅga karibā āpaṇa | 57 |
kichu gyāna kaha muṁ paśujanmaru nistāra
mo kaṇṭha moḍiṇa khāu ke baṇahiṁ bhāba | 61 |
ẏehā śuṇi byāghra ucce uṭhiṇa hasilā
uśvāsa śeḷakṣa pāi kapibara tahuṁ paḷāilā | 62 |
yahuṁ se dharma biśvāsa kalāṭi bānara
byāghra tuṇḍaru tarilā śuṇa ho nr̥pabara | 63 |
ẏehāra mukhaku se chāhiṁle baḍa manda | 64 |
tāha yogaru sinā sakaḷe nāśa yibā
ẏehu manda pāpiṣtha bacana na śuṇibā | 65 |
pāṇḍabaṁka bacane ẏehu sarbadā ye thāi
ẏemanta kapaṭa tu manare achu gheni | 69 |
ẏekai kāṁke yāi bheṭilā ẏeka drida
mukhare tuḷā deiṇa kare nīra grāsa
se jaḷa taṭare ẏekai baṭa ābara
dina śeṣare puṇa mukhare tuḷā dei
ẏe antare puṇa kete dibasa galā bahi | 79 |
jaḷa pibante ṇa tāku jaḷajantu bhāṣi
mukhe tuḷa dei kimpe jaḷa khāu āsi | 80 |
tumbha ku dekhi āmbha cittare bhaẏa kari
gabhīra jaḷe paśu tumbhaṁku āmbhe ḍari | 81 |
tumbheta puṇi kicchi na kara āhāra
aḷapa nīra mātra ye āhāra āmbhari | 83 |
na puṇa paśanti se āmbhara garbhare | 84 |
teṇu tuḷā mukeh dei āmbhe sāru nīra
tāhāṁa thāre puṇa baḍāi bhakati kale | 86 |
manare tāṁku āu na thāi bhaẏa bhīti | 87 |
kisa aprādha āmbhe kaluṁ ye tumbhaṁku | 90 |
ẏebe dvādaśa baraṣa indra ye br̥ṣṭi na kariba
atyanta gabhīra ye jaḷa se gabhīra
rahibuṁ tape tahiṁ ẏe dustara kāḷa | 95 |
āmbhe māne ẏe ṭhābare maribuṁ sakaḷe | 96 |
ẏe jaḷa śukhileṭi āmbhara kisa gati
trāhi karibā mahatamā āmbhe kesaneke brati | 97 |
kāṁka bolai āmbhe tumbhaṁku kenhe nebā
jaṇe jaṇe kari tahiṁ chāḍiṇa āsibā | 100 |
ke bole mote āga nebā subidhāne | 101 |
asthi kuḍha kuḍha dekhi karkaṭa birasa | 106 |
ẏe śakuni helā ẏebe tuḷāmuhāṁ kāṁka
ke tāha āna kariba daibakr̥tya bāṇī | 113 |
puṇi pati mukhuṁ śuṇi pāilā beni netara
andhakubuja paṅgu nitye loḍanti āpaṇāra bhala | 118 |
ẏehu puṇa meḷa ye hoanti bhābare | 119 |
kiñchita kathā śuṇi gaṇṭhi karanti manare
śuṇiṇa bolanti tahiṁ se andha nr̥pati
pathara ghare tora baṁśa marāilā driyodhana
tuhi niceṁ maribu pāmara ki bichāru | 124 |
pañcha pāṇḍabanta gheni tumbhe pr̥thī bhogakra | 126 |
ẏe bichāra rakhi andha nijapure caḷa
benikara śire nei tā paḍai kurusāiṁ | 128 |
bina yuddha sūcimune pr̥thī na debi boili | 130 |
ẏebe yāha krme thiba tāha bhoga heba
tumbhe satnāpa kale āu acchi kisa lābha | 131 |
baraṇa kathare subidhāna kathā hoẏe naṣṭa | 132 |
śakuni boilā apāraga lokaṁkara ẏesaneka sina bidhāna
dharma dharma sumari dhr̥tirāṣṭa nija kar adilāka lalāṭe | 134 |
sañjaẏa boilā rājā nabhāḷa tu āna
ẏe br̥ddhakāḷe mote acchi putra kaṣṭa | 136 |
saẏaḷa saṁsāraku nātha tuhi se bajrasenhā | 137 |
janme janme talaẏe se svāmīra caraṇa taḷe loṭi | 138 |
bhaba uddhāraṇa nātha tu baḍāi rāuḷa | 139 |
śūnya cirukuṭī nātha tohora abhaẏe kuṇḍaḷī | 140 |
śarīre lepana yāhāra saṁsra dahana pāṁśu
meru mandara nātha tāḷure ẏeka jaṭi | 142 |
pādeṇa kaṭhāu ye nabadīpā pr̥thī bhrami
svāmī nśili rogapīḍā taba nāma saṁkete
śadramuni sāgoḷa dāsaku mukati gati debā | 147 | || 4023 ||

div.note: digāṅga = dibyāṅg |
saẏaḷa saṁsāra paṭaḷa aṅge yāhāra racanā |(tha, da)
bhaba bhaẏaṁkara nātha tu baḍāi rāuḷa |(dha, ḍha)
bhaba bhaẏaṁkra nātha tu baḍāi mahākāḷa |(da, ka)
sadaẏe bhūtanātha anubrate bhoḷi |(pha, ña, jha)

div.head:
{@bīra hanumānaṅku āmantraṇa nimante
bhīmasenaṅkara gamana o apamāna@}

lg.l: keuṇasi guṇaku muṁ ye nohili śakatā | 2 |
ābara kisa baḷabantā muhm bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa bhūrisarba aśastamā kr̥paṁkara thaẏe | 4 |
śakatā baḷabantā acchi ki moho yodhī

div.note:
“yujheṣṭhideba pucchākale śrīpuraṣaṁka uttame” pare
‘ja, ta, ṭa, i, ka, da’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
yujheṣṭhira bacane bolanti catradhara
maneṇa cintā tumbhe nakara nr̥pabara |
śatebhāi godhana sanya senā yete
mohora buddhibaḷe nāśayibe samaste |
bhīmasenaku hakāranti śrīhari
brikodaraku āśvāsi kahanti kaṁsa airi |

“yujheṣṭhi deba pucchākale śrīpuruṣaṁka uttame” pare
‘ja, ta, ṭa, ṇa, ka, da’ pothire adhikā pātha:–
hanumanta ṭhākuraṁku mora bahuta ārādhana
hanumanta ṭhāku mote peṣale janārddana |

lg.l: tu yāa bhīmasena khinikhinā banasta yaẏe | 7 |
hanumanta acchi se asknda nāme bana
tāhākaiṁ gheni bhīmasena tu āsibu bahana | 8 |
kointāṁka nandana nibeśita gyāṁ gheni śire
naba sahasra nabaśata tiriśi yojaan bāṭa
ẏete bhābi hanumanta khaṇḍe dūra kṣepi
beni sahasra yojana āsi gaṇḍukī tīre byāpi | 14 |
tahiṁ āsi jarā abasthā hoi śutila hanumanta | 15 |
bolai māruti bāṭa ābori kimpe śoilu kapigoṭi | 17 |
muhiṁ hāde yāuacchi askanda nāme bana
hanumanta ṭhākuraṁka ṭhāku yāuacchi mohora kāryyara bidhāne | 18 |
hātharu gada arghya dakṣiṇa kare gheni | 32 |
bāmakare māruti ye dhailā tāra lāñja
bāmakare dhari ye bhīmasena rūpeṇa toḷi
se lāṅgu ḍagoṭi bhīmasena nuārilā chāḷi | 34 |
bāāna bāāna bhāra gadā bhīma gheniṇa karapatre}
ẏe brikodara mr̥tti bhārā mora ke pārai sahi
naẏana nāsikā phuṭi rudhira rome rome gaḷai | 39 |
trodha abastha hoiṇa ye kahai bhīmasena
svāmī athaba acaḷa huantā yebe meru giri
mora brikodara mūrati ye kehu sahipāri | 41 |
bhīmasena abasthā dekhi se añjanāra bacchi
apāra durgama patha bhīma gamilu kemante
araṇyaku ailu bābu kisa kāryya arthe | 43 |
bhīma boilā deba kuru pāṇḍaba beni
ẏekā yugake harita baṇā ye hoilā | 48 |
śuṇa ho bhīmasena tretaẏā yuga kathā
śateka taubiṁśa yojana bandhara aṭai ye dīrgha
batiśa yojana prati dvādaśa yojana uccharga | 52 |
rāma rābaṇa yuddha hoilā caubiṁśa diṇa pariyante | 53 |
rabaṇa bajiẏa karai batiśa akuṁśa sanya gheni
setubandha śate caubiṁśa yojana pariyante pūrai saini | 54 |
kisa samara tumbhara mahābhāratha boli yuddha
kisa samara hoiba kahani se mote sādhya | 55 |
tu mote senāpatipaṇe tahiṁki yibu gheni

div.note: ẏekā yugake harita ẏeḍe bhoḷa ye hoila |(bahutepāthi)
śrīrāma abatāre rāmaẏaṇa yuddhara bāratā |(pha, ña)

lg.l: hanumanta boilā re tahiṁki kimpe yibi
ẏethe thāiṁ tumbhara ye śatr̥ nibāribi | 58 |
lāñja baḍhāi re mora debaiṁ tahiṁki
puṇīhiṁ boilā tu yebe ailu dukha paḍi
kathāẏeka na pāile tu kemante yibuti bāhuḍi | 62 |
bajra kācheṭiru bīra dasi nāḍiẏeka gheni
ẏehā nei debu tu ye kr̥ṣṇa phālaguni | 63 |
mohora parāẏe kari pituḷi ẏeka sāja
kṣaṇa kṣaṇake se mūrati houthiba anuāna
nāma hoiba tāhāra kapi ye ketana | 65 |
śahasra sahite kehi nuāsibe tāra kati
aneka yatene mote ye peṣile bāsudeba
āmbhara prāṇatyāja bele ẏehāra ẏeḍe garba | 68 |
jiṇu ki hāru āmbhe athabā samare
ẏehāra tahiṁki kimpe mote peṣile dāmodare | 69 |
ghena ho bhīmasena boli hanu chāḍilā sūtānāḍi
bhīmasena mr̥cchāgata hoilā hr̥dare sūtra paḍi | 70 |
bajra kācheṭiku nindākalu kiho bābu bhīma | 71 |
ẏemante ẏe kācheṭire mora adheka dasi nāhiṁ | 72
bābu mahābhāratha yuddha hoile nabatanu hoai pr̥thī
ẏemante mahābhāratha yuddha hoilāni testarī ghānti | 73 |
ẏehi dehare mora bajra kācheṭi thāẏe lāgi | 74 |
muhiṁ bhārata yuddha nindākali tu bajra kācheṭi hāsyakalu
yāa yāa re māruti sekācheṭi mathāre ghena toḷi
se sūta nāḍiki gheni caḷai bhīmasena
kointāṁka nāndana ye caḷai ati bege
gobinde boile bhīma kimpe birasa tora mana
yuddha aḷapa dekhi ki na ailā hanumāna | 79 |
bhīmasena boikā deba hāru kinā raṇe
ẏeḍe garbita lokaṭhāku kimpe mote paṭhāila akāraṇe | 80 |
bhīmāra beḷe ki deba huantā sahantā | 81 |
svāmī indradebatā hoi yebe garbita kathā kahai
bhīmā dehe prāṇa thileki se kathā sahai | 83 |
āna hoithile moḍi pakānti tāra muṇḍa | 84 |
tāhāra carita ho kahai muhiṁ tuku | 86 |
tretaẏā yuge muṁ śrīrāma hāde rūpa
mantrī mora jāmbeba mote kahilāka buddhi
sugrībara jāmbeba naḷa nīḷa ye suṣeṇa
śatabāḷī śauri aṅgada hanumanta gabaẏe gabākṣa gandhamāradana | 91 |
aṣṭādaśa kharba kapi parbata āṇi gale | 92 |
mānuṣa madhye tāhara jībane kisa kāryya | 94 |
hanumāna boila śrīrāmacandraku drohata na kaẏe
parbata āṇibāku kimpe mote āgyāṁ na diẏe | 95 |

div.note: aṣṭādaśa marbhmata, aṣṭādaśa kṣauṇī ityādi bibhinma pāṭha |

lg.l: kisa arthe bārure tu hoibu dahanu | 98 |
parbata āṇite kimpa na boila mote | 99 |
śrīrāmacandra boile tu dukha pāilū bahuta
laṁkāre asure tote aprāṁjaẏe kaleka bahuta | 100 |
teṇukari parbata tote āṇi na boili muhiṁ
ẏethaku kenhe abhimāna pāilū hanu tuhi | 101 |
chāḍa chāḍa abhimāna yāa ho ẏehikṣaṇa
svāmīra bacane ye śāghra hanu āsi
naḷa nīḷa tāhā ye dharanti bāmakare
boilā re naḷa nīḷa āja ke tumbhanta rakhantā
sāhera parbate tumbhanta āja muhiṁ karai ye potā | 105 |
abhimāna pāi se hanumanta galā ati bege
biśvarūpa dhari se ghoṭilā ākāśara mārge | 106 |

div.note: goilā re naḷa āja ke tote rakhantā | (ṇa, ka, ṛa)
samudra parbate tote karāi ye potā | (da, ba, ṭha, na)

lg.l: saṁsāra rakṣā nimante se gālāka apasari | 110 |
girijāra piai ye hanumantara aṭai ajā
tenyāẏaṁ hanumanta se giriki kalā paritejyā | 115 |

div.note:
“parbatamāna diṇile tuccha mācchira sarupa” pare
‘ḍha, dha’ pothire pāṭha:–
biśvarūpa dhariṇa se ghoṭilā gagana mārge
svargamañcha pātāḷa ye ghoṭilā bhr̥abhāge |
mañcheṇa pāda ākāśare śira lāgilā pratakṣe
parbatamāne tāku diśanti uche uche |

lg.l: bhala bhala parbata māgiṇa debatāẏe ghenante
brahmā indra rudra yebe parbata māganti
abaśva mārini nohile śrīrāma droha karāi mati | 119 |
tetiśa koṭi debatāẏe naile kehi bhaẏe
marbhr̥ taka parbata nei basāilā kandhare | 121 |
se parbataṁka upare basāilā koṭi tini | 122 |
ābara koṭiẏe parbata tāra kaṭire mekhaḷā | 123 |
jānu upare tāra parbata basāilā benikoṭi
śate śate basāilā ẏeka ye añkhaṣṭhi | 126 |
śuṇa ho pāṇḍaba bhīma jagannāthe kahi | 127 |
ẏekai śarīre se ẏeteka parbata gheni
śrīrāmacandrakaiṁ draśanakalā beḷa acchi gaḍi tini | 129 |
ẏeteka parbata bahi śarīra kalu ẏeḍe śrama | 130 |
śrīrāma boile ẏehimate parbata bahibāku na boilu tote
tahuṁ se kopa bābi upujilā tora mote | 131 |
hanumanta roilā deba tohora mote sadaẏā nāhiṁ
tada nimante sukhī ye na hoili mudaṁ | 132 |
tohora āgyāṁ yebe thāntā mote śānti
se hanumantara mahimāṁ śuṇa ho bhīmasena | 134 |
tāhāra tahuṁ bānare parbata nianti bani
naḷa nīḷa hāthe dianti se karanti jaḷaśāẏī | 135 |
batiśa yojana prati hādaśa yojana uccharga
śate caubiṁśa yojana aṭii bandha nīrgha | 136 |
ẏekā ghāntike parbata āṇi bandha bandhāilā
nabalakṣa naba sahasra parbata uguḷi rahilā | 137 |
ẏe bhāratha yuddha keteka mātara aṭii tāhāku | 139 |
anīti bacana yebe bolanu tāra āge
sapoḍe nāśaya nu ho hanumantara yoge | 140 |
hanura āsana kampilā askanda nāme bane | 142 |

div.note:
hanumanta boila deba taba āgyāṁ nāhiṁ |
se nimante galaiṁ muṁ bapukhīna hoi | (ñjha, ṭha, na, pha)
naḷa baruṇa hāce dei karanti jaḷaṇāẏī | (cha, ka, tha, ḍa, da, na, ṭha)

lg.l: bichāri boilā nārāẏaṇakaiṁ paḍilā ki phaiṭa | 143 |
bāmakare giribara dakṣiṇa kare śāḷa gheni | 144 |
kebaṇa asādhya tote mote āgyāṁ debā svāmī | 147 |
gobinda goile ho rāmāẏaṇa yuddha kāḷe
debaṁkara kaṣṭha pārakalu rābaṇa harpa dhaṁsi
sarge pitāẏe boile tu brahmahatyā doṣī | 149 |
pitara bacane muṁ rañkhā avatāra kr̥ṣṇa mūrati
proheṇī badha kalāiṁ se aṭii tirījāti | 152 |
gohatyā tirīhatyā ho kali muṁ apāra | 153 |
sodara mātuḷa muṁ māili kaṁsa keśī
samasta pātaka mahābhīcatha yuddhe hoiba dhaṁsi | 154 |
āho hanumanta bhārathe bhīgoi majja aṭai sarbasācī
bhārā nibāraṇa karibā boli badaẏanti debarāje | 156 |
yujheṣṭhi arjuna śrīkr̥ṣṇa sarbe āsthāne cchanti basi
gobinde boile māta go aneka binoẏī kahili
āmbhara thāānte ohokuḷaku yuddha nohu ye boili | 3 |
aharniśi kopita hoi se loḍai sāṁgrāma | 4 |
kiẏe sāṁgrāma kariba hari kaha kāhā tule | 5 |

div.note: aharniśi bolai se saṁgrāma sāṁgrāma | (gha, jha, na, ṭa, ga, tha)

lg.l: gobinde boile mā go driyodhanaku yujheṣṭhi
kointāẏe boile bābu karṇṇa ye mohora putra
tāhā tule phāgrāma kenhe kariba bīra pātha | 8 |
karṇṇa arjūna ẏe duheṁ upujile mora garbhr̥ṁ
tāra tule kesane samara kariba bīra pātha | 10 |
ẏekai sohodra se aṭanti bhāi beni
kointāẏe boile bābu beniṁkara ye samare
gobinde boile māta go yebe arjunaku tora daẏe
nīḷabāṇa bhr̥jabāṇa achika beni śahasra tāra
se beni śahasra māgo karṇṇara tahiṁ thile
tini brahmāṇḍe tāhāku kehi jiṇantā nāhiṁ bhale | 17 |
jānu ciriṇa se chāpate acchi thoi
se gupata kathā māgo na jāṇanta kehi | 18 |
se śahasra karṇṇara tahuṁ āṇa māta yāi
teṇu se pañcha putre bhogya karibe mahī | 19 |
tāhākaiṁ guru dakṣiṇā māga māẏe yāi
se beni śahasra āṇa satya uirāi | 20 |
tohora bacana māgo anyastā na kariba
abaśya se beniśasra tohora hāthe deka | 21 |
mahādānī aṭii se ẏe mahīra madhye
tohora māganteṇa nāhiṁ na kariba sādhye | 22 |
tu yebe ẏesaneka go na karibu māta
karṇṇakaiṁ jiṇantā nāhiṁ thile se śahasranta | 23 |
ḍareṇa lāñcha diai subarṇṇa śatebhāra niti | 24 |
mānagobinda tule yebe ẏehu yuddha kariba
gobinde boile niśce kāli hoiba samara
gobinde pratibāca māgo buddhi kara ājara madhye
kāli prabhāte paśibe samara ddhora yuddhe | 29 |
kointāẏe boiile muṁ yibaiṁ ājara niśi
karṇṇakaiṁ muhiṁ gheniṇa se pārai yebe āsi | 30 |
yadyapi aneka doṣa karilā acchi pūrboṅge
se doṣa upekṣā hari karibuṭi ẏebe | 31 |
yujheṣṭhi boile mātā go āsanti yebe karṇṇa
pañchubhāi ye āmbhe sebibuṁ tāṁka pāẏe
ẏe pañchu kaṭakare tāku karibu nr̥parāẏe | 33 |
gobinde boile piba yebe karṇṇara puraku
yebe tohora buddhire rādhebakarṇṇa na āsai
svapana śubha hoiba śuṇa go mahāmāī | 35 |
yadyapi tohora bole na āsiba karṇṇa
hara pārbatī sebante pāiacchi akṣaẏa troṇa paśupatra bāṇa | 38 |
khāṇḍaba bana dahane baiśyānara dile aneka śahasranta | 39 |
mahī maṇḍaḷe śuṇai muhiṁ arjunara pratagyāṁ
kemante hāriba karṇṇaku ye puruṣaṁka utramā | 40 |
sahadeba boile mā go caḷasi bigokari
yebe se na āsai rādheba bīra karṇṇa
ẏe beni śahasra thile kehi nuāri tāku jiṇi
yujheṣṭhi bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba putra chāri | 45 |
guru daṣiṇā goḷi māgi gheniṇa āsiba
teṇu se mātā go tāra kṣatrīpaṇa bhajiba | 46 |
puṇa māgiba chāri pāṇḍabani samare na nāśibu tuhi | 47 |
ẏete boli mātā go paścānte māgiba
kaurobe nāśapibe boli tebe se jāṇiba | 48 |
kointā ye boile muṁ yibi añkhadeśe
yeheneka bāñcchā te ra bolisi haraṣe | 50 |
sandeśa pāiṇa se caḷai debī kointā
roheṇī nakṣatra bhogya aṭe se dinara | 52 |
kebaṇa nimante bijekale paṇḍu rājāra bhārijā | 56 |
karṇṇara tahiṁki chāla yibā ẏehikṣaṇi kara anakūḷa | 57 |

div.note: karṇṇara tahiṁki chālayibā ẏehikṣaṇi śubhabeḷa | (ṭha, na, ga, ḍa, gha, ba)

lg.l: karṇṇa ye nohora se aṭii jyeṣṭhaputra
tumbhe āmbhe yibā chāla karṇṇara nijapura
bihura boile mā go nohai ẏemanta
karṇṇara citra tumbha tahiṁki nohiba temanta | 61 |
āsu ki na āsu karṇṇa mohocahiṁ bole
nirāśa hoibi nā mohora racana bhraṣṭakale | 65 |
bidura boilā muhiṁ tohora āgyā anubrati
tohora āgyāṁ meṇṭi bāku mora kisa ye śakati | 66 |
rātra tinidaṇḍa madhye ye somalagma beḷe
bijaẏe rādheba ye mahā sambharba āstāne
bāāni koṭi mukuṭa bandhā yoddhā astācaḷe paṭoāri
subarṇṇa bandhā śañkha ye nau sahasra phuri | 69 |
aṣṭararne khañjhita pāñcha sahasra dhakaḷa chatrī | 70 |

div.note: bidura boilā yadyapi kahila ẏemanta | (jha, ṭa)
yujheṣṭhiṁka katiki karṇṇa na yiba kadāścita | (ja, ṇa)

lg.l: tini tini sahipra rājā bāma dakṣiṇe pāridaṇḍa
rīratura ṭamaka niśāṇa ghāte kamphucchi bhuakhaṇḍa | 73 |
bihura kointāẏe acchanti ye tamāḷa br̥kṣara taḷe
bidure boile māgo dekha karṇṇara samphradhi | 77 |
indra samāne bhoga karai se ẏethe basi
bihure boile ẏeḍeka bhāba chāḍi abhāba kariba kemante
mohora bichāraku go na yogāi yugate | 79 |
yāhaku yete icchā dāna dilā karṇṇa mahārathā | 81 |
bhitare bijaẏe karṇṇa pinddhalā ẏekabasra gheni
sādhu sādhu karṇṇa boli śubhilāka śañkhadhuni | 82 |

div.note: bidura kointāẏe achai śāḷabr̥kṣa take | (jha, ḍa, ṭa, na, tha, gha)
bijaẏe rādheba atihiṁ abinīḷe | (da, ḍa, ṭa)

lg.l: āho caitana śrībhr̥je karṇṇa kaṇaẏa ratnajhari ẏeka ghenilāka toḷi
bijaẏe bhoja nandinī ye kaneka āsane
mama pure kisa kāryye bijaẏe māheśvarī | 92 |
mānabakuḷe jāta hoi ye chāhaṁi tora mukha

div.note: suphaḷa jībana go āja mo hoilā
sāṣṭāñkhe mātā pāẏe gaḍaghāli śutilā | (jha, ṭa, ba)
bidura kointāṁku basāi āpaṇāra tule
amiẏa rasapāna bhojana karāile | (ga, ba, ṭa, jha)

lg.l: karṇṇa kahilā māgo kāhiṁki kala bijaẏe
muhiṁ jāṇiḷi yujheṣṭhi duryyodhanare sanddhagata prāẏe | 96 |
kointāẏe boile bābu tu aṭu baḍa sarbagyaṁ
dāne khāṇḍe śūrabanta tu aṭu mahābhigyaṁ | 97 |
tu mahā bicakṣaṇa ye paramana jāṇantā | 98 |
tohora beḷe ẏekathā ki hoi nuārai sanddha | 99 |
bābu bigrahe sanddha karāile achai bahuta dharma
karṇṇa boilā mātā go tu parama māheśvarī
dropatīki gheniṇa tumbhe mahībhāra nibāraṇe abatari | 101 |
māgo rābaṇa badhakari nārāẏaṇa kṣīrodra jaḷaśāhī
basudhā guhāri kalā bho deba karibā trāhi trāhi | 102 |
kaṁsa aṣṭamalla bhārā muṁ nuārai sahi | 103 |
māgo kānhā avatāra hoile hari daibakīra garbhe
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁkara pañchabhuta ātmā go aṭanti pāṇḍabe | 104 |
bhārā nibāraṇa arthe janma hoile ẏemāne
māgo kaurobanta muṁ kari pārai sanddha
bābu śrīkr̥ṣṇa yebe tāhānta kaleka abheda
bābu muhiṁ ye aṭai tohora garbhadhārī
tu mohora jyeṣṭhaputra kimpe pāṇḍabanta achu durakari | 109 |
āsare bābu karṇṇa ẏebe yibā ye indrapraśaste
āsa āsa bābu boḷi kointāẏe dhaile hāthagoṭi
mātāṁkara caraṇa taḷe paḍai karṇṇa loṭi | 111 |
karṇṇa boilā mātā go boilū asambaba kathā
radherī aṭai go mohora garbhadhārī mātā | 112 |
muhiṁ ta na jāṇai tuhi mori mātā
ẏe kuñjhagaḷa deśe kehi nohilā jāṇantā | 113 |
tāhāṁkara duhitā muṁ nāma mora kuntī | 114 |
kuntabhoja boile tumbara prasāde mora sakaḷa mañkhaḷa | 120 |
dr̥bhāsāẏe boile baḍāi sulabha dekhili tohora rājyara
kontabhoja boile tumbe dine yebaṇa pure biśrāmi
ẏekāuna puruṣa pitr̥loke tāhāra hoanti svargagāmī | 122 |
ẏe mohora pure yebe rahibu caturmāsyā
taribe koṭiẏe puruṣa mohora ye āśā | 123 |
mohora mukhe bolibi ki mora pure raha
yāa bolibāku ta ye nohai muhiṁ raha | 124 |
ẏe mahārāṣṭa chatriśa maṇḍaḷe muhiṁ ādhipati
pr̥thī cintā karante mote dinata naaṇṭi | 125 |
tumbaṁku kisa muṁ ye hoibi bhagati
ẏe mohora mana ye cañjhaḷa prakr̥ti | 126 |
raha boli boile bhagati hoi nuāribi
yāa boli boile tora kopare nāśayibi | 127 |
dr̥bhāsāẏe boile tu bhagati hoi nuāribu
kontabhoja boile mohora dohitā goṭiẏe tāhāra nāma kontī
mama dibya bhr̥bane acchi ye subarṇṇarekhā nadī
beda śāhāsra pramāṇe se aṭii prasiddhi | 130 |
pāñchabaraṣa bāḷuta kāḷuṁ muṁ dr̥bhāsāṁku khaṭi | 131 |
kṣaṇeheṁ na chāḍali muniṁku khaṭili anugrate
sustha pāi dr̥bhāsāẏe rahile daśa baraṣa pariyante | 132 |

div.note: ẏekāūna–ekābana |

lg.l: bābu kontabhoja rājā ye aputrika hoithilā
kontabhoja boile muni he aila aḷapa dina
āhuri kicchidina rahile tuṣṭa hoiba mohora mana | 135 |
dr̥bhāsāẏe boile bābu caturmāsyā rahibu boilū
kointā bhagate to rājye daśa baraṣa rahilū | 136 |
kontabhoja boile jībana mohora dhani dhani
muhiṁ pachakati goḍāi acchi gahana kānana | 138 |
thokāẏe dūra yāi muni chāhiṁle leuṭi
kointā tu raha boli boile taponiṣṭhi | 139 |
īśvara sebākari muṁta niṣphaḷa hoili debasvāmī | 140 |
dr̥bhāsāẏe boile tu āmbhanta sebā karithilu
mantra mauṣadhi kāhākuhiṁ na dei ye yāti | 142 |
muhiṁ boili bāluta agyāna kisa tote māgi
jāṇi anugraha kara mote bho parama yogī | 143 |
dr̥bhāsyāẏe boile āī sti rīṁka ẏeheneka brata
sundara svāmīṁki icchā śūrabanta hoibāka putra | 144 |
mohora kareṇa ruṣi dile tahā toḷi | 145 |
ẏe japāmāḷi gheniṇa tu śeyyāra yugate
trailokye yāhāku icchā karibu prāpata hoiba tote | 146 |
brahmā indra pabana candra sr̥ryya viṣṇu ye dhūrjaṭī
tohora sumarante na āsile mr̥ddhanā yiba phāṭi | 147 |
muhiṁ bichāriḷi ẏemanta parīṣa kariba yugate | 148 |
bābu komaḷa śāḷapatra guḍāẏe śeyyā muhiṁ kali
mantra parīkṣa nimante muṁ karatāre dhyāili | 149 |
gagana tejiṇa se ye bijaẏe karatara
patnī prāẏe maṇikari mote basāile koḷara | 150 |
biḷāsa māgante mote muṁ kalāi tāṁku nāsti
liñkhabhagma doṣa hoiba ba luta stirī harante
muhiṁ apratiṣṭhā nārī mote hariba kemante | 152 |
birañchi nārāẏaṇa boile tu yebe ẏemanta dharma bichārilu
śr̥ñkha ra na kari yebe yini go bāhuḍi
ruṣiṁkara mantra bhaẏe bhāskara tejile dharmabāṭa
śīghreṇa kari karatāra śr̥ñkhāra mote kale
karṇṇara bāṭe bābu janama helū tuhi | 157 |
karṇṇapathe putra tu ye hoilū utapanna
koḷe dhari mārataṇḍa nāma dile karṇṇa | 159 |
tālure chāpile tora abheda kapaca maṇi
amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa beni karṇṇe khañchi leka āṇi | 160 |
bajra chauṁrī tora śarīre kaleka ye senhā
boile dāne śūrabanta hoibu bhāgoimalla karṇṇa
subarṇṇa śatebhāra basudhā ḍare lāñchadeba nityeṇa | 163 |
bābu mātā pitāṁku duṣṇa upujiba boli
mr̥ttikā mañjhuṣā tote bhari yamunā nadīre dili peli | 164 |
makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa pūrṇṇimāra dina | 166 |
gaṇḍa yogahiṁ se dina lāgithilā te te
ẏesaneka bacana ye kahanti debī konte | 168 |
sedina sañjhaẏara duhitā rādhebī galā yamunā nadī srāhāne
se mañjhuṣa bhediṇa diśai ādityara jyāti
rādhebī se mañjhuṣa yāiṁ dhailā tatakṣaṇānti | 170 |
ẏethira ticare kisa puṇa ye achai | 171 |
ẏeteboli bālī kare gheniṇa ye toḷi
mañjhuṣa bhāñkhi lā se tāhāra ye kare | 173 |
bhāñkhanteṇa kumarare tu hoilu ye dr̥śya
muhiṁ garbhadhārī ye byathā mora basilā | 175 |
kointā boile bābu tote rādhebī pratipāḷi
bhīṣma droṇaṁkara bidyāre tu se hoilu mahābalī | 176 |
bābu nirdvanda hoiṇa tu thilū bhalamate
yuddha ārambha dekhiṇa bhaẏa lāge mote | 177 |
samara nikaṭa dekhi aili mūrucchi nuāri | 178 |
āsa āsa putra boli kointāẏe dhaile hāthageṭi
mātaṁka caraṇa taḷe binoẏī karṇṇa loṭi | 179 |
karṇṇa boilā mātā go śuṇuthili aḷapa aḷapa
antakāḷe mātā go pāili sata ye sarupa | 180 |
mātā hoi mote ta kala go nirāśa
mātā go bāḷakāluṁ mote ye pāḷilā rādhebī
kaurobaṁka sañkhate muṁ ye hoili priẏabhābi | 182 |
mā go ādihuṁ āśakalā se mohora bāhuku
ẏemanta beḷe chāḍile dharma gacchiba kenhe muku | 183 |
lg.note:
kūḷaku nei mañchaṣā kalā beniphāḷa
sahasre kiraṇa kyoti diśeanargaḷa | (ṇa, ja, pha, ñcha, da, ka, ṛa)
lg.l: pañchabhr̥ta ātmā mora māna ye gobinda
karṇṇa boilā mātā go tohe ra putra ye bibatsa
boile amara rakṣākalū bara māgare phāliguni | 186 |
arjuna boilā pitā yebe debu bara
karṇṇara tahuṁ āṇidebu amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa bajra chauṁrī abheda kapaca tini | 188 |
sehi nimante indra brohmaṇa rūpa hoi
ẏe tini padārtha māgi nelā satya ye karāi | 189 |
tāḷu bidāri kāḍhili abheda kaphaca maṇi
rudhira bhr̥ṣṭa hoilā ākāśa gañkhā jāṇi | 190 |
śarīruṁ bidāri kāḍhiḷi bajra ye chauṁrī
karṇṇaru kāḍhili mātā go amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa yāḍi | 191 |
arjunara gyāne mātā go mote hoilā ẏeḍeka paramāda | 192 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ karṇṇa ye hoilā mahātrodhī
pāṇḍabe kaugobe kāhiṁ karāi loḍu sanddha | 193 |
lg.note: pāṇḍabe sodara mora kāhiṁ ẏebe bidhi | (jha, ñcha, cha, ta, pha)
karṇṇa pāśtabe sahodra ākāra kāhiṁkari māta buddha | (ga, ṛa, dha)
lg.l: ẏe mohora satya satya go dr̥ḍha ye bacana
prathama samare mā go māribi tora putra arajuna | 194 |
arjuna tohora hāde kaniṣṭha bhrātha bābu | 196 |
karṇṇa boilā mātā go muṁ yebe tora jyeṣṭha āmuja
mātā hoi kemante tu kalu parityāja | 197 |
duja putrakaiṁ ye yujheṣṭhi nāma dilu
jyeṣṭha boliṇa ye rājye udita karāilu | 198 |
mātā hoiṇa tu ye kalu baḍa trāna
bichāra na kari tu chāḍilu dharmagyāna | 199 |
karṇṇa boilā māta sodara hoi yebe manda cinti
sundara bhārijā hoi yebe hoai mandabāṭi
saṁghāta maitra hoi ye he iba kapaṭi | 201 |
kr̥paṇa prakr̥ti yebe āpaṇe kisa dānī | 202 |
para hoi yebe hoi prāṇa sākhā
svāmī hoi yebe doṣa na kare upekṣā | 203 |
karṇṇa boilā mā go śāhāsre ẏeheneka kathā
karṇṇa boilā mā go nakara apekṣā
lakṣe kr̥ṣṇa hoile pāṇḍabanta ke kariba rikṣā | 205 |
kointāẏe boile bābu muhiṁ ye aili
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bacana meṇṭi lajjā ye pāili | 206 |
lg.note: śiṣya hoi yebe guruṁku na māni | (pha, ñcha)
karṇṇa boilā mā go na kara kaicchā | (ka, ṛa, tha)
lg.l: karṇṇa boilā mātā go tribāra mora satya
yujheṣṭhi bhīṣma nakuḷa sahadeba samare na māribu | 208 |
se tote māru ki tu tāhāku mārare yugati | 209 |
kointāẏe boile tu yebe arjunaku māribu samare
sehi añchuputra mora hoibe ye hāde | 211 |
kointāẏe boile tu bābu mohora dulaṇā
yugate tu mote debu guruca dakṣiṇā | 212 |
karṇṇa boilā mātā go dakṣiṇā māga mote
sāṁsārikā dharmaku muṁ bhāga debaiṁ ye tote | 213 |
karṇṇa boilā mātā go dakṣiṇā tote debi
satya satya hoilā ẏehā anyathā na karibi | 214 |
āho caitana karṇṇakaiṁ satya kagai māgile debī kointī
karṇṇa boilā mātā go jāṇila kemante
kāha kuhiṁ gocara nāhiṁ muṁ saṁhari acchi gupate | 217 |
lg.note: karṇṇa boilā mā go dakṣiṇā mā{?}tuhi
sāṁsārikā dharme mote māgite yugate lāgai | (ga, gha, ñcha, pha)
lg.l: debatā bihantā lokanta gocara ta nāhiṁ
śuṇa bābu karṇṇare badaẏanti debī kointe
āmbhaṁku ẏemāna kiñchita parā sahadebara thāānte | 219 |
karṇṇa boilā mātā go tu yugate garbhadhārī mohori
kiñchita chatrīpaṇa thilā ailu tāhā māri | 220 |
kointāẏe boile muṁ na māgai ẏemāna
āsa āsa mohora thāṭhare ṭhākura hoa karṇṇa | 221 |
karṇṇa boilā māẏe go ẏemāna kimpe kahu
maitra kāryyace thile prāṇa pache yāu | 222 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa ho baibasuta manu
kointāṁka āge karṇṇa cirilā beni jānū | 223 |
ḍāhāṇa jānū bhitare thilā se nīḷabāṇa
indradebatā nele abheda kapaca bajra chauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa
se rāge napuṇa karṇṇa nāśai ākhaṇḍaḷa | 227 |
lg.note: kiñchita chatrīpaṇa thilā ailu tāhā hari | (cha, na)
āsa āsa mohora thāṭhare senāpati hoa karṇṇa | (ka, da, tha, ga, jha)
lg.l: āho caitana karṇṇara hāthe ye nīḷabāṇa bhr̥jabāṇa dekhi

{@kaḷpāsura sahita karṇṇara yuddha,
nīḷa bāṇa o bhr̥ja bāṇara uputti@}
karṇṇa pāilā kāhuṁ ẏe bani śahasta saṁharilā jānu | 1 |
ẏethira carita mote kaha manu pucchākalā | 2 |
ẏethira carita mote kahibā agasti he
manu bhrānti phaiṭu śuṇiṇa ẏethira sandehe | 3 |
pañchubaṭī bane harihara mandara parbate basichanti | 4 |
triśūḷe ciri tāhāku buhāile deba śūḷapāṇi | 5 |
mithuna māsa śukaḷa sakṣa tithi ye pūrṇṇamī
baba nāme karaṇa prīti nāme yoga
baḍa anīti kalā se kaḷapāsura dāneba | 8 |
228|2 bhaẏeṇa indra debā āsana upekṣi | (ka, tha, ḍa, na, da, cha)
tapa bhāñjhai ruṣinta ye khāi poḍi
yāga yagyaṁ buḍilā ye asuraṁka ḍare
megha jāta nohilā br̥ṣṭi nohilā saṁsāre | 10 |
ẏepaneka bichāruṁ ye prabeśa hoilā niśi
karṇṇa hiṁ āsi achai bana heri ye mr̥gaẏā
hoilū āja baḷire tote kehu raṣa | 14 |
asuraca kopa dekhi ye ādityara balā
kareṇa dhanu dhari se teje anargaḷā | 16 |
ākarṇṇa pūroi se nārāja kare bhr̥ṣṭi | 17 |
kaḷpa āṣya dile se birañchi debatā | 18 |
abheda kapaca bajrachauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa yāhāra thilā sañchi
19|2 duheṁ samakaccha sehu samara bidhāna | (na, da, ka, ñcha, ga, cha, ta, ba)
āmbanta loḍi asuthilā kalpāsura andhāri digabije | 23 |
svāmī karṇṇa bīra āsithilā beṇṭa ye binode
gobinde boile se karṇṇa āditya debatāra suta
tāhāra ẏehāra dui hoi ẏekai sañkhaḍha | 27 |
hirihara samara dekhanti ye parbatare uṭhi
śarīre na phuṭe tāra tīkṣa bābala nāme śara | 29 |
āditya udaẏa hoile āsi ye pūrbadiga bhāge
se śahasra paḍilā yāi karṇṇara bacchathaḷe | 31 |
kuṇḍaḷuṁ amr̥ta jhari karṇṇa tuṇḍareṇa paśi | 33 |
śata siṁhara baḷa ye hoilā rādheba | 34 |
āre re mānabā tora ẏeteka darpa kimpā | 35 |
kurāḷa catra prāẏe kari pañchu dhārā śūḷeka bulāi
karṇṇa hāthuṁ dhanu śahasra se ye ghenilā uchuḍi | 38 |
mukuṭa kuṇḍaḷa yeteka ratna aḷaṁkāra thilā
boilā mānabā re adabhr̥te galu nāśa
kāli prabhāte bhakṣibi tohora rakata māẏeṁsa | 40 |
dhanu troṇa na dekhiṇa birasa tāra mati | 43 |
karṇṇara sannidhye āsi harihara kale bije | 44 |
karṇṇa boile bābhiẏe ke ke tumbhe aṭa
mote baḍa kaṭāḷa kalā kalpāsura pāpiṣṭha | 45 |
aneka tapīnta se dānaba kalā nāśa
tapodhana hoi kimpe tumbhara ẏeḍeka sāhasa | 46 |
mote māriṇa pratagyāṁ se kariacchi kāli
ẏehikṣaṇi āsiba mote bhakṣiba ye boli | 47 |

div.note: daitāri = daitya nāẏaka |

lg.l: tumbhanta pāile se na bhakṣiba mote | 49 |
brohmaṇe boile tu ye bhārathe bhāroi malla
āmbhaṁku kisa pramāda acchi thile tumbhara tula | 50 |
dhanu śahasra sahite mora nelāni ẏeghānti | 51 |
īśvare boile tote dhanu śahasra dile
karṇṇa pratibāca paṇḍā he droṇe āmbhara guru
praśurāmaṁka vidyā āmbhe nitye ghoṣaṇa pāṭhakaru | 53 |
se śahasramāna paḍi sanu hoilāni cūra
kisa śahasra deba tumbhe khūrpa biprajane | 55 |
harihara boli tāṁku na cihnai bīrkarṇṇaa
tapodhana rupa hoi suruddhi kathā kahi | 57 |
karṇṇa boilā tumbhe nakala kicchi bhala
ẏetheṁ kṣaṇe nathibā bahana hoi caḷa | 58 |
brāhmaṇe boile āmbhe paḷāibu abā daitara ḍare
tu chatrī hoi paḷāibu kebaṇa bebhāra samare | 59 |
karṇṇa boilā chatrīkuḷaku achai ẏeheneka dharma
hāribā jiṇibā ẏe chatrīṁkara nija dharma karma | 60 |
ajañkhama dhanuku sumaraṇa kale deba kāśī
ārdrābalī sa rikṣe dhanu miḷilāka āsi | 61 |

div.note: khūrpa = kharba |
ajañkhama = ajagaba |

lg.l: nabaniśi kuṭhāra gheniṇa tāhā hara kāṭi | 62 |
aṁguṣṭhi śara hoilā, nakha hoilā tīkṣamunā nārāja
śrīkr̥ṣṇahiṁ chedile ye bāmabhr̥ja kaniṣṭha aṁguṣṭhi
harihara duheṁ dile neiṁ karṇṇara hāthara
ẏe nāraja dhanure pūroi kalpāsura māra | 65 |
karṇṇa boilā paṇḍā he pranurāma bidyāẏe droṇe āmbhara guru
āna nārāja āmbhe ye prahāra nairu | 66 |
tumbhe ke ke benijana mbhuṁ sarūpa bujhibi | 67 |
kalpāsura bhaẏe āmbhe paśichu bana ghora | 68 |
karṇṇa boilā tumbhe yebe harihara beni
tumbhe kimpe ẏehā badhakari nuārila ẏe śahasra gheni | 69 |
īśvara boile ẏehākaiṁ bara dile topiara birañchi
deba dānabe na mariba boli bara māgiacchi | 70 |
nindākari tāhā na māgilā nakalā gaṇanā | 71 |
tuhi sinā mānaba kuḷe aṭu jāẏe
biśeṣe prasanna āẏe harihara duheṁ baradāẏe | 72 |

div.note:
āho caitana śrīkr̥ṣṇahiṁ chedile ye dakṣabhr̥ja
kaniṣṭha aṁguṣṭhi |

lg.l: ābara bara pradāna karicchi tora pitā
śahasre badha nohibi boli bara māgicchi yātudhāna
teṇu se aṁguṣṭhi āmbhe karidilu chedana | 74 |
karṇṇa boilā svāmī muṁ tubmhanta cihni nuārili
dānaba badha karibā yaẏe mote talaẏe karithibā | 76 |
binddhale nārāja tora bheduṁ boli boile harahari | 78 |
ākarṇṇa ṭāṇi karṇṇa dhanure pūroila ye nārāja
re re kāra śabade ye binddhalā danuje mahāteja | 82 |
āhe caitana nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa duhinti pūroi
asura uparaku chāhīṁ se bindhai niṭhiāi | 85 |
āho karṇṇabīra ẏe ye aṭai debaśara
ẏekābeḷeke ẏe duhinti kara ho prahāra | 87 |
āditye boile kalpāsura māgilā mote bara
ẏe benithāne paḍi asura kāẏe phuṭi
danujara nābhi kaṇṭhaku karṇṇa dilā dr̥ṣṭi
kaṇṭhe paḍante śara da naba hoilā uttanasāhī
nābhi kaṇṭhe paḍi piṭhi katiki galā phuṭi

div.note: uttānasāhi–uttānaśāẏī |

lg.l: kalpa sura paḍante ye aneka sānanda mahīāḷi
harihara boile ho bara māga karṇṇa
tu se rakṣākalu ho sabuṁkara dharma tapa | 101 |
karṇṇa boilā mūm na māgai āna
dāneṇa śūrabanta tu aṭu ho rādheba
brāhmaṇa rūpa dhāri māgi nebeṇa dānaba | 104 |
ẏe śahasra paile se hoibe koṭikalpi
ẏeṇu se nāśa karibe ruṣi bipra tapī | 105 |
tote saṁkaṭa paḍile binddhabu ẏe śahasra | 106 |
brahma indra kubera ābara candra sūryya
yaam baruṇa pabana hoileheṁ samaste hoibeka dahija | 107 |
ẏe śahasra kare thiel tote kehi nohibe sari | 108 |
harihara duhinti ẏekā ādhāna na karibu | 109 |
yetebeḷa pariyante ẏe śahasra thiba tora jānu
ẏe pañchabhūta ātmā na chāḍiba tora tanu | 110 |

div.note: harihara duinti ẏekā uddāna na karibu |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: āho caitana bara dei harihara gale antarddhāne
nīḷabaṇa bhmajabāṇa jānureṇa saṁharila bira karṇṇe | 111 |
śuṇa ho baccabasuta manu badaẏanti brahmabettā
se nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa beni māgile debī ye kointā | 112 |
ẏe śahasramānanta gheni caḷa go turita | 113 |
raẏaṇī pāhānti ye caḷanti nija purī | 114 |
kointāẏe boile bābu śuṇa mo bacana
tu mohora bacanare kalu bīra karṇṇa | 115 |
karṇṇara tahuṁ āṇili mote guru dakṣiṇā deiacchi | 119 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile ki ki māgila go māta
boili samare na māribu yujheṣṭhi bhīma nakuḷa sahadebakaiṁ | 122 |

div.note: saṁharilā = saṁbharilā |

lg.l: mā go tohora bola mote pāṣāṇara gāra | 123 |
chāmure paḍile tora nāma sumaribe yathā | 124 |

div.head: {@śaṅkhāsuraṭha ru beda uddhāra p stotra@}

lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu yāhā pachārilu mote
aḷapa aḷapa kari kahili jāṇa hāde tote | 1 |
ākāśa tejiṇa pitāmaha ye nityakarma bidhi
se jaḷe paśi dhātā karai nityakarma
uñchasvare ḍākadilā ke nelāre mora beda pothi | 8 |

div.note: beda pothi na pāiṇa bisarai bidhātā |(ga, ṭa, jha)

lg.l: na pāiṇa bedabara paḍi gale mr̥kṣā | 9 |
he kr̥ṣṇa he kr̥ṣṇa boli uñchasvare ḍākadilā
dhyāneṇa jāṇile brahmāra bedapothi śaṅkhāsura kalā chorī | 12 |
mīnarūpa dhari hari akāda jaḷe kale bije | 13 |
nīra kṣāra kṣīra dadhi chāri samudra gale loḍi | 14 |
udearka prāẏe diśe akāda ye pāṇi
dekhile bāsudeba śaṅkhāsura mūrati aditya teja jāṇi | 16 |
kṣāra samudra teji kṣīra samudre bijaẏe mahāprahu
mahā biśvarūpa pratakṣe bikāśile deba tahuṁ | 17 |
jhātikāre mīna rūpe śaṅkhāku yāi bheṭi
āre āre kauṇapa boli hākile se chāhiṁlā pālaṭi | 18 |

div.note: mr̥kṣā = mr̥cchā |

lg.l: śaṅkhāsura teja dekhi mahā biśvarūpa dhaile banamāḷī
matsyarūpe lāṅguḷa ye dileka tahiṁ chāḷi | 21 |
brahmāṇḍe lāgilā yāi maha jaḷadhi nīra
caurāśi kāṭhi gabhīra pūrilāka tāhāṁka śarīra | 22 |
śaṅkhāmīna duheṁ tahiṁ hoile taḍa taḍi | 23 |
śaṅkhāsura boilā re tu kebaṇa mahātamā
mīnarūpa boile re muhiṁ se nārāẏaṇa
tohore mohora kāryya acchi boli muṁ apārakāḷa sahi | 27 |
tote dekhibi boli brahmāra bedapothi chorikali | 28 |
mīna boilā tu yebe mohore bhagati

div.note: śarīre lāṅguḷa ye dileka heṇṭāḷi |(ka, da)

mīnarūpī boile re tora yebe mote ẏeḍe bhaẏa hāde
pitāra bedapothi bege dia apramāde |(cha, gha, da, ḍha)

lg.l: ṇaṅkhāsura boilā hari muṁ bhakṣiliṇi apāra beḷe
keśaba boile uṁ ẏemanta na yāiṁ parate
śaṅkhāsura hasilā ye mīnara bākya śuṇi
bhmaja thile naha sinā thāāntā catrapāṇi | 32 |
kisa gheni bidāribu mohora ye buku
aniryāpa kathā tu kimpāiṁ kahu muku | 33 |
beniphāḷa kari ciribi pratagyāṁ mora gāḍhe | 34 |
tebe se pheḍibi muṁ brahmāra sākaṭa | 35 |
śaṅkhāsura boilā adr̥ṣṭi kathā kahu debarajai
māchara pāṭire kāhiṁ śaṅkhā darpa bhāñjai | 36 |
māchara garbhmaṁ bāhāra hoi kāẏā bistārile catrapāṇi | 37 |
dakṣiṇe sundri śeṇa catra bāmabhmajeṇa kodaṇḍa
dakṣiṇe kaumodakī gadā ghoṭilā mahī nabakhaṇḍa | 38 |
yamunā jaḷa madhyare yenhe nīḷakamaḷa phuṭi | 39 |
śaṅkhākuhiṁ chāhiṁle deba kaṭhora na ne | 40 |

div.note: śaṅkhā boilā adr̥ṣṭi kathā kahu hari |(keteka pothi)
māchra dāntare kāhiṁ śaṅkhāra peṭa bidāri |(jha, tha)
garbhagatuṁ kāẏeka ye bikāśile āṇi |(da, gha, ḍa)
laha = nakha |

lg.l: mama janma bhābeṇa icchilaiṁ deba yāhā
karapatra yoḍiṇa ye śaṅkhāsura kare pucchā
svāmī tinibhmaje śahasra tora kimpe, ẏeka bhmaja tucchā | 44 |
gobinde boile muṁ achai ẏehā parimāṇi
tote māri ẏe bhmaje bahibi nāma hoiba śaṅkhapāṇi | 45 |}
baḍa durāpada kathā kahila he mahāmunya | 46 |
na pāi bedabara ki mantra paḍhilā | 47 |
kebaṇa mate sthāpilā sr̥ṣṭi ye jagata
abeda kathā galā apāra kāḷa pariyante | 49 |
manu boile satyayuga paśuṁ brahmāra bedapothi chorinelā
loḍi ṭhāba karante ye satyayuga bahigalā | 50 |
mantra abhābe kesaneke śasya jāta pr̥thī | 51 |
manu boile śuṇa ẏethira carita kathā
bedapotha{?} harāi pitāmahara hoilā nabama abasthā | 52 |
heṭha badana hoiṇa brahmā bhūmi ciri gāra kāṭante
tahuṁ atharba deba ye hoilā bāhāra | 54 |
toṣā hoi bidhātā yajurbeda ye srijilā | 55 |
śaṅkhāra mīnara yahuṁ mana hoilāka śānti
ẏe chāribeda brahmā chāri pustake lekhana
atharba beda dle nei agastiṁka hāthe | 58 |
yugakalpa bañchālā se mahātamā mahāmantra gheni | 59 |
nija rūpa dhari yahu bikāśile deba kāẏe
śaṅkhāsura tusti śiṇi deba kale daẏe | 61 |

div.note: rukabeda br̥haspati kaleka ākhyāna |(jha)
atharba beda paile durbhāsā tapobante |(dha, ḍha)
atharba beda dile nei mārakaṇḍe tapodhani |(ba, ta, pothira adhikā pāṭha)|
yadurbeda paile baśiṣṭha mahāmuni |(keteka pothi)
yugakalpa bañchāila se ẏe charibeda gheni |(tha)

catramāri śaṅkhasuraku tārile banamāḷī
garbharu śaṅkhāsurara bedapothi āṇile huṁchudi |(ca)

bhasma galā bedapothi alpa alpa thiti
mahāmantra thoile viṣṇu nāthaṁkara kati |(ta)

lg.l: mahāmantra pothi nei thoilā se viṣṇu nāthaṁkara kati | 62 |
gobinde boile tora śaṇīlu madhurasa bāṇī
triputi hoili śaṅkhāsura re bara māga puṇi | 63 |
śaṅkhāsura boilā svāmī nistarili tumbhara bheṭe
prasanna hoi mīna boile madhura rasa bāṇī
bāmakare dharithibi tote mo nāma hoiba kambupāṇi | 65 |
asaṁkhya agocara ẏe mīna rūpara mahimāṁ
keśaba boile pitā anubrate yāhā paḍhu
se mahāmantra potha{?}ki kimpe heḷe kari chāḍuu | 68 |
sambhaḷa mahāmantra potha{?}tu na chāḍibu kṣaṇe
e mīnarūpaku mora binoẏī niti niti

div.note:
yāhā magibu tāhā debaiṁ badaẏanti dāmodara
sānanda śaṅkhāsura śire yoḍai benikara |(gha)
siddha śarī hoi basibi baikuṇṭhe |(cha)
siddha śuddha hoiṇa muṁ basibi baikuṇṭhe |(gha)
mīnarūpaku dhyāẏekara nare phitiba durgata |(ga, gha, jha, ta, dha)

durāpāta pātaka durgati achai mohore
ẏethuṁ uddhara bāre debakīra bāḷa |(ta, ṭa)

lg.l: ẏe duṣṭa durgatiru tarili mīnara parasane
janme janme muhiṁ toho caraṇare bandi | 74 |
kaṇaẏa birājita nātha agāda jaḷe rohi
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa mīnarūpaku dhyāẏe nitye | 77 | || 4611 ||

div.note:
māẏā birājita svāmī agāda jaḷa rohi
matsarūpa hoi trailokya jana mohi |(cha, jha, ta, ṭa)

div.head: {@mahākṣatrīmānaṅkara baḷābaḷa o yuddhara niẏama@}

lg.l: he muni kr̥tārtha kala śuṇāi bhāratha | 1 |
āu keuṁ kathā acchi karuntu prakāśa
yāhā muṁ kahucchi śuṇa mati kari sthira | 3 |
śuṇimā heu bho deba nr̥pa cūḍāmaṇi
tāhā śuṇi kurupati bije bhīṣma tahiṁ
baḍa baḍa rājāmāne gheni nija sanya
he gāṅgeśa raṇe tāṁku karibānā hata
ẏe sakaḷa kathā kaha kari mote sata | 15 |
meḷahele yete sanya āsi ẏe thānare
uprodha na kari kr̥tabarmā kale yuddha
abaśeṣa na rahile dui ye prahare | 23 |
muhiṁ yebe dhanu dhari samara karibi
raṇa kale kampe mora muṣṭi āu kara | 28 |
droṇa karṇṇaṁkara hiẏā huẏe daka daka
abyartha śara sandhāna aṭai teṇu tāra | 30 |
saturi sahasra baḷa kāhā dhanu jāṇa
ẏeteka baḷare dhanu aṭe sehu senāṁkara
matra lakṣeka baḷa aṭai ye gāṇḍima dhanura | 32 |
se kathākaiṁ kiẏe aba karibāka āna | 34 |
se kāḷe indrādi debe puṇa sakaḷe hārile | 37 |
pradāna karile tāhāṁkaiṁ nānā deba cintā | 38 |
subhadrā haraṇakāḷe tume dekhicha ta puṇa
baḷarāma hārigle tāra saṅgate kari raṇa | 39 |
śatadhanu bhaẏeṇa yekāḷe tāra śaraṇa paśila
nije deba nārāẏaṇa tahiṁ hele parājaẏa
godhana haraṇa kāḷe tume dekhichata rāẏa | 41 |
ẏe samasta bacana śuṇiṇa ye rājā driyodhana
boiel samara āu heba ye kesana | 43 |
śuṇiṇa bhīṣmadeba boluchanti acchi tā upāẏa | 44 |
ẏehu bhāratha sāṁgrame āme niẏama karibā
debatā diantā śara ye kehu na māribā | 45 |
ye asra śikṣā hoicchi guru ka mukhare
se sakaḷa asraśasra piroga hoiba samare | 46 |
śakuni mantrīṁkara ẏebe doṣa he rājāna
sarbe āmbhe niẏama karibā thāiṇa ẏeṭhābare | 48 |
se thānare paḍiba ye yuddhara niẏama sakaḷa
ẏeṭhāku na aile kimpe kauroba rājana | 53 |
āmbhemāne yibu kimpe āgyāṁbaha prāẏe hoi
śuṇi śakuni mantrī boilā śuṇa āhe bātasuta
tu yāhā kahilu tāhā aṭainā yugata | 55 |
se sabhāẏe achanti nānā deśara mahīpāḷa
se sabhākaiṁ gale kimpe hoiba apamāna
ẏeṇū kahe chāla sarbe hastinā nagare
kālita uttama dian aṭai jāṇa nr̥pabara
kāhāri manare kicchi hiṁsa kapaṭa nadhara
ẏethakaiṁ sākṣī hoithibe prahu deba nārāẏaṇa
debaśahasramānanta ẏe samare kehi na piṣiba
manabhedī śahasra na māribe madhyama pāṇḍaba | 67 |
guruṁka mukhare yeuṁasra śikṣā acchi hoi
praẏoga kariba tāhā raṇa madhye thāi | 68 |
sāṁgrama kāḷe yāhākaiṁ ye pāriba māri
yuddha rahile bujhiba nija maitra pari | 69 |
puṇi śahasra dhari yebe kariba samara
ẏe sakaḷa kathā śuṇi sarbe niẏama karile
ẏe sakaḷa niẏama aṭai āmbhara pramāṇa
ẏehāku laṁghiba yehu pāiba bahuta duṣaṇa | 73 |
pratagyāṁ karicha śahasra na dhariba kare | 75 |
āhe bhakata matsaḷa prabhma karuṇā sāgara
muṁ tumbha dāsara dāsa jāṇa aṭai kiṁkara | 76 |
se pratagyāṁ na rahiba niścaẏa muhiṁ jāṇe
mo yoguṁ dhariba śahasra samara prāṅgaṇe | 77 |
bho deba pr̥thibīra bhārā uśvāsibā pāiṁ
thiba dui pakṣa sakṣī sarūpare rahi | 78 |
ye yāhā mandirakaiṁ puṇa gabana karile | 80 |
udiyega paboṅg lekhai śrī sāroḷa dāsa | 82 || 4694 ||
